name: Flirt !!
description: F L I R T !!  Boba Tea and Maid CafÃ©

LGBTQ+ Focus | Immersive Roleplay | Various Events    Come in for our sweet treats, stay for our eye candy!    A Bubble Tea and Snack Bar run by Maids during the day, happy to serve and keep you company if your heart desires.~    You may also find yourself amongst Yokai, blending into the normal and mundane, until cracks begin to form in what we label as reality. During the day, people often are skeptical of the paranormal, yet when the sun begins to set and the darkness takes hold, people tend to be more open-minded.

name: Ruin's Respite
description: Ruin's Respite is a bar and host lounge club providing some comfort from the cold and some companionship for the lonely. With a variety of services for any guest and a menu catered towards the taste of the Garlean co-owners, most anyone may find something they might like.

name: Purrfection
description: Welcome to Purrfection! We're a sexy catgirl themed nightclub for all the late night degens. We offer something for everyone, whether you're looking for some affection, a spicy finish for your evening, or just a place to dance the night away with friends. Purrfection is the purrfect get away.

name: RE:GROW
description: RE:GROW is a medium sized underground venue, that old style mosh pit and bar. Good music, loud and brash is our passion, get that blood pumping. We're no frills, no charge, no services other than an RP Bar, photographer and a macro dancer. We bring in Dj's from NA to EU as well as have 6 resident DJ's. Our music genre fits the theme; Metal, Industrial, EBM, Goth, Dark, Ska, Punk, Darkwave/Tech and Rock.

name: Scarlet Manor
description: Scarlet Manor is an upmarket bar & lounge experience, where dazzling dancers and enthralling escorts wait to meet your needs. Grab a drink, and come relax in our pleasant, friendly atmosphere, and make new connections in luxurious surroundings.

name: The Bun Cafe
description: Come one, Come all! Taste the finest Pastries Eorzea has to offer. You will find us in the Empyreum, Ward 16, Plot 22. Come and just vibe the night away with friends, AFK friendly. Multiple services available upon request.

name: Obsidian Spire
description: Dedicated Goth Vampire hangout! ðŸ§›

At Polarity and Obsidian Spire alike, we are all about the return to the original days of clubbing: Just great music, great friends, and great memories in a place you can call home! Pure and simple fun. All our services are completely free of charge. Food and drinks are always on the house.
We feature the darker musical genres befitting any vampire and their gothic familiars: EBM, Industrial, Dark Synthwave, Post Punk, Rave, Hardcore.
Our friendly staff awaits you to assist you during your visit, or even just to dance and chat. Bring only yourself and your RP fun, the rest is all on us!

name: Whisky A GOGO
description: FFXIV Whisky A GOGO, operating in honor of the real rock 'n' roll, hall of fame bar located on the LA Sunset Strip where Motley Crue, Guns n Roses, The Doors, The WHO, LA Guns, KISS, and many other great bands where born.
We are an FC of metal heads, dedicated to the conservation of the music culture of ROCK 'N' ROLL and METAL for all younger generations of gamers.

We love to share talk and have everyone participate in raffles, giveaways, drinking games, and death rolls. We love for people to come in and ask for their favorite song for Rock or Metal or whatever we playing that night, talk about music share normal metal head stuff, and please feel free to moshpit the fuck out of the place.

The outside operation we always going to have an open door to everyone to either join our FC or our discord where our goal is to unite and connect all metal bars under one banner the family we are, no matter where in the world you are we love music
WE ARE BROTHERS, SISTERS, WARRIORS OF METAL, WE ARE THE HAMMER OF THE GODS THUNDER WIND AND RAIN.  ImL

name: The Great Below
description: Siyra Phemduk has been a resident of the Lavender Beds since 2016 with her husband Ser Phemduk. Shes always been a huge housing fan and enthusiast, helping others decorate, and manage her free company home's dÃ©cor as well. It wasn't until recently she started to venture out to actual venues around Primal.

Siyra decided to turn her humble abode into a relaxing venue for adventurers looking for a place to rest, take a dip in a hot tub after a long day, or grab something to eat and drink. She was inspired to do so by other relaxing venues like The Nomnomazu, and the Senpan Tea House.

The Great Below serves six different menus (please note all times are listed in Pacific time): breakfast (available 5:00AM to 11:00AM), lunch (available 11:00AM to 6:00PM), dinner (available 6:00PM to 10:00PM), Waffle House Hours (available 11:00PM to 5:00AM), dessert (available at all hours), and a variety of beverages (available at all hours). If your host does not tell you what menu is currently being served, please don't hesitate to ask!

name: Azure
description: We are an elegant underwater/amaurot themed night club. We have a full RP service bar with drinking contests, courts and giveaways almost every night!

name: Punch Drunk
description: An Eastern-themed, underground fight club and bar. Every Wednesday we host an open death roll tournament with a gil prize of at least 5 million. Sign up fee is 250k. We also offer Challenge Drinks, weekly bounties, and gambling. Punch Drunk also strives to be as beginner-friendly as possible so if you're new to the venue scene and/or death roll fighting, give us a try!

name: The Ninth Twilight Fine Dining Restaurant
description: Join us this evening at The Ninth Twilight Fine Dining Restaurant for a night of elegance and wonder. An unique fine dining experience unparalleled to all other. From top tier service to a cuisine of artisan mastery for a night to remember. Serving brunch, high tea, dinner and dessert. Dine with us under the twilit sky.
âœ§Reservations are available. Inquire with Discord Twine Twilight#0684

We have outdoor and indoor seating, a pool, a secret jump puzzle to the roof, and so much more! We hope to provide a space for those who need a little fairy magic to escape and relax.

name: Sweet Puffs
description: Sweet Puffs is an NPC run, Thavnairian inspired Hookah Lounge and Dessert Bar specializing in Shisha and Hannish inspired faire. Designed to be a relaxed and chill social venue located in Ishgard. Sit back, relax, and enjoy your time in the warm atmosphere. Order a Hookah with your selection of Shisha. Enjoy the clouds with a cold drink, hot meal, or sweet treat.

description: The Golden Night Casino is the first casino to allow our guests to gamble gil while offline! A fun, formal place where gambling-addicts and esteemed gentlemen and gentleladies alike can gather around for a good time.

name: Cuffed

We strive to make the gap between clubs and the bard/RP scene a little smaller by offering events for both and welcome everyone. Whether you would like to attend a DJ event or a Open Mic Night, we got you covered!

name: Blindâ˜†Namazu
description: The Blindâ˜†Namazu speakeasy is an LGBTQ-affirming environment that caters to adults 18+. Please enjoy our cozy chaotic vibes.

name: Sleepy Cat Cafe
description: The cafe is to be a safe space for people to come relax and enjoy a warm drink and a sweet treat before heading off on their next big adventure. We wish to make everyone feel welcome while being respectful to other patrons who might be visiting.

name: The HIVE
description: Welcome the HIVE, Honeybees! â™¥ï¸ We're one of Aether's oldest and most treasured 18+ nightclubs.

Tonight, enter into the honeycombe and get lost in the sweet aroma of a first class, night time experience complete with a fully stocked bar of honey delights, sweet dancers, lustful courtesans, and a casino almost as addictive as treats from the host, Honey Bee, herself.

description: The Cuddle Den is the coziest place on Eorzea, or your money back! We're a cozy cafe that offers one on one cuddle sessions with our lovely staff. Book one, just enjoy a treat, or even just come by to relax, all is welcomed!

name: Bar Downbeat
description: [18+] Bar Downbeat is a space for WLW to relax, chat about life, and flirt.
We aim to bring the feeling of a safe, cozy, intimate jazz bar where ladies and femmebys can truly be themselves.

name: Urban
description: This week, it's patch week, which comes with some stress. So Urban is starting off with a relaxing night. No dress codes, no rulesâ€”just relax and have fun.
We will be organizing mini-games and giveaways to treat our clients, as we always do, but this time in a more laid-back manner.

Let's grab a drink, hit the dance floor, and let loose as we celebrate the middle of the week in style. Whether you're here to meet new people, unwind after a long day, or simply indulge in the ultimate nightlife experience, our Pajama Party at Urban is the perfect destination.
Let's crank up the volume and make this Wednesday night an unforgettable one!

name: The Glam Closet
description: The Glam Closet - Crystalâ€™s Premier Glam Atelier and Boutique!

Looking for a new outfit for the upcoming season ahead? Need a look for your days off of adventuring? Looking for the right dress to wear to that Eternal Bonding Ceremony? Need something specially made? We have it here at The Glam Closet.

name: Rivendell Tavern
description: Rivendell Tavern is a medieval themed venue with an immersive medieval experience.

name: Geminus Massage & Spa
description: LGBTQ+ friendly! GM&S is a cozy and intimate massage parlor that offers SFW and NSFW massages for 500k gil/hour. Come by to get pampered or pleasured for an hour or two! We currently have 2 locations that each have 2 massage tables and 2 hot tubs, but are looking to expand as soon as the lottery system allows!
We also offer "after hours" appointments scheduled through our Discord server, as well as a VIP service for getting a free massage every month~
Please be aware that we do not hire or serve Lalafell or similarly-proportioned characters.

description: Event Horizon is a Space/Dark Theme nightclub with inspiration in space horror science fiction. For those coming from the Dark Nebula family it is a safe haven to kick back after a long and hard week. We welcome all and encourage everyone to mingle with us and have a great social experience while enjoying some of the greatest music that Eorzea has to offer.

description: Pages Pastries and Petals is a cozy CafÃ© and Bookstore where you can have a nice cup of tea, a cooling sandwich, pick up a new book to read, or just chat with staff and other patrons!

description: Pleasant and Inviting Atmosphere
With an open stage for any aspiring bards
Relaxing baths on our 2nd floor
We serve hot and cold revitalizing non-alcoholic drinks.
A place to go just to get away, to be alone, or to hang out with friends.

name: The Ascension Nightclub
description: Let yourself drift with the music of our DJs on the dance floor, get a cool drink at the bar, enjoy the thrill of a win at our gambling table, treat ourself to the comforts of our VIP area or have fun and relax in one of our private rooms with our dancers. Our DJs play a wide range of music styles for you so everyone can find something they enjoy. We also host a variety of themed events almost every week! So don't hesitate and come ascend with us every Thursday evening!

name: Meow Mix
description: We offer drinks, food, and company with our lovely staff. Come kick back and relax with friends or make new ones here with us!

For those in need of a well deserved Rest, a natural Cave-Bathhouse, a well stocked Bar with Drinks and Food of the Steppe and the Shroud, [SFW] - Massages administered by a well trained Staff and even shamanistic Practices like casting Runes, Dream Reading and more will await you!
Organized and maintained by the Claws and Horns Company, this Oasis of mostly untouched Nature is here to please and enjoy!
LOCATED IN LAVENDER BEDS, WARD 3, PLOT 28!

description: Safe Shallows is a bed and breakfast with a focus on being a getaway and family style venue. We offer a variety of rooms, sitting room, and an eatery.

name: Lavender Love
description: A gay host club for for men loving men (Sapphic women to be hired in the near future). Exists the possibility of NSFW

name: Clemency
description: *A welcome respite from an afternoon in the sun, Clemency offers everything you would come to expect from a sea-side venue and more.  Even if you skip the beach, you'll get the full experience with crisp drinks and seafood snacks without pesky sand getting into unwanted places.  Drift on by and wile your night away in this cozy spot.*

name: Starbuns
description: Starbuns serves the best corporate tasting coffee in all of Eorzea! Offering quality services like live bard music, art sketches and free WiFi !!

name: Azure Bar & Lounge
description: Welcome to Azure, a tranquil oasis-themed bar and lounge located in Coeurl Goblet Ward 4 Plot 34 and open every first and third Thursday of the month. Savor our hot food and refreshing alcoholic beverages while surrounded by lush greenery and cozy seating. Enjoy the talented bards who play live music to enhance the ambiance. Let us transport you to paradise at Azure.

name: Dark Desires Club
description: The Dark Desires Community is born for people willing to find more friends into the kinky world and lovers of latex clothing, respecting every member peculiarities, highlighting the differences because they are the most beautiful part of us! the venue itself has been funded by the members of the group, our events aim to create that cozy warm ambient where you feel welcomed in, come to visit us, even once, maybe u'll find your new group of friends!

name: The Graveyard
description: A goth nightclub with an immersive experience and dark music.

name: Heavenside Cafe
description: Heavenside Cafe is committed to giving you the perfect midday retreat. Coffee, Tea, Pastries, Breakfast, and a scenic view!
A part of Heavenside Manor: heavenside.carrd.co

description: come abouts "on the echoing green" -  an rp-focused cafe & pub for adventurers, wandering souls, & those seeking comfort in good company and good food! unwind at the end of your week (or the middle of it!) with a cup of tea, coffee, whisky, or any of our simple but savoury fare - let the wears of your days fade away behind the sound of laughter and good cheer "on the echoing green"!

description: If you haven't been to Archer's Den before, we are a lively bard concert establishment that encourages cheering, dancing, and a lil goofing around, although one is more than welcome to just have a seat and chill during the show! We also have multiple big prize giveaways every show!

name: Majo No Reibu
description: We are an 18+ modern pink-burlesque cyber witchcore fusion nightclub. Reminiscent of the masquerade and cyberpunk with a gothic twist, a duality you won't want to miss. LGBTQIA+ friendly, empathetic, and driven queer ownership. Our venue welcomes RP, ERPs, ravers and all to our sanctuary. Visit for wild raves, fashion contests, giveaways, themed nights, and so much more. Owned by DJ/Producer/VTuber RemmyDaWitch, Rem Samejima, and the Shark Lady, Mizuki Samejima, we aim to please. For those willing to risk it all partying with otherworldly sweeties, the Majo No Reibu is the place for mew â™¥.

name: Black Rose Lounge
description: A place of refuge where you can relax and have a nice drink to drown away your sorrows.
For the more adventurous traveler, there is an adult playroom and a mini spa, with an area to relax.. after ^^

name: The Crystal Rose
description: (RP-18+) Hello and Welcome to The Crystal Rose. This is a LGBT Vampire/Voidsent roleplay Leather Bar!!!! Hype. LB. W22 Arpt41 I want a place where Voidsent char and vampire chars can come and relax and be themselves

name: Wayfinder Tavern
description: We are a small medieval tavern ready to welcome all travelers and offer you a comfortable warm and cozy atmosphere!
We offer food drinks and an open stage for all!
We also have an active quest board where you can earn a small bag of coins for your reward!

description: Cactuar Cantina is a laid-back happy hour spot for Thanalan's commonfolk to drop in for a drink, grab some local gossip and a bite of regional fare. You'll find Lichyard Libations brand Nopales Moonshine produced in the ground floor distillery, and featured in specialty house cocktails downstairs. We also host a pop-up tattoo parlour, '1001 Needles'. Our barkeeps are a pair of chatty Lalafellin pals, bringing you "The friendliest saloon this side of the dunes!"

name: The Stardust Lounge
description: The Stardust Lounge is a dimly lit, Celestial experience that evokes cozy vibes where people can come and enjoy a perpetual starry night!

name: Hallowed Grounds
description: Hallowed Grounds is an ishgardian coffee house with relaxing atmosphere and music. It features ground floor cosy seating and a beautiful underground garden cafe.
You are welcome to come for a cup of coffee or hot chocolate and stay for as long as you like, with friends or on your own. Relax with us, read a book while sipping your favourite comfort drink.

name: Crystal Crossroads
description: Crystal Crossroads Premier Gambling & Auction House!

You have found yourself at Crystal Crossroads! Whether it be for the purpose of business or pleasure, we pride ourselves in being able to strike any deal you may desire. Come test your luck! You may make the deal of your lifeâ€¦or perhaps lose your soul! Get ready to strike a deal and possibly walk away richer than you started at Crystal Crossroads! We got Unique Gambling Games, Public Auctions, Eloquent Drinks, and a RP Environment you canâ€™t find anywhere else!

name: Lune's Fae Cafe
description: Lune's Fae Cafe is a little cozy spot that gives a little bit of Gridania and Il Mheg a home right here in Ishgard. We wanted a place where adventurers could warm themselves and enjoy something sweet and comfortable while they may be away from home. One can expect a warm welcome, variety in drink and foods, music some nights, and just an overall relaxing vibe to the place.

description: Looking for something cozy and relaxing? Are you tired of hunting primals all day, and just want to let out some steam and maybe enjoy some nice meal made by a professional sushi chef for dinner? Then MIZUMI is the right place for you!We provide the most delicious food in a relaxing far eastern atmosphere , where you can enjoy the company of our professional entertainers and waiters. Let yourself be served at the table, all you need to do, is lay back in comfort, and snap your finger to call one of our waiters to you, they will try their utmost best to make you forget about everything that happened during the day. If you fancy one of them, they can be even your extra dessert, or your company at the table.
We provide special services in the vip lounge, where you get extra entertainment and massages by our wonderful dancers, to not only please your stomach but also your body.

name: La Vida Loca
description: Eorzea's Premier Latin Nightclub opening June 2nd!

name: Leading Nowhere
description: Leading Nowhere is an immersive roleplay venue with a huge focus on providing a comfy space for all patrons. If you are looking for a place to bring your date, then sit by the booth and enjoy our wide variety of cuisines! For the brave ones, sit by the bar and undertake one of our many menu challenges! We also always have host or hostesses always on the lookout for patrons to RP with and involve in environment.

name: Paradise Nightclub
description: Paradise Nightclub is your number one stop for a great time and JÃ¤ger! With over 1 year of experience in the FFXIV clubbing scene we pride ourselves on our commitment to provide our guests with the best possible experience by providing various services and non stop jams every week. Each week we provide you with two openings on Wednesday and Saturday to give everyone the opportunity to come by and have a great time with us alongside some of the greatest DJâ€™s around.

All of us at Paradise hope that you can enjoy yourselves with us and brighten the week or send it out with a bang, you can find us at our large venue in the glorious Lavender Beds, we canâ€™t wait to meet you!

name: Dollhouse
description: Dollhouse is a Pink and Sparkly 2 year old venue located on Primal DC. We are a SFW venue, offering a full sweets bar, talented DJS and fun events.

name: Nightclub Unrighteous
description: Nightclub Unrighteous is a fresh 18+ venue with live music, bar, exotic dancers and gambling to enjoy throughout the night. Come and hit our dancefloor and enjoy cozy corners with good company! We are ready to deliver you the Friday feeling you really need.

name: The Cabaret Grand
description: Welcome, honored guests!
The Cabaret Grand is the plush pinnacle of style and roleplay, and our staff can't wait to delight you!

Kick back and relax with one of our drinks, or hit the dance floor with company.  If you're in the mood for companionship, we have an assortment of intriguing hosts and enthralling escorts to sweep you off your feet and give you the night of your dreams.
We are devoted to interaction, inclusivity, and riveting roleplay.  Come join us for a fabulous time!
Cheers, to the time of your night!

name: The Liminal Rust Tea House
description: A SFW RP tea house, with eerie vibes, which will provide you an unique experience. Get to know the teatender and his secrets behind the tea, and remember...
This is a Tea House, after all ðŸ™‚

description: 18+ Exotic Midnight club and Erotic Magazine serving you with tasty drinks of all kinds and live ð“œusic.

The best roleplaying companions and luxurious party palace in Lavender beds. Here to give you thotcore at the trendiest of times.â€œRpersâ€ of all skill levels recommended to stop by and share a taste of our yummiest playgirls in the house or just party with the playmates~

name: Nightbloom
description: Nightbloom is a long forgotten shrine to the lunar goddess Tsukuyomi. The radiance of her celestial majesty shines down upon these halls, bathing those who follow her will in a blessed light. Yet her whims are fickle, her divine radiance knows both pleasure and torment. Those who dare to deny her brilliance will find their world eclipsed in a torrent of carnal bloodlust, doomed to experience the agony of her loving embrace.

description: A relaxing cafe with chill vibes and friendly staff. We sell food, drinks, and snacks for anyone to enjoy while they take a break from their adventures. Open weekly on Tuesdays, 7-9pm EST.

description: PYRAMIDE is a cozy 18+ Nightclub with a grotto-vibe.

Enjoy your time with dancing, drinking delicious cocktails or just feeling the music with eyes closed.

description: Enigma is a (18+) Venue offering a beautiful sceneic and interactive experience. We offer open longue seating, a full photo booth, in-house Blackjack and a full dance floor with a bar for all your sweet indulgences. Come get weird. Welcome to Enigma.

name: Momo's Maid Cafe and Club
description: Welcome to Momo's Maid Cafe! We're a cute maid cafe by day, and a funky dance floor by the end of the night! Treat yourself to some warm pastries and delicious drinks while you dance along!~

name: Nova
description: NOVA is your premier destination that delivers service and quality in everything we do. Live music with Eorzea's top DJs, masterfully crafted cocktails and a lavish dance floor await you. Come for a nightlife experience out of this world.  Nova opens biweekly on Sundays from 6pm - 10pm ST

name: Phoenix Nights X
description: Experience the unparalleled rush of Phoenix Nights. One of the oldest casino nightclubs on FFXIV, we are dedicated to delivering a fast-paced, high-octane, and flawless gambling experience you won't find anywhere else. As featured in PC Gamer UK, welcomed personalities such as Preach & Zepla. Taste the new era of Gambling that has transformed the EU Gambling Scene, now in NA!

Our focus will be on fashion events to give everyone in Eorzea a chance to strut down the runway and show off their glams. We also feature a casino on the top floor for people who want to play with lady luck! Learn more about us by clicking on our website up above. We have a magazine that will also provide more information for our guests. The Blue Belle magazine highlights fashion, designers, Blue Belle and affiliated venue events, and more. You can find our magazine in the discord or on our website cardd.

Live music and DJs play within their halls to entertain their guests while their bar serves all manners of drinks from every corner of the twelve.  Hidden away from the eyes of the guard, its escorts provide warm companionship and warmer intimacy to their clients, taking them on wild adventures greater than anything Eorzea has to offer.  Won't you come and find your happiness within?

name: Midnight Mirage
description: Midnight Mirage is a 18+ LGBTQ+ venue looking to provide an immersive rp experience and supportive queer community to those who join us! Community rp events, immersive story, and over all fun rp experience for those interested in both nsfw and sfw side of writing. We offer courts, tarot readers, a fully stocked bar, as well as giveaways, raffles, and holiday events!

name: The Cat's Meow

name: Reign Club
description: We're a team of portuguese and english speakers with the goal of reuniting the brazilian roleplay community and get people together to party! Focusing on creating a fun place where players can interact, have fun and get to know everyone!
Somos um grupo de amigos com o objetivo de reunir a comunidade brasileira e aproximar pessoas com interesses em comum.
Focamos em criar um ambiente onde todos os jogadores possam interagir e criar laÃ§os.
Desejamos um ambiente alegre, de amizade, diversÃ£o!

description: The Bees Knees Speakeasy is a RP venue designed as a Cigar/Hookah lounge with a staircase hidden behind the bookshelf. Come by and have a drink or sit down at a table/booth and enjoy some food. All drinks and food are crafted from scratch using the freshest ingredients that we gather ourselves! Try your luck at our gambling tables as well! We have a live bard performance every week as well.

Open Stage
Starlight photo booth
Hours:

Introvert Lounge welcomes all types of adventurers to relax at our small corner of Eorzea. From very sociable, timid, reserved, raiders, crafters, sprouts, anxious, and the lot of the different mix of adventurers!!! Bards and Tarot readers are welcome as well

description: A cozy tavern tucked away in the Black Shroud welcoming adventurers of all types. There you will find SFW RP in an immersive, but still relaxed atmosphere, good company, and an owner who would be honored with your presence!

name: Bunboy Hooters
description: â™¥ Bunboy Hooters is a venue employed entirely by male vieras, ready to serve you! â™¥ We are RP and AFK friendly, so feel free to stop by if you wanna chat or just vibe to music.
â™¥ When we're open we'll almost always have food, drinks, bards, courtesans, and gambling.

name: The Cosmic Star
description: The Cosmic Star, looking to serve everyone from all walks of life. Come relax in the upstairs lounge or go downstairs and listen to some music while you sit down at the bar and have your favorite drink and food. Here at the Cosmic Star we hope you'll find what you need to turn around a bad day or end a good day with an even better note.

description: Moonshine is modelled after a traditional host/hostess club where we aim to entertain our guests and help them unwind after a long day with food, drinks and excellent company!

description: Dragonfyre is an immersive upscale lounge offering a variety of drinks and food prepared fresh daily. In the basement is a different story. Under the posh furnishings of the upstairs lounge lies the Dragonfyre Arena, home of the Ultimate Dragon Fighting League. Every second and fourth wednesday's are fight nights where members of the UDFL fight it out for prize money while the patrons can bet on individual fights on the card. On non fight nights the downstairs will be treated like a club for patrons to dance and have fun.

description: Do you want a place to sit back and relax? A place with life music, drinks and company? Come to Midnight Echoes!

Come and enjoy our weekly mini events or themed nights. Live Bard music and if you want to take the stage just ask any of the staff. A rich lore setting. Are you new to RP no worries we welcome players of all levels. Just want a beautiful place to relax well check out the bathhouse.

The Sapphic Scale is for those who identify or present as female! We allow non-binary characters as well. We request no male characters join the venue, thank you!

name: The Ludus
description: The Ludus, IC, is a high-class bordello that'll serve even the seediest of folk if they have the coin.  Owned by Aurelie Jeausaux, an Ishgardian Noblewoman, she's keen to keep the folk of the bordello safe and happy even as they pay off their debts. Little do most know that the establishment has deeper, darker connections.

name: The Dancing Dhalmel
description: Your destination for more than just the Bee's Knees!  The Dancing Dhalmel is Aether's top spot for trivia and conversation!

name: Fangtasia
description: Fangtasia Is a Darker Themed Vampire owned Strip Club (inspired by the bar in True Blood), We strive to bring you the darker dirty feeling of a Strip Club and all the blood, gore and feedings you desire. Here at Fangtasia, Life begins at night.

name: Paradise Mansion
description: House Parties galore! Come chill at my home from time to time, see you there!

name: Churro's Burro
description: Anyeonghaseyo yeorobun!! Churro's Burro is a totally daebak KPop-inspired club and cafe, located in Primal - Lamia - Mist - W27P4 and they're open Fridays from 9PM - 12AM EST. Be there and enjoy totally delicious music and food. Let's get it.

name: The Temple of Lakshmi: Battle & Story Hall
description: SFW 18+ Dice-based (grindstone-style) combat RP. Advanced ruleset also available. Challenge the temple priest for the chance to win fame and fortune!
Walk-in challenge 7pm-10pm EST(GMT-5); Challenge by request (/t Broken Tree@Mateus or mssg on discord) 10pm-12am EST (GMT-5).

name: Club Dote
description: New Venue On Dynamis!

name: Love-Craft Lounge
description: The Love-Craft Lounge is a goth themed bar that love-crafts specialty cocktails and spirits just for you. Grab a Franken-stein or a Te-Kill-A-Sunrise while you relax in the hot tub or dance the night away. We hope our services and Boo-ze will have you howling with delight as we strive to give you one Hell of a night.

name: The Wishing Star
description: The Wishing Star is the place to make all of your dreams come true! Our Medium lounge/bathhouse offers a verdant experience, where you can make new friends and have some fun! We've got Tarot, a 50/50 Raffle Every Monday, and some fun events coming in the future!
Hope to see you there!

name: The Inkwell
description: The Inkwell is an open RP venue designed to help bring people together, while providing them a place to relax and enjoy a nice, warm meal.  Ran and staffed by an ever-expanding crew of artists, rogues, sweethearts, and otherwise generally 'silly' people, we aim to keep you entertained during your visit. We often have live music, fortune telling, and very... interesting bartenders.

name: The Velvet Moon
description: First established in 2017, The Velvet Moon  Tea House is a haven for thousands of adventuring Eorzeans, providing somewhere to relax and unwind after a long day. Building on our years of experience we offer something for adventurers from all walks of life and can satisfy any variety of tastes.
We have tables available for booking, as well as booths for a more private experience.

name: Hawk's Nest Cantina
description: An immersive, themed roleplaying lounge, hangout for adventurers, sky pirates, scoundrels, privateers, and treasure hunters. Located in the basement of the Tenshodo Outpost Company and serving the finest New World and La Noscean cuisine, rugged enough for a night on the town but classy enough for a quiet evening for two.

name: Fox Hole
description: Station WSLY First Saturdays on FFXIV are live DJ sets for Station WSLY City Pop Radio! Groovin you through the 70's and 80's of Japan! Every month we have special events online and everyone is invited!

name: The Fallen Angel
description: A dark themed nightclub with a fully stocked bar. Come on by and enjoy a drink or snack from our unique menu and relax. Enjoy the live music and let the atmosphere take you!

name: Paradox
description: A place to call home!

name: Lost Dragon Tavern
description: A small and relaxing tavern hidden amongst the trees in the Lavender Beds. We offer food, drinks and games to weary travelers as well as an open stage to all performers.

name: Meowran Host Club
description: Cozy, overgrown lounge/hangout. Bar included, limited food and drinks available, specializing in SFW Host services.

name: Mono's Delivery Service
description: Want food delivered but too busy adventuring? Need supplies to run your venue but delivery fee's too expensive? No fear, Mono is here!With her magic broom and abilities, she can deliver what you need fast and fresh that you don't need to worry about it.Ranging from food delivery, supply runs, even help move from one venue to another; Mono has it all to help provide your needs.----Mono's Delivery Service is a roleplaying delivery service venture run by Mono'sono Glu'tame on Brynhildr. This delivery service is open to any and all venues in the Crystal server.

name: Nightweather Bathhouse
description: Welcome to Nightweather, a luxurious bathhouse for our guest to relax, have fun, find love, and companionship.

name: Sapphire Reliquary
description: A dance club front to a criminal neutral ground, we operate both as an interactive dance venue and a place for criminally-minded individuals to seek connections and peddle their wares. Founded with the intention to promote RP connections within the community, we offer both a Heavy RP focus as well as a busy club vibe for those who just want to enjoy the nightclub scene. We do not offer any private services and no real gil changes hands. However, our staff is always seeking out patrons to RP at and involve in the environment.

name: Silver Garden
description: The Silver Garden is an open social space for small or large events, or for simply hanging out. RP is welcome, but not required. Feel free to come and chat, or just mingle.

name: Red Moon
description: Red Moon is an LGBTQ+ 18+ RP venue that focuses on an immersive, welcoming environment for all to come and enjoy themselves. We've been operating since July 25th, 2020. Our mission at Red Moon is to provide a service to the community - whether it's the Red Moon community itself or the venue-going community as a whole. We want to provide a place for people to come to where they'll feel welcomed, noticed and loved.

name: The Helix Nebula
description: We are an LGBTQIA+ non-profit speakeasy venue and our purpose is to promote love, inclusion and good vibes of positive energy. We book events every Wednesday alternating between Galactic nights [genres from DNB, Techno to Bass & Hardcore styles] and Darkness nights [genres from Goth, EBM, & Aggrotech to Metal and Industrial styles] to grant a safe place to come vibe, dance and chill. Our club is home to resident DJs The Missing Peace, Claire/Ai & DJ Nautilus.

name: The Locker Room
description: Simple chain spot offering breakfeast and these hands

name: The King of Cups
description: A pop-up tea & tarot cafe offering a custom menu and in character tarot readings.

name: Eden Hall Hostess Club
description: Modeled after a traditional hostess clubs, Eden Hall Hostess Club provides a relaxing yet entertaining atmosphere. Enjoy our bartenders at the bar, relax in the lounge with our SFW Hostesses while listening to our wonderful house bards, participate in our competitive Aether Chocobo Racing League with sports betting, or enjoy blackjack at our gambling table. (Open since December 2020)

name: Faerie Social Events
description: Welcome to the FSE!
TLDR: We are a group of nerds who host events.

Faerie Social Events was created to host events for all to join regardless of FC. We are excited to host a variety of events both in game and off, spanning a bunch of topics like Scribbl.io, Drinking Nights, DnD, and some old fashioned fun like Golf with Your Friends.

Our In Game Events are often surrounding holidays, and take the form of Celebrations of such. The events comprise of things like Hide and Seek, Trivia, Costume Contests, Musical Chairs and our most popular event type, Art Parties.
We run events at 8:30pm on some Saturdays and some Thursdays. Please take a look at our discord or website to find when we are open!

name: Dream Nightclub
description: We're a super colourful and sugary Nightclub, aiming to spread the love and provide a beautiful atmosphere by offering you great music, great gambling services and a great time! Come on down and spread the love

name: XFC XFIGHT CLUB
description: Eorzea's largest RP fight arena & community located on Adamantoise, featuring large fights on the hour, chaotic ambiance, bar, betting, raffles, & giveaways. Theme Seasons with Champions now crowned.

Our main feature is our signature fights on the hour, allowing any and all visitors a chance to fight in our arena each round on top of the opportunity for patrons to make profit as victors or through bidding & raffles, Or earn your way in to Fight and become Champion. Single's and Tag Team Titles.

name: SONG Lounge
description: Welcome to SONG Lounge! We have live DJs, colorful cocktails, immersive hosts, top-tier gambling, and relaxing tubs! Jump in the elevator to be brought into our one-of-a-kind lounge.

name: Amaurot's Utopia
description: Welcome to the golden days of Amaurot. Never was a casino more magnificent. From the humble slots, to the heighted blackjack, she fairly gleems.
Take a break from peace and contentment, let your soul live for the moment.
Give into want, and let our creation magics provide you with an entertainment gaming experience like no other.
So pray not to primals, but to lady luck, as we weave reality to provide you a premium entertainment gaming experience, like no other.
So come enjoy life as an Ancient, and "remember" the pleasures of Amaurot's Utopia.

name: SHIFT
description: A posh underground bar and lounge. With a fully stocked bar and staffed with lovely companions to make your night as enjoyable as it can be

name: The Tranquil Tempest
description: The Tranquil Tempest is open every Wednesday for restaurant-themed, casual RP. Located near the Northeast Aethershard on a large plot in Shirogane, The Tranquil Tempest offers oceanic dining in a variety of settings. Join us downstairs for our upscale, aquatic restaurant or on the main floor at Koi Pond: our bar and grille. We also offer an outdoor cafe space for brunches. A full-service bar and a well-stocked kitchen are what we promise. We enjoy making peoples' nights! All food and drink prices are in gil, and you will receive an in-game item when you order. Tips are appreciated, but not required or expected. Come enjoy our atmosphere and make some new friends!

name: Paradox | Club & Casino
description: Premium gambling & nightlife experience. Come enjoy drinks at our expansive bar, dance the night away with our DJs, and try your luck in the casino! Casino games include: Black Jack, 3-Card Poker, Darts, Roulette, Slots, and casual Gamba Drinks.

name: Club Minx
description: Our venue will be a nightclub and is still in the making! We are currently working on it and will start recruiting staff soon!

name: The Anti-Social Club
description: The Anti-Social Club is an 18+, high-energy venue located on Primal. Sit back and relax among the far-eastern and rainforest-like ambiance. With alternating music themes played by live DJâ€™s weekly, there will definitely be something for everyone to enjoy. We always have giveaways throughout the night so you could walk away with some awesome prizes. Bring a friend and enjoy our bar, dance the night away, or partake in some gamba; We canâ€™t wait to see you!

name: The Devil's Den
description: *Everyone has his own hidden desires...wishes...dreams...*
There is a place, that all those call a home, who decided to live with their desires.
Enjoy the experience of our hell-themed RP- and Clubbing-Venue, offering you the darkest beats, an immersive clubbing experience, the best service hell has to offer and much more.
*So hold on to your soul carefully...while entering the Devils Den.*

name: Amatsu.PNG
description: Phoenix Photo studio with multiple booths inside, Looking for inspiration but its hard to think? Check out my booths! I'm sure one of them will definitely catch your creative eye.

name: The Floating Otter
description: We are a wholesome RP inn and bathhouse for everyone, no matter if you are an experienced RPer or new and curious about the scene. We offer our guests a comfy dining and bar area with a variety of dishes, dessert and drinks that are all free of charge. Our main attraction however is what we call the â€žbathing coveâ€œ where people can float in the bathtubs and spend a chill and relaxing evening in company of other guests and our staff members. We also offer two rooms for rent, if guests desire a more private environment and want to relax away from the open areas of the inn. For our premium services we are offering a paid GPose service to our guests so everyone can take a nice picture of them and their friends home with them. Besides that we have a bard playing for some hours each night who also takes requests from a wide range of different songs. If we made you curious feel free to contact us ingame, on Discord or visit our homepage under https://thefloatingotter.carrd.co/#

name: PandÃ¦monium
description: Welcome to PandÃ¦monium, a host and night club based in Siren. We're here to offer a space where you can take a break, listen to some tunes, grab a drink or two, and RP to your hearts content! Modelled after a traditional host club with some cafÃ© aspects, our main goal is to make everyone feel welcomed and help them to have a grea time. Come join us!

name: Taya's Tea Cozy
description: Currently under hiatus, and changing locations.

name: The Warded Ring
description: A Doman fighting venue with an Eastern fusion menu, signature drinks, and a ward system designed to keep you from missing work the next day.

Nestled in the high reaches of a quiet Shirogane ward is a Traditional Doman estate belonging to Nightingale Company, a group of adventurers and mercenaries who have developed a ward system specifically for testing and honing one's fighting skills, no matter the persuasion. With sparring rings and fighters alike warded, all are invited to go all out without fear of sustaining lasting, serious injury. So come on by to eat up, beat down, and drink it all in!

name: Senshur family CafÃ© and Bar
description: Senshur family CafÃ© and Bar is a pop up venue that has no set schedule and is AFK friendly, we are based out of Lily Hills sub division, w14 room 37, it has a Bard, beds for those who wish for a rest, and a barkeep who will cater to your needs should you want something specific!

name: FALL Nightclub
description: Fallen angels - Demons and all you other dark creatures! Unleash your demonic side and come to us...
FALL Nightclub is a dark fantasy inspired nightclub, known for its hard vibes - Hardstyle and from time to time EDM & Metal are on the agenda!
Let's create unforgettable moments together and party all night!

name: Rhotano Vale
description: A colorful cafe at the edge of a chilly Ishgard, Rhotano Vale is meant to create warm memories and comfortable vibes. ...With a side-helping of antics, of course.

name: The Golden Leaf
description: The Golden Leaf is Miss Kayla Angel's Goldsmithing atelier. From here, she crafts beautiful jewelry pieces, and other shiny baubles and trinkets, commissioned by some of Hydaelyn's pickiest clientele.

Thanks to an expansion in land and business, her boutique and atelier also feature a small cafÃ© and bath house in the cellarage, where she appreciates the company of her friends and the public alike, and enjoys tasty treats cooked by her shy but talented retainer, Lumine Igri.

[The Golden Leaf is a relaxed, welcoming, and Immersive Roleplaying venue for roleplayers new and old, experienced and inexperienced alike. /say RP is heavily encouraged, and help and advice are always happily given! We welcome you to take a seat, enjoy a hot bath, snack on some treasts, and chat to staff and patrons, making new friends and getting involved in weird happenings along the way!]

name: Vicarious
description: ðŸŒº ***V***icariousðŸŒº is more than just a place to come /beesknees and forget. We want to provide a social experience through interaction. Be it at the bar or the dance floor, we want to give you something extra. Come live vicariously through us.

name: Den of Sin
description: The Den of Sin is an adult entertainment venue catering to members of the LGBT community. We have a stage for our dancers with a lounge to enjoy the view. For the right price, many of our dancers are available to take home for the night.

name: The Moonlight CafÃ©
description: Need a cozy place to relax after adventuring? Maybe a coffee on the way to your next adventure? Come and sit a spell at The Moonlight Cafe! We welcome those who would prefer a more immersive RP experience or those simply looking to relax and unwind.

name: The Kat's Meow
description: The Kat's Meow is now open, and ready to offer our services to people looking for... something more in life. Guidance, long lost information, or maybe even a helping hand in finding your path, we will do our best to help you find what you need, like:
- Our library of books and tomes features tons of information, stories, legends, and countless other things that will be sure to satisfy your needs.
- Our divination services will help you find answers and advice to all your biggest wonders and worries.
- Our potions and tinctures will help you achieve whatever it is you will, and provide the right tincture for the right ailment or need.
- Our trinkets, lockets, sigils, and spell jars can be made for any need, unless morally objectionable.
- Our homemade teas and treats are a wonderful way to treat your self after a long day of adventuring.
(Disclaimer: All items are RP only, we don't actually trade items or accept actual gil, except for tips if you enjoy our services.)

name: The Lucky Lizard Adventurer's Guild
description: The Lucky Lizard Adventurer's Guild invites all adventurers, freelance or otherwise, to our tavern!  Whether it's work or relaxation you seek, we aim to facilitate and provide those things respectively.  Our establishment offers a multitude of thirst quenchers for you to sip on while you check our bounty board for work opportunities or if your prefer, check our roster of lovely companions to spend the night off with.

name: Caffe Al Banco
description: Newly renovated public hot springs and teahouse for casual(SFW) RP, relax/chill, or AFK. The baths are self-service, but complimentary towels are available with purchase of beverage(no gil required).

Please do not bring your own food downstairs; boiling eggs or noodles in the baths is not permissible as this will disrupt the natural mineral profile and potentially damage our the whirlycog system in which we pump our water.  Please be courteous to other patrons and enjoy your stay!

name: Kurahashi Kitchen
description: Eastern-themed SFW cafe venue where you can enjoy a delicious meal in a calming and hospitable environment. At Kurahashi Cafe, we want you to feel like you're being welcomed into an Eastern home's kitchen and enjoy meals with your friends and loved ones.

name: The Green Gaelicat
description: Well met and well come, traveler! The Green Gaelicat is a family-owned bakery and tavern. We are a relaxed RP venue with an underground tavern vibe. We love telling stories and are excited to hear yours! Come inside, take a load off your feet! RP is welcome, but not required.

name: Repose
description: A cozy little cafe in the hearts of the Lavender Beds.
Come in and enjoy warm snacks and hot drinks.

name: Project XIV
description: __**P R O J E C T  XIV COMMUNITY**__
**About us**

Project XIV is a Nightlife/Social Event Community that is based in Europe. Started off as a FC, then after awhile becoming a Community. We host Events mostly on Chaos sometimes also on Light, rotating with our Events in our big variety of themed Venues to give our dear Community/Patrons a nice change ;3

Our Goal? Well.... it was and always will be to make memories, make new friends, give everyone the chance to socialize and get to know new people...new friends!  We are looking forward to have you at one of our Events and Discord â¤ï¸
Join our Discord Community to stay updated with us...or just to hang around ;D
**Links:**
Discord: https://discord.gg/projectxiv
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/projectxiv_events/

name: the Escort lounge
description: A classy, yet comfy lounge with a full bar, Dancers, and plenty of space to relax and meet people.

name: Wonderland
description: We are a blend between hype and RP. A place that everyone is welcome and we strive to for those who do come to feel as a part of our family.

name: The Sleepy Nomad: Pizza Pop-Up
description: [Last Thursdays of the month, 8:00 p.m. to 11:00 p.m. Eastern; Pop-Up theme cycles monthly]
"Come in and stay awhile."

Drop by The Sleepy Nomad for a special pizza pop-up, and wind down with friends featuring chill music and a relaxing atmosphere. ðŸŽ¶ Pick from specialties, or create your own, and benefit more with a discount upon the inclusion of a specialty drink.
Gil's IC only, but tips are accepted.

name: Dilemma Night Club
description: Welcome To Dilemma Maduin's Newest Night Club. We are just starting out. We have a resident DJ,  DJ Yuyu much love to him. We have a fully stocked bar with the cutest Miqo that runs it ( She knows who she is ). We do giveaways and will have gamba soon. So if you have nothing to do on Friday nights or want to party more come check us out!

name: Sunrise Springs
description: Welcome to Sunrise Springs; A 21+ Hwavy rp venue.

Looking for a fun night out, or maybe need to relax after a hard earned victory then look no further! Our Springs situated outside has an onsen with built in adjacent bath-houses, outdoor brick oven with a grill master ready to make food to order, and a much smaller bath-house by our buildings entrance designed for a more personal soaking.

Inside is our CafÃ©/Bar Room area boasting a broad hand crafted menu with tastes from around the world! Our drink list is also rather diverse ranging from strong saki and weak ale to a calming tea or coffee, we also offer juices that can also be served fizzy or slushified. Feeling brave? Step up for the Pheonix Fire challenge; drink the world's strongest shot to get your name on the wall!
The upstairs loft lounge is reserved for smoking *anything* and table games, as well as a stage for performers!
Beyond the bar is reserved for employees as the door leads to the owners office where more delicate business may be handled.
Through the use of NPC's  the springs are open 24/7 and we aim to have player ran events.
If you'd like to join the Sunrise Family as staff you can apply within or contact the owner!
((PLEASE NOTE SUNRISE SPRINGS IS NOT A VENUE FOR ERP))
<https://sunrise-springs.carrd.co/>
<https://discord.gg/pB4XsxHHjq>

name: Polarity
description: Clubbing - as it originally was!

At Polarity and Obsidian Spire alike, we are all about the return to the original days of clubbing: Just great music, great friends, and great memories in a place you can call home! Pure and simple fun.
All our services are completely free of charge. Food and drinks are always on the house.

While we do have a VIP lounge, you will never be charged to use it and anyone is welcome to go anywhere in the venue they like at any time since we believe everyone that comes to our house is a VIP already.
You won't find gambling, courtesans, giveaways of any kind, or any other service as a money making venture.
At Polarity and Obsidian Spire, we believe, no, we know the fun comes from you. So bring the fun with you and let's party!

name: Moonlit Kiss
description: Moonlit Kiss is an 18+ high energy Night Club that does tons of fun theme nights, cosplay contests, giveaways and promotes a high energy party hall type of environment with lovely dancers, hype squad, and bartenders.

name: The Temple of the 12 Delights
description: Join us for the grand opening of Siren's first 21+ M/RP recreational substance use lounge! Herbs, tinctures, drinks all to imbibe plus risky games of chance and delightful company are all waiting for you at Siren,Goblet,w10/p20

name: Pink Lantern
description: Pink Lanterns main goal is for everyone to have a fun and good time! We love music, entertain and most of all fun and happy vibes.

Our nightclub have a lot to offer: Great drinks at the bar, if you feel a bit lonely we have some dancers to keep your company, some more private dancing too if you fancy that too *wink* and of course some gambling!
Come and join us at Pink Lantern, have a drink, a little chat or something extra â™¥

name: Paradise Restaurant
description: Come to Dynamis own Paradise Restaurant now at a new location. Fine dine and enjoy amazing music with a date or on your own your sure to be pleased at Paradiseâ€¦

name: Scully's Lair
description: Come down the steps past the velvet rope to enter Scully's Lair- your weapons are useless here. A midtempo and dark drum and bass centered nightclub, there's no limits when you're in the lair. Lose yourself to the music, become one with the rhythm. You're home.

name: â™¥ PiNK PANTHER LOUNGE â™¥
description: Eorzea's finest hideout! No, wait- it's NOT a hideout! It's a lounge. Yeah, Eorzea's finest lounge and totally NOT a hideout.

Come relax to a great ocean sunset and enjoy the finer vices of life! Full bar, full menu, full frontal- we look the other way so you don't have to. Enjoy the entertainment, or be the entertainment. Just remember, there's riches to be found, and Tons of friends to light your way.
...but there's no one hiding here. Cross my heart.

name: Hotel Obsidian
description: The doors of Hotel Obsidian are opening for you!

Whatever your desires are, these or others much more obscure, the Obsidian Hotel is ready to welcome you. In this place, the rules and the judgement of society are suspended and our Staff is eager to satisfy your requests and will guarantee an unforgettable stay!

name: The Poison Grotto
description: Run by an inherent night owl, The Poison Grotto features a downstairs bar & lounge where guests can let loose and unwind after a long day and or week.Dancing? Drinks? Food? Drinks?! We have it. Getting overwhelmed and need a more peaceful type of relaxation? Lucky for you, The Poison Grotto operates on duality. Take some time and relax in the peaceful atmosphere of the ground floor.If you're looking for an interesting experience, why not give our drink roulette a spin?

name: Blue Miqo'te
description: One of Eorzea's finest musical and roleplay venues located on Goblin, Blue Miqo'te is an upscale, musical and performance hall establishment with an atmosphere one can relax in after a long and busy grind.
Sporting two levels, a large bar, novel stage design, and performance focused seating.
Open Mic Nights are every Tuesday unless a special event or guest is planned.
Open bi-weekly on Saturdays!

name: Riptide: Siege of Seas
description: Do you have what it takes to conquer the seas? Test yer wits in this strategy board game. Out maneuver your enemy or beat them down into the abyss. Fight to claim the oceans bounties for yer own.

name: Ohana lil'cafÃ©
description: A cozy and modern cafÃ© in CHAOS - OMEGA => EMPYREUM [ W11 - P52 ]. With surprising floor for ephemeral and/or mature events.

name: Cloak N Smoke
description: Cloak N Smoke was originally opened as a lounge with an open bard stage in Lockstep Ailoss' apartment. Cloak N Smoke was named this way because it was a hole in the wall venue that was cloaked behind other venues. Smoking is akin to relaxing/stress relieving and Lockstep wanted this lounge to be a place where people could come relax, be stress free and enjoy a good time.

name: High Tide Lounge
description: Just a small Mist lounge where you can kick back and relax with a good drink and good company.

name: The Golden Ring
description: Primals Premier Nightclub & Auction House. Featuring lovely ladies, high class auctions and a unique club experience. Come make your night one to remember.

name: Ace High
description: Ace High is a modern, elegant feeling Casino & Club that has the primary purpose of putting the Patrons first.

name: Club Aethereal
description: Dance the night away at the Aetherial Sea's premier 18+ dance club. Drinks, gambling, and a variety of adult services all brought to you in a sleek Crystal/WoL-themed venue! We aim to appeal to both casual rp and the more hardcore rper by providing an immersive bar/club experience.

name: Shivaâ€™s Embrace
description: Shivaâ€™s Embrace
(Light - Twintania - Empyreum - Ward 3/Plot 56)
Date & Time:
Every Friday from 7:00 PM to 9:00 PM ST
Roleplay Type:
Immersive RP/Casual RP
Event Description:
Shiva's Embrace is a SFW tavern inspired by the masonwork of House Dzemael, combined with the flair of the Skysteel Manufactory.

We welcome you to come in from the cold of Isghard and warm yourself in our halls with a warm beverage while enjoying our live bard performances. Donâ€™t forget, our staff love a good story, and we eagerly await the tales of your adventures.
We are open every Friday from 7 PM to 9 PM ST.
Carrd:  https://shivasembrace.carrd.co/
Discord:  https://discord.gg/FNzSW2PKtq

name: Seventh Circle
description: Welcome to hell! Seventh Circle is a Metal/Industrial-focused nightclub themed around the 9 circles of Hell from Dante's "Inferno". Our aim is to provide you with not only great music and a hell of a party, but also an RP experience that's as casual or as immersive as you want it to be.

name: Mogheart Tavern&Bathhouse

Step into a world of tranquilityðŸ’§ as you indulge in our luxurious thermal baths, designed to soothe your body and rejuvenate your soul. Immerse yourself in the calming ambiance as talented musicians captivate your senses with captivating melodies and soulful rhythmsðŸŽµ .

name: Sureli Sisters Cafe
description: A cafe that endevours to ensure a cozy and calm atmosphere.

name: Wet Wonderland
description: get wet and dance! or chill.

name: Roommates

With one lies a forgotten Realm, rises a Mithra with a passion and drive to return to her Star, bringing those who wish with her. Enter Vana'diel's Lost, a cafe and shop bringing her Star to you. Vana'diel's Lost was founded by Annichi Molkot with a desire to bring those within the Star of Hydaelyn to a fraction, a shard if you will, of Vana'diel. This venue is aimed for RP-ers new and old looking to escape the Star of Hydaelyn and to the one who started their loved game, for those who migrated from XI to XIV a place to reminisce about those times past, to ask questions about Vana'diel all over tea and assorted meals.

Join us Saturdays and Mondays for exciting themed events, along with our resident DJs including DJ Potate, DJ Swage, DJ Rof, DJ Kaen and our very own DJ Aemilia!
We offer a dual-themed venue, VIP programs, and have amazing staff that will make sure your visit to the life hereafter falls nothing short of perfection!

The Rubdown (Room 5 of venue): Nature themed massage parlor with 3 different services available from our massage therapist; Clothed Massage, Naked Massage and Table Shower. (open during venue hours)

name: Lunalis
description: We are a Japanese-Inspired Nightclub and Bar Venue. We draw heavy inspiration from the moon and modern japanese interior design. You can see our inspiration in areas like our stage, the stars we have scattered around, our main color scheme, and more.

We are a semi-new venue. We were previously known as Eastern Paradise but, that doesn't have much of a ring to it, does it? We all made the decision to rebrand into Lunalis, along with completely stripping and redecorating the venue 3 times! And spending lots of money on new furnishing.
We hope our efforts are visible to you, and that our little venue is a wonderful experience!
So, come visit Lunalis, and bathe under the Moonlight with us!

name: Pandemonium
description: This Wednesday Pandemonium welcomes you to "DEFCON.1 Survival of the Sexiest", celebrating Lunar Cry's one-year Twitch streamer birth day! Get ready for an unforgettable night of sexy hardcore energy.

Pandemonium will be transformed into a pulsating paradise, where intense beats and electrifying vibes reign supreme. Our top-notch DJs will create a mind-blowing soundscape that will keep you on your toes all night long.
Indulge in the seductive allure of our enticing entertainment zones, where you can unleash your inner desires and embrace the fusion of sensuality and hardcore fun.

Dress to impress in your sexiest hardcore attire, blending provocative and edgy fashion to express your unique style. Join Lunar Cry's Twitch community as we celebrate this milestone event in a night that promises explosive energy and non-stop dancing.
Surrender yourself to the rhythm, embrace the sexy hardcore vibes, and prepare for an unforgettable experience!

name: The Emporium at Greystone House
description: The Emporium is a shop where crafters, gatherers, and customers can meet to purchase and sell goods through RP and tax-free commerce.  But perhaps you are a housing designer or venue owner looking for some supplies for your venue? Maybe you are new to the Disciples, and you are looking to network and help build your trades and learn new tricks. Whatever your journey is, we are here to help at The Emporium.

name: The Bazaar
description: The Bazaar is a hannish themed shopping center.The venue provides a variety of entertainment, retail shopping, leisure and social role-play opportunities:
Glamour Apparel Shop
Toy Store
Dye store
Crystal Shop
Tarot Reader
Fine Dining Restaurant
Onsen
Movie Theater
Raid Food/Pots Store
Hookah lounge
Furniture Store
....and more to come!

name: The Aurora
description: Small venue giving people a chance to create their own. Blank venue pick your own theme.
We host bachelor/bachelorette parties, birthday parties, and wedding receptions. Speak with Bo Stash!

name: Bae domain
description: A new and chill atmosphere Cactuar, run mainly by bunny girl!

A lot of bunny girls and bunny boys like to hang out at the venue, but everyone is welcome! We also have NSFW and SFW dancers if someone needs companionship. Our specialty drink is bunny milk, and we have egg nog and Hot chocolate made from bunny milk.
If you want to feel extra special become a Bae VIP, offering you use of our VIP booth, 50 minutes of dancing per week, use of our bathhouse and free bunny milk!

name: Steak N' Greet
description: Build with a cozy, warm, and causal friendly in mind. Steak N' Greet welcomes you to come to experience a relaxing dining experience. Whether is dine alone, with friends, or with families, everyone is welcome to enjoy a  good time. We provide the fresher and finest ingredients to all dishes that are up to your standard taste. If you are not too hungry and just want some good drinks to go around, we also had a variety of beverages to choose from. Everyone is welcome!

name: Wondrous Tales
description: Wondrous Tales, a truly one of a kind - live storytelling experience where your ideas come to life. Picture this: an author conjures a whimsical tale right before your eyes, skillfully blending your suggestions into a mesmerizing narrative that is both captivating and delightfully peculiar.
Immerse yourself in the soothing ambience of our venue, perfect for an enchanting evening of relaxation and wonder.
And remember, to fully enjoy this unique experience we encourage you to arrive on time!

name: Terminal 6
description: Originally Demon Dice, Terminal 6 is one of the longest running clubs on Primal. Resident DJ's/Owners are Jojo Ohemgee, Booty Wigglin, and Baby Marshmallow. T6 is primarily focused on music! Other services are random depending on staff that are passionate about running them including, Auctions, Bar, Giveaways, etc.

description: A subsidiary of The Aether Entertainer, hoping to provide a comfortable place to read, relax, or chat with the press staff. The cafe' was created with the intent of promoting The Aether Entertainer press and the featured venues or individuals each publication. During opening events, we hand out the latest newspaper early and serve warm beverages and baked goods. Since the topics we cover are ever-changing, so too will be the themed events we host here!

notices.message: This venue is open the last week of the month on the listed night.

name: Club Moon
description: Welcome to club moon where you can come dance under the moon and stars while listening to great music.

name: Sleepy Dragon
description: Sometimes life can be a little hard.Empires to fight, monsters to defeat, mischievous Moogles ...Sleepy Dragon is a cafe focused on mental health that offers a place to relax your running mind, and maybe help you getting a little bit of sleep.

name: Crystal CafÃ©
description: The Crystal CafÃ© is a nice cozy spot to come relax in while sipping on a nice hot beverage or enjoy a scrumptious snack. We welcome all to come by and visit, whether you come by yourself or with friends.

name: Club Vice
description: â™¥Welcome to Club Vice â™¥
Club Vice is a 18+  venue with a dance area, lounges, private rooms, a bar and a VIP area.
We have several Twitch DJ's to bring you the tunes to dance onto or for relaxation.
Our music is mostly EDM/Dance and the harder sounds like Hardstyle and Hardcore.
RP Is highly encouraged! Come and experience!

name: Sailor's Paradise
description: Welcome to The Sailor's Paradise! A Pirate Themed Tavern where people of all kinds can come together for some seafood and a drink. Mermaids are Especially Welcome! Lalafells get free headpats!

name: Green Witch Glade
description: Green Witch Glade is a mystical and enchanting venue that exudes the magical ambiance of a secret glade hidden deep within a forest. The space is designed to transport visitors into a realm of enchantment, where the old ways of magic are honored and celebrated. In our Glade, we offer delicious drinks, tarot reading, music, herb consultations, fun magic potions & more! Come join us and to find solace and connect with nature, a peaceful retreat from the stresses of everyday life.

description: Your one stop location for good vibes and beach parties. We specialize in providing a comfy night club experience that features a live dj with every session. Immerse yourself in the sick underground beats or find solace in the cool oasis of the beach with your friends and loved ones!

name: Casa Del Soul
description: Casa Del Soul is a hip new place to vibe and have fun! Music! Casino! Theme Nights!
'Guest' Services! Dancing and the best staff in Eorzea! Come by for a drink, a friend, or a place to have a blast!

description: We are a mostly FC operated venue that focuses on a mid day relaxing point for others! We offer everything from drinks, to paid services with our lovely courts, and much more!

name: Starbuns
description: Starbuns is a relaxing, cafe venue with live bard music and cute baristas!

name: Sweet Obsession Bakery
description: Located in the beautiful Lavender Bed, resides a secluded bakery known as Sweet Obsession. Freshly baked goods and drinks are provided with warm and safe environment while accompanying an open stage to bards. Open every Sunday.

name: Club Lunar

name: Korova Milk Bar
description: We are delighted to invite you all to the grandest celebration of the summer season, the Festival of Light: Summer Solstice! Mark your calendars for June 21st, 19:00 to 23:00 Server Time Ragnarok W29 P10 Goblet!

Don't miss out on this unforgettable celebration of light, warmth, and friendship. The Festival of Light: Summer Solstice promises to be a joyous gathering for all residents of Eorzea. Bring your friends, your guildmates, and your adventurous spirit to make this event truly magical!
Prepare to dance the night away as we announce the addition of two incredible DJs to our event: DJ Dommie and DJ Teacup!

name: The Menagerie
description: *Requires pre-booked appointment via our Discord.* ðŸŽŽ
If you follow the sounds of a trickling stream, nestled and hidden within the bright lights of Thanalan, you will find The Menagerie â€“ a uniquely immersive RP venue.

Fresh lacquer, the sweet scent of newly woven tatami mats, and the warmth of a smile welcomes those that choose to step through the door. For those who are seeking something special, you'll find a haven of beauty and exquisite skill.

Itâ€™s where an exclusive, hand selected few have been trained as Geisha and Oiran for the pleasures of our esteemed guests. Tea Ceremonies, Fan Dances, Horoscopes and more...let our special jewels give you an intimate experience you wonâ€™t soon forget.

description: Come join us at DÃ©jÃ  Brew CafÃ© for a cozy wonderful evening of robust RP, good food and drinks (both coffee & cocktails!), and a wonderfully unique Astrologian themed venue! Find a place to sit, chat with your fellow Eorzeans, and enjoy a warm cup of tea while you share stories of adventuring or get a tarot reading from the owner, Vrin! Whatever you're looking for, there's a little bit of something for everyone.

name: The Silver Duck
description: An immersive RP venue located next to the beach in beautiful Shirogane - The Silver Duck offers entertainment and fellowship to Eorzea's adventurers.

Get ready to indulge in our renowned signature drinks while immersing yourself in the finest music around. Upstairs, you'll discover the charming VIP area, complete with brand new cozy sofa seating and an expanded stage, all set to host your favorite bard bands from across Eorzea!

As if that weren't exciting enough, we're delighted to introduce our sparkling new Discord server, designed exclusively for our cherished friends and guests. Swing by and explore all the wonders we have in store for you! We can't wait to welcome you with open arms and create unforgettable memories together.

name: Demimonde Apothecary
description: Apothecary, Soothsaying and Dabbler in the Dark Arts
Bespoke solutions for all of your adventures into the Neverwhere and beyond.

name: The Afterlife
description: The Afterlife is a bar venue, made and inspired by the same bar from Cyberpunk 2077. The bar has a Cyberpunk theme, with many references and slang thrown around from that universe. A great place for those who want to incorporate a Cyberpunk RP into their life, or enjoy all things Cyberpunk. A great venue to relax on a Friday night with friends.

name: World's Edge Tavern
description: Our Venue is a Roleplay focused Adventurer's Speakeasy Tavern.
You may sit inside or outside, that is your choice but you can choose from a variety of foods and drinks on our menu.

name: The Iron Rose
description: The Iron Rose is a kink / BDSM centric venue which seeks to provide a fun experience that both educates and elevates, straddling the line of different worlds drawn from the collective knowledge of our staff. Come on by and have a drink, or an entire encounter, so long as you remember consent reigns...
Needless to say, visiting us is an 18+ affair.

name: The Last Request
description: Cozy and classy, with just the right bit of morbid humor mixed into it, The Last Request is a place you would want to go before you start a new chapter in your story. Whether it is a farewell dinner with a good friend, a late-night dinner before you pass out for the night, or your last meal before you set off to fight a minotaurâ€¦The Last Request is here to fulfil your ermmâ€¦last requests.

name: Carby Cafe
description: Welcome to Carby's a nice relaxing chill Carbuncle themed Cafe where you can have fun and meet new friends

name: Under the Moonlight
description: Under the Moonlight is an RP heavy social lounge venue that hosts a variety of services; a fully stocked bar, nightly RP-based entertainment, general SFW, and NSFW RP, to name a few. We have monthly reoccurring events as well as extras dabbled in where we can. All of them are centered around RP and feature our engaging and delightful staff. Things can get a bit chaotic sometimes, but we work very hard to be open and welcoming to all walks of life and RP experience levels. We would love to see you grow with us!

name: Down Under Cozy Lounge and Bar!
description: The Down Under Cozy Pop-Up Venue is a chill place for adventurers and bar-hoppers alike. With a small, but friendly and accepting staff, we are open and welcoming to people from all walks of life.

name: The Vessel
description: Night club, exclusive shops, and flea market.

name: The Revenant
description: A small, cozy and immersive cafÃ© that offers a place to hang out or afk. Downstairs, you can find the adventurers lounge where you can hire them to do your bidding! or perhaps someone to join you on adventures?. We offer a friendly environment for all.

name: Black Cat
description: Whether it's after a hard day's work or to spend a pleasant evening, with friends or to meet new people, the Black Cat Bar will open its doors to you and its jazz atmosphere.

An intimate but comfortable bar where you can enjoy a wide range of drinks, including the famous coffee that only the owner has the recipe for, as well as small dishes made with love that will warm your heart and soul.

description: Relaxed nightclub atmosphere, live DJ, substantial VIP packages, inclusive and heavy roleplay compatible environment! description: Located at Empyreum's Ingleside tower, we are an SFW establishment on Jenova offering our patrons both immersive and casual RP. In addition to our tavern services, we also offer an open stage and an in-house portrait artist (when advertised). Thanks for giving us a look, and we hope to see you soon!

name: Vier'amour Host Club
description: The Vier'amour Host Club, located in the magnificent city of Ishgard, is a relaxing refuge where tired travelers may unwind, sip Ishgardian Tea, and socialize with their favorite Hosts/Hostesses. Purchase a booth and get endless free treats and beverages, buy a sketch from one of our respected hosts, or just have some enjoyable conversation.

name: Tales CafÃ© & Library

Our Staff would love to recommend and share short readings for your enjoyment.
Tales is strictly SFW.

description: Embark on extensive journeys through Eorzea, where captivating locations, rich history, and fascinating fauna and flora await. Wether you prefer to enjoy a relaxing ride in the Chocobo Carriage or would rather mount up with your friends, there's plenty to explore and discover!
Let me show you the beauty and wonders of the world as while we travel. I would be delighted to have you as my companion on this adventure ^^

description: Hottest New Club on Crystal! Open Select Saturdays!
Come hang out at Hotbody Haven for some Hot Vibes and Hotter Folks!

description: Calling all Sharlayan citizens, ex-pats, or interested parties! The Sharlayan Collective is a group of Sharlayan citizens dedicated to furthering their pursuit of knowledge. Join us every other Thursday where we open our doors to new members and meet with each other on a drop-in basis! Are you a researcher with a budding thesis? Perhaps a student trying to get into the Studium? Or maybe a Gleaner hoping to find untapped knowledge? Whatever the case, all interested parties are welcome for an intellectual RP experience! Please check our website for this week's location!

location.override: Location varies. Please check our website for the location for the week!

name: Desert Rose
description: The Desert Rose Club is an exciting venue that runs on Friday nights from 5 PM to 2 AM ST. The theme of the event is centered around the best music from the 80s, 90s, and 2000s. With great music, fun-loving people, and a relaxed atmosphere, the Desert Rose Club is the perfect destination to unwind, socialize, and dance. The club features experienced DJs who know how to get the party started and keep the crowd dancing all night long. If you're looking for an amazing night out in a fun and welcoming environment, be sure to check out the Desert Rose Club.

name: Lizzur Lounge CafÃ©
description: The Lizzur Lounge CafÃ© is one part of a double venue dedicated to providing a relaxing and immersive coffee shop experience for our patrons. Light RP is encouraged but not required!

*The barista shuffles off behind the counter again with your order - the clinking of plates barely audible over the jazz musician's lively trill. You take a deep breath and bask in the warm aroma of freshly brewed coffee.*

Top-tier live music, great vibes, and a strong sense of community are what sets Vibe House Nightclub apart from the rest of the crowd. We have one purpose: provide great vibes and great tunes with DJs and performers that you know you love.

Our resident DJs include some of Aether's top entertainment: Liluyeet, Swage, DJ Potate, DJ Gremlo, DJ Fluxt, DJ ThisWayUp, DJ Fluxt, and DJ Bunnychan to provide the most bumpin' beats Eorzea has to offer late-night.

Guests can expect a mix of ramen classics and fusion ramen creations from the lead chef's imagination. The staff strive to provide excellent customer service and a welcoming environment for all roleplayers.

Paintpot has been designed to offer a place of respite for anyone who may stumble upon it, whether its a catch up with friends or some wind down time, Paintpot's doors will always be open to you.

Shine Bright as a Star and Enjoy the company of our lovely entertainers! Seek the Embrace of the Stars, at Galaxy Nightclub!

description: The fire burns bright here at Club PYRE. Come put the spark back in your night! Enjoy our drinks at our bar or see what awaits you upon the dance floor.
