description: Just a small little cafe for you to spend some time relaxing in after a long day or before a busy evening!

name: Null and Void
description: Youâ€™ve heard whispers about this place. Youâ€™ve might have seen notes swap hands on the busy streets of Uldah, found a cryptic message on a shipping manifest in Limsa, or a carved symbol on a less traveled grove in Gridania. Standing outside of it now, you are greeted with the same symbol that has haunted your travels leading you here to this place.

It appears so mundane, so normal â€“ that for a moment you truly wonder if the fuss youâ€™ve made to get to this point is all in your head. Perhaps, it has all been errant dreams and this journey has been a misguided foolâ€™s errand. Still, youâ€™ve come this far and while it isnâ€™t too late to turn back the draw of the unknown outweighs your better judgement, and you turn the handle.

(Null and Void is a neutral ground for supernatural creatures to interact with adventurers like yourself. With an emphasis on story and roleplay, N&V is an immersive venue that explores a variety of themes. Our hosts have the primary focus of providing quality, interactive roleplay to further develop your characterâ€™s story as well as their own. You will find a variety of different creature types among our hosts, and nothing is quite like what it seems.)

name: Cafe Blackjack
description: Cafe Blackjack is an upscale establishment located on the hills of Mist. We offer our clientele a selection of different tax-free games, such as blackjack and slots. We also have a full service bar and cafÃ©, featuring a cozy fireplace that we invite you to curl up in front of if you need a break. On our main stage bard performances are provided for your enjoyment by â€œPurrfect Hairum'' and â€œThe Ryoka Sistersâ€ Listen to their set from one of our dining tables, or watch them from above on our second floor balcony. No matter what type of evening you are looking for, our staff strives to ensure that guests have a memorable and comfortable experience. We look forward to having you with us!

name: The Birdhaus
description: Welcome to The Birdhaus! We are a commmunity-focused, SFW, immersive roleplay noodle bar and cafe located On Sargatanas in Ul'dah's Goblet residential district! Join us for welcoming atmosphere, friendly faces, live music and amazing Doman and Far East inspired dishes! The Birdhaus offers RP meals, bartended drinks, snacks and a entire host of fun activities in the rotation including triple triad tournaments, tarot readings, chcobo racing events, mahjong nights, glam contests and more!

name: Femboy Hooters
description: Femboy Hooters a fun restaurant venue experience where you can be served food and drink by some of the cutest femboys you can find in Eorzea!

name: Abyssal
description: We're a chill venue for people to come drink out with friends, vibe to some beats, or just party it up on the dance floor. We welcome all members of the community, whether you're casual to hardcore Rper, or just someone who likes the venue scene. So what are you waiting for? Come peek your head inside and seek what awaits. Our friendly staff will be glad to welcome you.

name: Honey Bee Inn
description: Life can be harsh but we can make it oh so sweet!

One of Crystal's largest immersive roleplay venues, we offer RP services and live performances along with special events every month! With over 90 staff members, there is always something for everyone, whether you're looking for casual conversation or more sultry services.  Not only that, but our prices are some of the lowest on Crystal and we cater to players of all skill levels, not just the veterans.

Our staff are made up of seasoned roleplayers and newcomers alike, all of whom are happy to interact with anyone, regardless of your gender, race or sexuality. At HBI, it's not about the bookings but enjoying a night of fun filled roleplay! We feature one of the best VIP programs which includes having a room at the Inn decorated to your specific tastes as well as a drink that you design added to our menu!
Whether you want to write the night away with one of our talented staff or just want to people watch as the yellow and black dances around you, HBI is the place to be!

name: Senpan Tea House
description: Senpan Tea House is a tranquil tea house tucked away in a quiet corner of Lavender Beds, allowing warriors and wanderers alike to relax as much as they want, for however long they want, either with their companions or by themselves.
We believe that everyone deserves to have peace, quiet, and a good cup of tea, and so our philosophy is to never bother our guests during their most needed and well-deserved downtime.

name: Honour's Rest Tavern
description: A refuge away from the cold, blistering winds of Coerthas. Nestled within the great city of Ishgard, Honour's Rest serves as the home away from home for the weary traveler.

Be you a long-standing warrior, a humble adventurer, or a simple passerby, you are always welcome to rest your weary blade, and enjoy good drink, good food, and good company, at Honour's Rest, where honour never rests.
Open every second and fourth Friday of the month! 9pm-12am EST!

name: Lunarium
description: Alternative nightclub & cocktail bar nestled in the heart of the Lavender Beds

E6 is an RP bar with a focus on m/m, but all are welcome to come hang out!

description: Welcome to the Love-Craft where we love-craft spirits just for you. We hope you howl our praises and not Boo our service, as we strive to give you one hell of a night. Have a Franken-stein or a Whiskey Werewolf! We are all dying to see you! Fangs for coming!!!!

description: Ten no Ji is a lounge set into an old Hingan mansion. The sordid history of the estate has proved to draw in spiritual activity and Yokai presence. This lounge looks to boast a flavorful Hingan experience down to the dÃ©cor, drinks, and food. Our hosts are always looking to stir up conversation and entertain you with story and games. Just beware the spirits which haunt these halls, the darkness of the corners, and the glare of the man who spirits call 'lord'.

name: Witchvalve Manor
description: The Witchvalve Manor is a potion factory selling strange wares with a mystical steampunk and magic aesthetic, which offers in-lore illicit solutions to literally anyone and anything, welcoming the supernatural and weird. If forbidden magic, alchemy and technology sounds like something your character is interested in, the Witchvalve Manor is your new home. Welcome to the gateway of the underground, what's your story?

description: The Sprightly Spriggan is a welcoming tavern located on the outskirts of Ul'Dah. It boasts an outdoor gathering area and stage as well as a cozy interior suitable for hanging out with friends or meeting new ones!

description: High Class, High Sass. Chase your dreams, nightmares, ambitions, and fears in luxury, but be careful; beneath the decadent decor might just be more than you asked for.

name: The Dark Office
description: Welcome to the Dark Office !

name: Studio 31
description: Studio 31 brings the drinks.
Our downstairs, the red room, brings the nightlife.

name: The Herb Garden Apothecary
description: This little apothecary shop sells all sorts of herbal and herb-inspired wares. Feeling sick? Maybe you just want some delicious and healthy tea? Stop by and talk to Ariawyn to help ease your woes.

There's also a wonderful seating for the cafe outside, along with its own baths that look out over the waterfall, and lake behind the Overlook Inn! We also have rooms for rent as well with their own private bed and bath!

description: Asahi Supermarket offers an immersive in game shopping RP experience, complete with a department store downstairs and a functioning cafÃ©. We also have a beautifully crafted motorcycle on display so be sure to take her for a spin!

description: Your premier one stop shop for all scaly needs. Be they to mend a broken heart, help fill a roulette party with with style, fill that last minute call in at your venue, or vibe! Tonight we will be having 25m raffle with lots of goodies, Dj Invis vibes, plenty of Ra, commemorative gpose! <3. Please feel free to come on in, vibe, gamba, and dance the night away!! https://rent-a-rallc.carrd.co/# https://discord.gg/uE83RzMR

name: Infinity Casino
description: Welcome to our casino, where entertainment and fun can be found in every corner.

Fancy some gambling? Choose from any of our games: Blackjack, Hold'em Poker, Russian Roulette, Slots, participate on our LIVE Wheel of Fortune, get a Tarot Reading or test your luck with our Infinity Drink at the Bar for a chance to win 2,000,000 Gil! Looking for the big bucks? Participate in our Gold Saucer Challenge where you can win the accumulated pot during special announced events.
An amazing private experience is awaiting you and your friends! Reserve one of our private rooms with your favorite dealer â™¥

description: At some point, an expert Bounty Hunter grows tired of the standard-issue Company-sanctioned marks and seeks out greater challenge, greater danger, and greater thrill. Mettle & Bite opens its doors to you.

This is a welcoming space focused on camaraderie, but due to the nature of the work, dark or mature themes may arise. The tavern is open once a week on Saturday afternoons for immersive, character-driven RP designed to connect hunters with hunters, making new contacts and new relationships.
Once a month, weâ€™ll host a live, lightly-GMed Bounty Hunt.
This is an 18+ venue/server, IC and OOC both.

name: Eben's Toy Kingdom
description: Welcome to Eben's Toy Kingdom!
Looking for stuffed toys?
We got you covered!
We have something for everyone! Wether you want to come hang out at the shop,browse the toys or just come say hi to eben!
Hope to see you there!

description: Club Trance is a cyberpunk-themed nightclub located in the heart of the Mists on Sargatanas, Ward 13, Plot 15.  We offer premium curated music via Twitch, a fully-stocked bar and gambling offerings.  Drop in for a unique experience youâ€™re unlikely to find anywhere else!

name: Secret & Sin
description: We are the dark void of Gothic. Feel your body beat with our music stream. Let yourself drawn into a place where you can drop your mask and unleash your true self.

Please feel free join our Discord server to engage with our community @ [https://discord.gg/dRmhen3HDV]

name: The Moist Tip
description: This evening, enter our walls and open wide for the â™¥ï¸  â–ã€The Moist Tipã€‘â– â™¥ï¸ !!

The [18+] HOTTEST PINK and POPPIN' nightclub venue on Gilgamesh that's so moist, it'll leave you DRIPPING in GIL and DANK DRINKS! Slip into our judgment-free, welcoming to all humble abode and treat yourself to a fully loaded bar, gambling, and dancing!

name: Panini Plush Palace
description: The Panini Plush Palace is a toybox themed sandwich shop that's friendly to kids and adults alike! Feel free to let your inner child (or your outer child, if you happen to have one of those) roam free. We also do party games!

name: Bluemoon Nightclub
description: let yourself be guided by the glow of the Bluemoon and dive into the world of BlueMoon Nightclub with a relaxed atmosphere of good music, looking for fun or just to switch off all you should have is fun â™¥

name: The Blind Pony
description: A lovely little cozy cafÃ© located sea side in the Mist. We are RP, SFW and LGBTQ+ friendly. Come and take a break from adventuring or hunting with a nice hot cup of tea or espresso. Feel free to grab a treat while you are here as well. If you need a place just to relax please stop by.

name: Tipsy Teavern
description: Ruby Sea Exports is home to the Tipsy Teavern where you can have a Eastern and tea inspired drinks straight from the Far East. A Bar/Lounge/Restaurant to spend your nights with good company.

name: Royal Revelry Bar
description: A quiet night in Ishgard, there are lights in the distance. As you approach the doors you hear the faint sound of music and chatter of patrons. As you walk in the marble bar calls to you, a slew of cocktails lined up. Under the red and blues of the Revelry, you find all sorts of people. Scholars to Adventures and everyone inbetween, come together for a night of revelry. In this bar we encourage you to relax, chat and dance. No matter how you want to spend the night, it'll be one to remember.

name: The Waking Lion Cafe & Bistro
description: The Waking Lion Cafe & Bistro is a new and improved upgrade to the old Waking Lion Cafe. Bigger Venue, more seating, more chances for spooky relaxation! Locating in the Goblet residence of Thanalan, this black lace and low light goth inspired dessert cafe is reopened with a larger assortment of coffee's, cakes, and an expanded comfort food menu including some unique regional dishes rotating every week! Something still yet lurks below in the new venue, just present with the question, ||"What is the music of life?"|| to any staff member to have your access to the basement reserved!

name: Somdaze Rest
description: Just a casual place to unwind after a long day. Have a meal or just a drink. Listen to some great bards playing on our Open Stage. Meet up with old friends or make some new ones.
Looking to learn what tomorrow holds, speak to Isooni, our Tarot Reader.
We strive to provide excellent service, good food, and a relaxed atmosphere.
"No gimmicks, no strings, no pressure".

name: Afterlife
description: Home base of Cross Data center  Goth event Afterlife.  An abandoned Goth club where once in a while its  doors open for a night to  recapture lost memories as well as create new ones. Activities :Fortune Telling , Riddler  game ,  Live Goth/industrial/EBM/Sythpop/Futurepop/ Agrotech  music and Drinks.

name: Club Shodo
description: Welcome to Club Shodo, the peaceful outlet of Shiroganeâ€™s most powerful Yakuza Clan - Clan Shodo. Not to worry though, you will be safe here, unless you misbehave, or deal drugs, or smell wrong, or dislike Lalafells. Otherwise you will be perfectly safe and there are absolutely NO illicit activities going on here..

In all seriousness, Club Shodo is Venue by Raidenâ€™s Clan Shodo. A community that want to bring a mixture of Roleplay and Classic Night Club themes to you. What makes us unique? Regular roleplay events as well as supporting up and coming new DJs whenever we can.

name: DEAD RABBITS
description: Nightclub and Casino +18. DJs, dancing, drinks, and dice!

name: The Green Ivy
description: The Green Ivy is a Tavern and Bathhouse. We have a bar, 2 tubs to relax in, lofts to hang out on, and an open bard stage!

name: Echo
description: Open space +18 hotel/nightclub venue on ffxiv for events. Place is created in the mind of being an open space for basically anyone to self host their own events for free. If there ever comes a moment "there is no place open right now but our group feels like partying on", Echo is a place where you can take your party group to continue. Entrance floor has lobby bar setup with open stage for bard performers. In the basement there is a small nightclub setup with open stage for DJ performers. Venue will be looking for freelancers to work at the venue for the self host events and the events of the venue itself.

name: Club Kolat
description: If venues had a soundtrack, Kolat's would be a mix of musicâ€™s past, present, and future with cuts of different genre's all blending in perfect harmony. Explore the Kolat Nightlife, see a Kolat Show, and dive into Kolatâ€™s diverse entertainment offerings. With music and entertainment around every corner, friends and family can enjoy the sounds that make this club your nighttime destination.

Whatâ€™s your pleasure? At Kolat, you will find an intoxicating variety games and denominations, friendly dealers and a stylishly exotic â€“ yet always comfortable â€“ atmosphere that will enhance every experience. Fast, hostess service makes it easier to concentrate on your next move. New to gambling? Thereâ€™s no reason to be intimidated by the actionâ€¦ our gambits are happy to show you how each game works and soon, youâ€™ll be playing like a pro.

Kolat gives way to many quality entertainers in a relaxing and exotic atmosphere that you could almost call home. The Aether LB locale packs the house with the steamiest entertainers in the land. In house is a VIP area, with a view of the large main stage. And let's not forget that the VIP packages offer quality entertainer discounts.

name: The Odder Path
description: The Odder path is a free venue meant to feel like a mid range price restaurant, not apple bees quality, but not fine dining either. Like a place people would have a nice birthday dinner in because it's better than apple bees but it's not so expensive that it would break their bank. Services at the moment include dining in the lower floor, and a small bar near the entrance of the plot, but eventually once I get more funds I eventually plan on getting a bard to play music.

name: The Laundry
description: Eorzea's only Laundromat and bar. It's that weird place where you can wash your trousers, drink poison, nap in a cuddle cage, and bathe with other patrons. Play out the strangest of scenarios and discover the supernatural oddities Laundry hides, or just come and watch the chaos unfold. Sometimes we host secret tub parties where all sorts of things can happen in the late hours of the night!
Clothing is optional â™¥

name: ChocoKisses
description: â™¡ â™¥ï¸ Maid Cafe â™¥ï¸ â™¡ offering custom polaroid shots with your personal maid's signature on them, lovely performances from or adorable maids, yummy, high-quality foodies to share, and amazing songs from our bard-san.

description: With a focus on the arts, Carina's Heart is a SFW 18+ lounge with live music by talented bards every Friday night! We are a Roleplay friendly lounge, but this is not required by our guests and patrons. We offer monthly VIP perks, and an open stage in our after hours Heart Beat jam! Come stay awhile and listen. We look forward to serving and entertaining you!

name: Club Vamp

name: The Burgundy Room
description: The Burgundy Room is a multifaceted performance troupe and venue operating within Final Fantasy XIV. We produce and perform a mix of drag, dance, and theatre.

Since itâ€™s establishment in 2018, The Burgundy Room strives to push the limits of what is possible in the art form of complex in-game performances with synchronized audio. Our troupe members LOVE what they do, and spend hours upon hours honing their craft!
We open on the last Saturday of each month at 7:30pm Eastern.

Like stuffed toys?
Like cafe's?

All our staff are super kawaii, if they're not, you will be given all your kawaii money back. We hope you come and be kawaii with us. KAWAII.
Also we have a 2-way petting zoo.

name: Fairylight cafe
description: Welcome to Fairylight! Please feel free to enjoy our cafe where we offer sweet treats and teas from various regions. if your looking for a spot to sit down with a good book or just pass the time, our library is open to all!

name: The Fury's Hallow
description: Open the first and third Friday of every month! â—ˆ The Fury's Hallow is a heavy, immersive roleplay venue focused on roll-based combat. Established in November 2022, the venue is set in a lore-abiding environment within the High House districts of Ishgard, framed as a repurposed manor where the basement has been transformed into a duel tavern and respite for weary adventurers who seek to test each other in combat. Whether you wish to step into the arena to challenge an opponent, enjoy a selection of Coerthan fare and drink, or explore the rooms of House Luvese, we look forward to crossing paths within these hallowed walls.

description: Hello! Welcome to the Lazy Diamond, a cozy, moody retreat to refresh and relax after a long day of raiding and adventuring!

name: Carbon
description: Carbon is that space between places, an alt club which specialises in Synthwave, Synthpop and EBM. A space which opens for those DJ's, new or experienced wishing to provide music within Synthwave, Synthpop and EBM. Its built, on clean sleek lines.. concrete flowers and desert yellow.

name: Souls Amisithe
description: Your eyes grow heavy as your breath grows feint. As darkness washes over your vision before you suddenly jolt awake to the sounds of jazz and the clinging of glass. As your eyes adjust to the light at the end of the tunnel you see a barkeep dawning a friendly grin with your drink waiting. Welcome to Souls Aimsithe, where our hosts will guide you to your saol eile.

description: Halone's Rest is tucked away in the high mountains and cold, unforgiving Ishgardian Winter. We have a hot spring and full service bar to fulfil your needs, and an unforgettable staff!

name: The Verdantwalk
description: A mystical lounge with food and drink in a verdant setting to help unwind the mind. plenty of seating for friends and folk alike including hot springs next to a stage for live music.

name: Club 175
description: Club 175 immerses you inside a high-tech, underground drum and bass nightclub built in the ruins of a post-cataclysmic Eorzean city. Itâ€™s more than a small venue, itâ€™s a clubâ€“a crossing over point, where DJs, artists, and our friends can share in the challenge of trying something dangerous, exploring new avenues, and pushing our limits, all while having a great time in excellent company. Come dance with us!

name: Jenova's Witness
description: Jenova's Witness - An immersive, |SFW| Speakeasy located in The Mists offering a safe environment to discuss businesses of all sorts where ears do not pry and is run by the local Mafia. Drinks, Food, Chatter and multiple facilities offer an immersive experience under this very legitimate estate!

name: Desert Rain
description: (18+RP) A Thavnairian-themed Hookah Lounge, where you can come relax and unwind while enjoying authentic drinks, cuisine, and shisha flavors! Enjoy our fully-stocked bar, gorgeous dancers, lovely courtesans, and our themed photobooths! Come adorn your Inner Senses at Desert Rain!

Our doors open every Wednesday night from 9PM-12AM EDT with a live DJ, bartender, dancing and more! Join us for a great time to hype, relax, vibe and chill. We can't wait to meet you, so stop on by and LET'S GOOOO!

We also feature a full bar, VIP, and Primal's first dispensary, HiLife, if you want to take your club experience to another level! Open 2 Fridays a month so please check our discord for updates on when we're open!
We welcome to you to your Friday night joygasmâ™¥

name: Scandal
description: https://scandalaether.com/
18+ only
Blackjack & Hold'em - Courts - Bar - Live Djs
GIVEAWAYS
8 Hours of Sin To Have Your Very Own Scandal With

name: Oin's Oddities
description: Local bodega, leather shop, comission and RP hub

name: Mogs & Meade
description: Once Upon Time....there was a call out to Adventurers young and old, of all sizes and rank. They came, they saw and now Mogs & Meade is a venue to be in the Lavender Beds! Taking up residence on plot 1, ward 28 in Brynhildr on Crystal, this venue is always learning and growing. Reaching out to make new connections and friendships. After all, once you step through those doors, you're family.

name: Abyssal
description: We're a chill venue for people to come drink out with friends, vibe to some beats, or just party it up on the dance floor. We welcome all members of the community, whether you're casual to hardcore Rper, or just someone who likes the venue scene. So what are you waiting for? Come peek your head inside and seek what awaits. Our friendly staff will be glad to welcome you.

name: Hypnotiq
description: Hypnotiq is the latest venue from Zero Management. We are a high class club providing services likes bar games, casino, dancers, photography. Come check us out!
