description: The Blue Poring Casino offers interactive games of chance using in-game skills and housing sets. RP-friendly, open weekly on Saturdays with live bard ensemble music.

name: Kittenz
description: Welcome to Kittenz Striple Club, den of all things lovely~!
Classy erotic lounge and card den with a relaxed and fun atmosphere, only the highest quality of courtesans, home of Striple Triad, providing gambling, and live bard performances every night.
- Monthly Striple Showdowns for 35m gil in prizes!
- Giveaways every 30 mins on Sunday nights!
- Frequent fun events!
- Worthwhile VIP/Royalty packages!
- Naked bartender!
Always in for a good time when the sun goes down and the kittens come out to play!

name: Four Lord's
description: A Hingan inspired lounge with all the comforts of the East.

name: Eternal Euphoria
description: The moon is high in the sky, shafts of moonlight peak through the canopy. Off in the distance the children of the forest play, they laugh they sing the dance the night away. Further and further you walk thine vison clouds as a dense fog hides all. You barely make out an arch of tree roots, seeking shelter you hide in their embrace only to find....Euphoria. A place where the Fae rule all the drinks never end and the Euphoria is Eternal

name: REALM
description: Music. Games. Community. This is what REALM represents. We are located in the heart of Crystal @ Malboro - Shiro - W9 - P16. We offer a luxury environment, unique and original games, weekly events, amazing staff, and some of Eorzeas hottest DJs.

name: The Wanderer's Reprieve
description: Adventurer's hub and pub with a fighting ring - blow off some steam with your fellow adventurers, or grab a drink and enjoy the show!

name: Foxxiesâ€™ bar & grill
description: A killer pop/rock cafe with super fun drinks that will send you flying for more! This cafe is great for afk, rping, and just a cool place to meet some new people!

name: Morpho
description: Morpho is a nightclub venue located in the lush woods of Lavender Beds. Expect to be met with high energy, talented DJs and exciting auctions each and every week!

name: Infernals Night Club
description: Did you ever want to take a stroll in the pit? Infernals brings that essence into our realm. Happily run by two demon sisters, you're guaranteed to get an authentic experience... We promise not to sacrifice you.

name: The Free Rose Tavern
description: Amidst the cold of Ishgard you stumble across an unassuming tavern. The image of a pudgy puk adorning the signage, accompanied with the scent of hearty meals and roses, beckons you inside.

The Free Rose Tavern is a SFW venue focused primarily on RP. Casual RPers, hardcore, and even people just looking to hang out in a pleasant atmosphere are all welcome. We hope you feel at home when you visit us.
Come perform on our beautiful open stage, or listen to our in house bards. Learn about your future, past, and present with our tarot readers. Visit our website for more information.

name: Dryad
description: The realm of the Dryad invites you to their night of magic and wonder. Join us every second Monday and be greeted by our wonderful team at our mystical Forest-Themed Nightclub!

name: Fire Phoenix Nightclubs
description: Fire Phoenix Nightclubs is a club with two locations and different offers and stands for varied theme nights, live DJs on site, as well as dancer services and lots of entertainment. Here everyone will find what inspires him. Whether it's a cozy get-together with friends, swinging your hips on the dance floor, relaxing in the pool or sampling ice-cold and excellent drinks at the bar. Everything is possible! You want to see for yourself? Then come by!
THE DAWN - Light - Shiva - Goblet - Ward 2 Plot 5
THE CORE Light - Twintania - Lavender Beds - Ward 22 Plot 36

name: The Plume: Luxury Kitbar & Spa
description: We are an immersive RP venue that welcomes its loungers to enjoy the upscale commodoties of Ul'dah with soothing baths, an exceptional sauna, relaxing music, and Oasis cuisine!
This venue is clothing optional, but nothing sexually intimate is allowed (no ERP); and above all else, absolutely no shoes in the bath space!

name: The Tender Tonberry
description: The Tender Tonberry is a SFW Venue/Lounge dedicated to bringing our patrons an authentic and relaxing roleplay experience.
Casino? Bar? Restaurant? Dance Floor? Stage? We have all the things of a venue but with a twist.
Come find out our dark secrets. Witness what lurks beneath the floorboards.
Pray to the Great Tonberry in the Sky. Accept him into your heart and you shall be blessed. Bask in his glory.

name: The Underbelly
description: Have you ever wanted a place where you and your friends of dubious employment could kick back and be served a nice, hearty meal or a cold, frothy drink by a gruff Roegadyn tavern wench while staring at kitschy pirate crap on the walls? What if told you your dreams could be reality? The Underbelly is an illegal pirate tavern, housed underneath a totally legal bounty office. Check the Discord for this week's open times. Come hungry, thirsty, and if you've got a bone to pick and don't want your hands dirty, ask about posting a bounty!

name: The Eagle
description: [18+] Inspired by the real-life leather bar in NYC, The Eagle is open for fun and pleasure in our very own Eorzea! Enjoy our industrial setting complete with dancers, courtesans, and a fully-stocked bar. Dance the night away with our DJ RoboticDreamer, and when you're done dancing, you can cool off in our public showers. Choose your flag color in our discord server, join our Mare sync-shell, post screenshots of the night, and enjoy a truly authentic night of debauchery with us!

name: La Veela
description: Tucked away on a scenic corner of the Goblet, La Veela lays in wait for you to come greet her! Enjoy a drink at the bar with our charismatic and loveable staff, gamble to your hearts content at the Blackjack table, dance until your feet go numb alongside our bard and dancers, maybe even find your destiny in the cards with our esteemed tarot reader! There is something for everyone here at La Veela and we can't wait to meet you.

name: Coffee & Tease - A Lingerie Cafe
description: An intimate setting for all adults, Coffee & Tease is the Red Lantern Society's playful take on the usual tavern or cafe - a lingerie cafe! Come sit and enjoy the company of the estate's companions and staff while delighting in a seasonal menu. Our companions are not available for personal hire during this event - but this is a perfect way to get to know them. This event is bi-weekly, we advise joining the Discord to keep up with our openings!

name: Black Amethyst
description: We are an 18+ night club that does everything we can to make your experience here as amazing as possible. Open every other Sunday and every other Wednesday. We have giveaways through out the night. We like to let loose have fun and relax.
Whether you're looking for a night of partying on the dance floor, or for an evening of relaxing while you listen, drink, and vibe, you will find what you're looking for â™¥

name: Dead Lobster
description: The worst venue imagineable, we do what everyone else does, just significantly worse. Rp or Dont, we have a namazu torture chamber, the best DJs on the data center, and free courts. THats right completley free. Giveaways for large sums of money, and free paintings of your character. All just really bad

name: Bubble Club
description: Bubble Club is an all-in-one adult playground offering live music, drinks, treats, gambling, dancing, and more!

name: The Sleepy Tonberry
description: The Sleepy Tonberry bed and breakfast is a venue that is designed for comfort. This little venue is owned by a Raen and Xaela wishing to share the warmth of their family home and hearth to the weary traveler, with breakfasts, lunch and dinners to be served every plate is created and served with a smile. Rent one of our themed rooms to give your character that lovely vacation they so much deserve. Need something more swift, we also have a small little communal spa room that is free of use for everyone. With a lovely staff of various people ( from students to barbarians ) our main goal is to provide a calm and happy relaxing time!

name: MEEPS
description: â™¥ We're naughty and we're nice, and if you'd like a slice, come visit us at MEEPS - an RP Nightclub with much to offer for everyone. From our weekly game nights, dance parties, monthly auctions, and a host of other services and amenities; all hosted by our very experienced staff. We always aim to provide you with the best experience for you and your companions every single week! It's a place for fun! It's a place for relaxation! It's a place to make memories with healthy doses of spice in between. â™¥

name: Lunatics
description: Lunatics is here to make sure you can let your hair down and PARTY HARD!!!

We have everything from Amazing DJ's, who bring you their efforts and mixes to make sure your night is as enjoyable as possible. Gamble Table where you can test your luck and maybe go home with millions. Bar Service that you will never forget with Special Drinks and chat with our Barkeeps. Enjoy watching our Dancers Beautiful Performances, that will leave you mesmerized & Photographers that will help you remember your night.

name: The Cloaked Cork
description: Sirens best kept secret has opened its door to anyone but law enforcement! **The Cloaked Cork** is a speakeasy tavern nestled into the lush village of Lavender Beds. We welcome all bards and bands, all visitors and residents! Find a seat, bust a move, or pop some fireworks off! We are here for the love of music and friends! We host a 50/50 raffle every Saturday and have giveaways as well! Everyone is a winner at the cork!!

name: Harvestbell Lesbian Lounge
description: Harvestbell Lesbian Lounge is a sex-positive, NSFW lesbian bar and bathhouse for immersive and erotic RP.

This establishment is for feminine characters to engage with other feminine characters. If you would like to have a masculine character be present to socialize but not participate, this is allowed - but be prepared for any sexual advances to be ignored or criticized. Please note that this does not apply to players, all IRL identities are welcome here. We expect and demand that writers clearly differentiate between IC and OOC, and respect the line drawn in the sand between fantasy and reality.

All characters and players must be, and appear to be, adults. This means no underage players, no underage characters, and no characters that appear to be underage - in other words, no Lalafells or other models shrunk to similar proportions.

This establishment is meant to celebrate sex. As such, we encourage all sexual activity that takes place within the estate in-game be written in public chat channels (/say and /em). Please note that the immediate exterior of the estate is not an acceptable place to write publicly-visible sex.

name: The Warden's Garden
description: Flowers are the jewels of the world, reminders that the journey is worth it. Florists at the Warden's Garden defend those ideals while providing a safe for work space for adventurers and peace seekers across the star. Stop by, pick up some flowers, and find peace under the Warden's sun-kissed rose shield. For here, you are loved and of that, you can be certain.

name: Skyline1456
description: Z-Clubs rotates opening on of their venues each week at 11pm EDT on Sundays : Cascade, Skyline1456, and Panorama! Skyline1456 is a penthouse nightclub with a luxe environment and occasional gpose-specific auction nights!

name: Cottontale
description: An immersive RP sewing/drinking workshop for couples, singles, and those in complicated situations.

name: Cirque
description: A new show every month! EVERY MONTH we play host to a server-wide roleplay event open to the public community of Mateus and beyond. For years now Cirque has put on live stage plays that marvel and amaze with our dedicated troupe of actors. From original tales like the Untold Origins of the Scions, to fan favorites like Frozen, Cirque is a one of a kind theatrical experience you'll not want to miss out on!

name: CRYSTAL CAVE
description: In the blue glow of the crystal, this club regularly hosts party nights. Every two weeks the staff welcomes its guests with hard guitar riffs and a selection of the best rock & metal songs. And between these weeks, the Cave offers a home to different genres: whether pop, Asian or retro - everyone finds a home here! So do it like the crystals do: sparkle and shine through the darkest nights!

name: Starlight Bar
description: This gothic rock Bar situated in The sunny Mist is Our original venue, Complete with  pools and a few private rooms, upstairs dance hall and plenty space to socialize or let loose we cant wait for you to see the place!

name: Brewjaâ€™s Coffee Cauldron
description: A relaxing and whimsical coffee shop that caters to every Druid/Witch in Eorzea, though you donâ€™t need to know magic to come enjoy the delicious, hand crafted and brewed pastries and coffee. My place is AFK, Que, and even craft friendly under the right circumstances, just to give everyone a chance to relax and hang out with no pressure to do anything.

name: Tipsy Whispers
description: Hidden behind the books of an unassuming little library lies Tipsy Whispers. Take a peek behind the trick bookcase and find a verdant oasis for you to enjoy. Whether you're looking for a coffee to pair with a good book, a relaxing spot for a date, or some drinks to enjoy with your friends, this little coffee and cocktail lounge is waiting for you.

Tipsy Whispers is a SFW RP venue offering a variety of sweet and savory foods, coffees, teas, cocktails, wines, and beers for our guests. We have an open stage for bards and offer performers a free drink for their talents. Guests are invited to enjoy all areas and amenities inside and outside of the venue. Interested in renting the venue out for a private event or photoshoot? We'd be happy to host you! Whisper owner Liokki Black in-game to schedule.

name: The Drunken Duck
description: Need a drink? Want a room to rent? Have a need to get told off by rather angry viera? Well, the Drunken Duck is the perfect place! A cozy but chaotic inn located in Ishgard! For the adventurers, the everyday laborers, the travelers, the heroes of wars long past, for those who love to spin a tale and share with the world!

name: Tilted Casino Club
description: Come get lucky at Tilted Casino Club!!! We have a variety of games with our friendly staff including blackjack, deathrolls, Russian Roulette, Hi/Low, and more!!! We have music, drinks, and a fun vibe. So come get lucky, dance the night away, or both!!

name: Eden's Garden
description: One of Crystal's OG Nightclubs,
Stop by for RP, Real Tarot Readings, Bar & Drink Games, Dancers, Giveaways, RP Fights and Casino!

name: The Seadragon's Cup bar
description: The Sea dragon's Cup is a bed, bar & breakfast establishment that is located in Shirogane who prides themselves in a cozy bar, a beautiful lounge and offer rooms for guests to stay over.
Either come downstairs to the bar where fine drinks and fine food are served or perhaps just relax upstairs in the lounge and for those staying the night can also enjoy a fine breakfast there.
In the middle floor is the counter, where you can inquire about staying overnight for a night or two.

So welcome in to have local hingan food or perhaps some western food that reminds a lot of the grand sea. Same is with the fine drinks and let our bartenders awe you both with selection of hingan spirits and awestriking western drinks.

name: Photon
description: Photon is a hyper modernist inspired designed dance club.  We bring a sleek aesthetic to the club scene with services for dancers, a full service bar, and 2 djs playing per opening night.  Huge giveaways are a stable of opening nights as well as a nice chill atmosphere.  The staff are all friends, and aim to simply create a nice place for people to meet and mingle. We open every other Thursday from 10-1 EST

name: O7Nights Bar & Dance
description: O7Nights Bar & Dance is a roleplay club, with a bar setting within the MMORPG Final Fantasy XIV. It is owned by player Juzo Mohjahro of the Aether Datacenter and Midgardsormr Server. It stands as one of the many venues which players can socialize and find a nightlife without leaving home. This venue prioritizes on spreading a contagiously positive atmosphere, 'Being o7,' by accepting and educating new but brave role-players, while indulging veterans with authentic and thoughtful interactions. While upfront providing a relaxed bar setting, this venue has many moments that escalate the energy, between octet bard performances by Raevyn Koneko, regular appearances from wildly outgoing bar regulars and Juzo making drinks just right from his Specialty Menu. On nights where players both want to rest their feet, or get them moving, Juzo and his patrons are there, Making Midgardsormr a little More o7.

Anecdote left by Karilan Black of Crossroads Conversations of Gilgamesh: "SFW Not your average nightclub; Juzo takes connections and party life to a wholesome level with thrills and chills, depending on what drinks are being mixed upstairs. Fit for literally any level of RP, o7 Nights welcomes you the way adventurers welcome each other at the start of any encounter, and you are sure to find company here who will guide you through every step to learn how to RP effectively and comfortably. Share a drink with a new friend, or dance the night away downstairs. Either way, you'll leave with good vibes."

name: The Oaken Tavern
description: Tired of a long day of adventuring? Looking to sit back, relax, and enjoy some great food and better company? Come visit the Oaken Tavern, a sfw venue and open social space to make new friends and find like minded Warriors of Light to play with. Open and welcoming to players of all backgrounds, we ask that you try to extend that same courtesy to our other guests.

We're glad to have you, our tavern boasts a fully stocked bar, an open Stage for performing bards, and a cozy interior to help melt the weariness away. For More information, please visit our discord server and check out our website!

name: Buns in the Oven CafÃ©
description: Come join us for hot drinks, sweet treats, great music and most importantly relaxation! Buns in the Oven CafÃ© is a proudly located on the edge of the Goblet, made from the remains of a rundown factory. No gil? No problem! Just sit back and enjoy, having you visit is all the payment we need.

name: Club Milk
description: Club Milk is an LGBT friendly spot situated on Chaos Omega, Empyreum.
With doors opening every other saturday, our ~~cult~~ club welcomes all, and the milk maids are ready to bring you your dairy delights.
Come get your calcium

name: The Moirai
description: The Moirai, an SFW RP nightclub, brings the type of humor that can be found in the Manderville quest line to your Saturday nights! Enjoy live music from live DJs, drinks from a fully stocked bar, and dancers to entertain you. All are welcome, from beginning RPers to experienced ones.

name: Way of LIFE Coffee Shop
description: Great place to start or end your day of adventure!

A relaxed spot to visit with friends, plan strategies, listen to or play some music. Need to AFK? Find a comfy spot in our extensive, quiet library on the second floor. Our welcoming staff is always there with a smile as they hand you a cup of joy.
Stop in and...
Experience the Way of LIFE!

name: The Eggstate Eatery
description: The only cafÃ© that actually serves food! Looking for a place to take cute pictures with your food? Look no further!

name: Silver Lining Cafe
description: "We'd like to invite you to our small corner of Eorzea, the Silver Lining Cafe! Our friendly staff has a listening ear for if you'd like to talk about your recent adventures, or life in general, and a variety of food and beverage options if you're looking for a bite to eat! If conversation isn't your forte, you are always more than welcome to just sit and listen (or AFK, we don't judge!) Feel free to make use of our open stage, be it playing yourself, or listening to one of the other bards, as well!

name: The Hollow Tree Cafe
description: Hollow Tree Cafe is a casual SFW forest-themed cafe where travelers can take a load off, buy themselves a meal, and meet new people! We have an open stage for any traveling bards that would like to play for our customers. We also provide a library on the top floor if you'd like to have a nice reading while sipping your cup of tea/coffee.

name: The Black Dahlia
description: Welcome to the Black Dahlia one and all!

Come and enjoy the sights and sounds of Faerieâ€™s premiere dark garden. We are an upscale gothic style club offering a mix of traditional gothic ambiance and modern atmosphere catered to delight gothic hearts and upbeat club hoppers alike.
We offer a wide array of amenities and services to ensure that a night spent with us is one that youâ€™ll not likely forget.
Our Amenities:
-A full-service bar staffed by charismatic mixologists who serve up our carefully curated drinks and delicious meals.
-A large stage and dance floor to enjoy our elegant dancers and live music from talented Bards and DJâ€™s alike.
-An exclusive VIP section where drinks, dances and other services come directly to you.
-Specialized rooms for participating in high stakes games of chance and fortune as well as a comfortable lounge to enjoy the delights of intimate dances with our exquisitely graceful entertainers.
-Private rooms to enjoy the services of our highly skilled companions to fulfill your deepest desires.
Our Services:
-Immersive Role Play
-In Game Photography
-Adventurer (Dungeon) Services

name: Fat Cat's Fresh Leaves
description: Shirogane's first four paw-owned, two paw-operated cafÃ© is serving high quality drinks and treats from around the world. Our kind owner bids all welcome to come in and enjoy our relaxing environment, delicious menu items, and enjoy the entertainment of watching the owners faithful servants try to keep up with the demands of the best cafe on the star.

name: Purple Suit Casino and Lounge
description: Welcome to Purple Suit Casino and Lounge, Eorzea's premier entertainment destination. Experience sophistication and excitement with thrilling games, exquisite dÃ©cor, and attentive service. Unwind in our luxurious lounge or challenge your luck with our diverse activities. Indulge in handcrafted cocktails and delectable cuisine. Join us today for an unforgettable and safe gaming experience.

name: The Raven's Nest Bar & Nightclub
description: Though we are known for our Champion of Hydaelyn Tournaments, we have decided to also open our bar to the public!
Enjoy a day away from the grind with music and dancing as well as our fine menu. Keep in mind this is a 21+, roleplay venue!
Please keep battles to our events and please drink responsibly. Do not drink and ride.

name: Midnight Tea
description: Situated in a clearing in the middle of the woods is a cabin. Nothing unusual in sight besides the faerie village. And the bard stage. And the bar. You'd almost say it's not a cabin at all, but an odd tea shop boasting every tea that exists. How? Why? Come on down, give Cabby a pat and let us serve you up whatever your tastebuds are craving!

name: D3gen's
description: Good vibes only!

name: Cutesy Listic Cafe
description: Do you like cute cafes filled with stuffys, cuddle spots and free snackies? Cutesy Listic Cafe is a sfw place that is fairly new. I open before Maintenance times as well for those who need a place to go :3

name: Spicy Lanterns
description: We are a new Othardian theme fusion restaurant offering our guests the most immersive dining experience as well as the best tasting dishes around! Each dish comes with its own unique tabletop item for that extra immersiveness, and food role play is strongly encouraged here!
We also house an open stage so we welcome all bards to play their tunes for us~

name: Joker's Child
description: Joker's Child is an 18+ casual and light RP venue offering a cozy space for people to come together to listen to an 8-man bard band, chat amongst guests and a growing bar menu. We've recently added a gambling game "Arcana Hearts" and can't wait to bring it to the community! Events and new ideas are always being worked on as Joker's Child grows into a place people remember!

name: The Foundry
description: With a luxurious bar upstairs and a dark industrial vibe in the basement, The Foundry is assured to offer a little bit of everything for everyone! Nestled in the Lavender Beds there lays a forge where it's all work on the outside, all party on the inside. Come one, come all to The Foundry! We are an 18+ venue so please keep in mind clothes are optional and we're a NSFW establishment.

name: Lawless Lane
description: Welcome to Lawless Lane, an immersive criminal & back-alley RP venue where villains spend the weekend and justice has no place. This alley courtyard is home to several less-than-reputable businesses ranging from a dive bar, to a drug den across the lane, to even a no-holds-barred fighting arena underground. Criminals and lowlifes of all variety are welcome into the haven of Lawless Lane be it to just relax without the law breathing down your neck or to do business. Just be careful who you speak with, you never know who will put a knife in your back.

name: The Wicked Wolf
description: The Wicked Wolf is a Tavern Located in Empyreum that offers Live Bards with an open stage to all, good food and drinks and a Lively staff. come on by and join us and relax! Rp and LGBTQ+ friendly!

name: Two Moons Lodge
description: Two Moons Lodge is a tavern-esque Lodge in Empyreum that houses the Ghost Wolf Dancers tribe. Whether you're new to RP or been doing it for years, all levels are welcome here. We have drink, music, tarot and good company.

name: Dan's BBQ Shop
description: Welcome to our for-gil locale inspired by Memphis BBQ restaurants and dive bars like The BBQ Shoppe, The Mothlight, Payne's BBQ and concert venues like The Hi-Tone.

Dan's BBQ Shop aims to provide a more low-key atmosphere and southern home cooking to patrons, featuring dishes heavily inspired by dives and diners in the Memphis area, and we hope you'll enjoy the chance to try something out of the ordinary.

name: Midnight Run
description: Midnight Run is a vacation-style rental cottage available for wedding nights, romantic rendezvous, photo shoots and anything else you have in mind. A cottage designed with luxury and moonlit whimsy in mind, Midnight Run is the perfect place to spend the evening or even the weekend.

name: The Frog Pond
description: Established after the Seventh Umbral Calamity, The Frog Pond has since become a place for adventurers to come from far and wide to tell their tales or to simply hear one. From grandiose tales of adventure and daring, to various whispers and rumors, these walls have heard them all. Make yourself at home, grab a drink, and spin a yarn or two! We're happy to have you! Ribbit!

name: Ouran Host Club
description: The pinacle of upper-class host clubs, we treat every client with the upmost respect deserving of a king, and we have a variety of hosts to meet client exceptions! We have a bar with wine, snacks, and non-alcholic sparkling beverages.

name: The HiveMind
description: Welcome to The HiveMind! A nightclub where you are all "One of Us"! Come enjoy the Dancers, Role Players, Bar, DJ, Black Jack, and Giveaways! Step through the void to a world of wonderful debauchery! DJ RE from 10:30-12:30/DJ Ryaru from 12:30-2:30am est! Live mixing every Saturday Night!!!

name: Celestial Grounds
description: Canonically in Sharlayan. A very late-night SFW fortune-telling cafÃ©. Refreshments can be purchased, and fortune telling through runes, tarot cards, or tasseography can be requested from the staff.

name: EDGE
description: [Open the Second and Fourth Saturday of every month!] â–µ Sometimes, you're only able to find where the edge is if you risk going over it.

You've heard talk of a premiere nightclub garnering widespread acclaim from audiences within the ice-covered streets of Empyreum, but amongst the praise of their curated music, luxury decor, premium drink menu, and stellar special events have been rumors: murmurings of Voidal sightings, of dark magicks at play, of chaos following in the hours after closing.

With the venue's recent relocation to the tropical beachside setting of the Mist, surely, all of that has been left behind... but the only way to find out for yourself is to take your night to the ð”¼ð”»ð”¾ð”¼.

name: Carbuncle's Favor Confectionery
description: [3rd Thursdays of the month, 8:00 p.m. to 11:00 p.m. Eastern]

"Sweets to eat and treat."â€”Drop by Carbuncle's Favor Confectionery for cakes, 'shakes, and potables of a different make. Whether you're looking for a treat to enjoy, something more seasonal, or perusing the apothecary branch, there may be something for you! Delivery, catering, and custom order options available. Gil's IC only, but donations are accepted.

name: Broceliande
description: Broceliande is a quiet, immersive RP venue with a blend of Hingan and Gridanian aesthetics and a large menu. We encourage in-character conversation as much as possible. Most visitors come to unwind and have a little light character writing. The intent is to provide a relaxing environment for adult players to interact with other adults, and to facilitate the formation of connections with other immersive RPers so that they can form their own bonds and playgroups.

name: The Witches Brew
description: A witch themed cafe located in the Empyreum, open to everyone to come and chatter and socialize while enjoying some magical treats and betwitching atmosphere.

name: The Purple Flower
description: Come join us for faery magical hospitality in a mystical forest cafÃ© this evening!Casual RPers and Beginners welcome!

name: Tamasha
description: Tamasha is a heavy RP Thavnairian themed venue. We strive to bring the mystery and culture of Hannish life to Eorzea. We want to engage guests in a relaxed setting full of unique personalities who wish to strip away the day and mesmerize them however they see fit. Tamasha is an 18+ venue offering erp services on site. The story behind the venue allows for criminal undertones with spaces available for such if requested.

name: Amaterasu
description: At Amaterasu, our goal is to provide an excellent club experience with live DJ performances and an atmosphere that encourages dancing, roleplay and partying your ass off however you want!  We have the best selection of live DJ's to dance the night away with.  Giveaways, if you're feeling lucky! Entrancing dancers and energetic entertainment! A a full bar for you to chill at and buy that cutie you have your eye on a drink. If you are feeling fancy, we have the VIP experience too, see our website for details.  Just bring yourself and be yourself!

name: Momma Luca's
description: A LGBTQIA+ friendly cafÃ© with a Greek flair in the cold winter of the Empyreum, allow us to become your family away from family, and your home away from home, and bring a little joy to the cold winters nights. We have raffles on the first and third openings of every month, giveaways, live music, photography services, tarot readings, and craftings services, and are always looking for guest suggestions towards greater expansion!

name: Nymeia's Bounty Far East Bathhouse
description: Amidst the bustling streets of Ul'daah, lies a hidden gem - a luxurious bathhouse, where weary travellers and locals alike come to unwind and rejuvenate their bodies and minds.

As you step inside, you're greeted by the soothing sounds of flowing water and the warm glow of lanterns. The air is thick with the fragrance of exotic oils and herbs, and you can feel your senses coming alive.

Welcome to Nyemiaâ€™s Bounty, where the steam rising from hot springs mingles with the whispers of companionship. In the far eastern lands of Doma, bathhouses are more than just places to cleanse one's body; they are gateways to a realm of mysticism and adventure. Here, you can soak in the healing waters of sacred springs, commune with our enchanting staff, and immerse yourself in a rich tapestry of conversation and intense discussion. From the ornate architecture to the varied menu, every aspect of the bathhouse experience is infused with the mystique of the East, inviting you to explore a realm of beauty and enchantment that transcends time and space. So come, step into Nyemiaâ€™s Bounty, and let your journey begin.

name: Cloak & Dagger Speakeasy
description: [ Immersive, lore-compliant, heavy RP focus, no OOC gil is expected to participate. ]

The Cloak & Dagger is a speakeasy located on the edge of the Goblet's Brimming Heart. With ties to the Ul'dahn underworld, the speakeasy has served criminal clientele under the table for yearsâ€”and offered cover in the form of employment to them as well. Owned and operated by an unseen proprietor known only as Crow, esteemed guests from all walks of life are invited to kick back, relax, and speak easy with the Cloak & Dagger for a high-class and luxurious drinking experience.

name: Bone Zone Cafe
description: Our staff consists of the chill, fun-loving free company: Skeleton Warriors (BONES).
We pride ourselves on enjoying what the game has to offer whether it be leveling a job, raiding, crafting or simply the company of others.

name: Ricecakes Bakery
description: SFW! Welcome to Ricecakes Bakery, the one and only baked goods cafÃ© on Exodus where Ricecakes and all things tasty rule! Come visit and relax in our chill cafÃ© setting, open daily 11am-2pm.

name: Club Resurrection
description: Club Resurrection is a high energy, low drama club! We would love to help make your night one to remember! Come hang out with friends or find someone to have some fun with~

name: Blood Money
description: Upper crust, but underground. The Ruby Sea muddled with white stone. Blood Money is La Noscea's premier den for all those looking to get away from the bug-eyes of the Yellowjackets and their red, pavement-prowling friends. Hunkered down beneath the hollowed-out waterways of Mist, enjoy absolutely no lessâ€”and likely much moreâ€”than ten fulms of La Noscean masonry between you and the nearest lawman.
Take a left and follow the Tonberry.
[Bi-Weekly - Join discord for dates + password]

name: Descension
description: Welcome to Descension, a dark underground factory converted into an 18+ BDSM club, we offer live DJs, gamba, 18+ services +more.
tonight we're hosting THUD, a party dedicated to loud, stompy music. Get ready to move and groove to the beat, and feel the thud of your boots as they hit the floor! Come dance with us!

name: The Echo's Chamber
description: **The Echo's Chamber** is a special events venue for a variety of uses. We host nightclub activities, house various DJ's from across the realm, rent out the space for special events such as birthday celebrations and wedding receptions, other events include performance and theater groups and/or bards of diverse genres. Come visit us for any of our scheduled events or come during normal business hours for a night off from adventuring and maybe even find a companion to keep you company~

name: Gaterio
description: Gaterio is an 18+ plus night club environment meant to allow people to bring out their baddest selves in a positive way. We want to have fun and vibe, bringing good music and company to the scene. Currently we sport a fully stocked bar with live Djs and in the future plan to add a casino element to the night club.

name: The Brawlers' Pit
description: We are an 18+ rp fight venue, very SFW and respectful h2h combat. (no kill blows, no maiming) We don't allow erp services at the venue aswell. Very new rper friendly and chill vibes

name: Foreplay
description: Welcome to our Venue. A place to bring a date, a place to find a date, a place to chill, a place to play and dance, a place to celebrate. This and more we offer, here we offer various services that might interest you. Come and check it out!!

name: The Gilded Fox
description: Gilded Fox is a small bar aiming to be a safe warm place for all. Targeted more to the LBGTQ+ community but all are welcome! Also a safe haven for misfits.

name: Entropy Maid Cafe
description: Our story is simple starting with a desire to have a comfortable and welcoming place to go to relax and enjoy a good chat, the name was decided since everything is a disorder, but here we unite the disorder to give some peace to some of our clients.
Entropy Maid Cafe offers a comfortable atmosphere with kind maids and butlers eager to help you relax! Come alone or bring a friend to chat with us!
We are a SFW establishment that strives to put your comfort and relaxation first

name: Yamaguchi Inc.
description: Welcome to Yamaguchi Inc. !!!

In here you can find many fun activities to try out, as well as our special Adventure system that provided fun and interactive Guided Tours around all of Eorzea and many Adventures and Events to try out so come journey with us!

name: Club Lavender
description: Come join us at Club Lavender where every Friday night we bring in the weekend with drinks, food, dancers, courts, live music, and more! We hope to see you there.

name: Restorative Therapy
description: Healing starts here
Restorative therapy aims to help warriors of light overcome their struggles to build a better future for themselves and those around them.

name: Club Foxbury
description: Looking for a place to pregame before a night of venue crawling?  Looking to test your glamour abilities with themes voted on by patrons in our weekly glam contest?  Looking just to blow off some steam with a good drink and some dancing?  The Foxbury is your place to go as your early evening destination!

name: Club Dragonstone
description: Carved from only the strongest stones found in the deepest regions of the Dragons' homeland, Club Dragonstone is an eclectic venue designed for those with refined yet exciting tastes. Disguised as a forge, both in honor of the fieriest dragons and to avoid the ever-watching eye of the Ishgardian authorities, Dragonstone is a place for those who just want to cast off their worries and relax. It's a magical rave where the music's bumping and the drinks flow like aether.

name: The Golden Otter
description: A relaxing, Otter-themed tea house, where we serve teas and treats. When our talented reader is available, we have a private room available to have your cards read. If anyone should wish to share their talents, there is a stage on the lower floor that anyone can make use of.

name: CafÃ© Leblanc
description: Persona 5 Themed Cosplay Cafe, cozy and calm experience with personal attention.

name: Winchester INN.
description: The Winchesters Inn. invites you to a cozy beer and cocktail at the bar, which you can enjoy with relaxed beats from the 80s, 90s, house and rock.

name: Sera's Cardboard Box
description: A cute cozy "cardboard box" for kitties and all to relax, study or hang out! Snacks, drinks, and an adventurer for hire await! Also... A cat tree!

name: The Degeon
description: Welcome to the Degeon, a small but cozy place residing in Hingashi. We are an open stage and AFK lounge, feel free to stop by and relax!

name: The Lockewood Tavern
description: Adventuring takes a toll, do you need a safe place to doff your heavy armor, and a cold drink? Well good news! The Lockewood Tavern will be open for drinks, supper, music, and quests to help you unwind after a long day of adventuring. Come swing by for a cold pint by the fire, relax, and enjoy some live music, and maybe go on a quest or three, for an immersive in game experience. Join our discord for RP, event nights, giveaways, and some regular updates!

name: Ceruleum
description: Dedicated to bringing you an Eorzean nightlife experience like no other, Ceruleum features exceptional design, an immersive environment, and great music every Friday night.

name: The Hangout
description: We're a bit of a jack of all trades, we run all forms of venue fun from RP Cafe, to a Twitch stream Rave to even some gambling in the fighting ring. our thing makes us stand out is we change the venue decoration based off the theme, and wont have the same theme 2 nights in a row.

name: Dracarys
description: Welcome to Dracarys ðŸ”¥ we are a nightclub with a variety of music styles. Bar, dancers and photo services. Come and party with us and let's have an amazing time together!

name: Cafe Sunset
description: A femboy maid cafe with good coffee, sweet treats, and even sweeter men!

name: Club Insanity
description: A Fun Social Night Club Environment you won't soon forget!

name: LalaXIV
description: LXIV is a venue built in mind for those who have an affinity for the luxurious. Here at LXIV, we provide the high life for the high rollers of Crystal. We offer one of, if not THE best VIP package on all of crystal. While being a hub of luxury, we provide some of the most exciting and fun giveaways around. We also have an energetic and extremely motivated staff who are excited to be there and are GREAT company to our patrons. We pride ourselves in LUXURY FOR EORZEA!

name: Bunny Montana's Hideaway
description: The baseline idea is a mod ran club we will have all kinds of music

name: The Silverheart Corner
description: A seaside bar and restaurant with high class food and quality beverages. Food service runs until 10pm ST unless reservations are made.

name: Wanderers Wayrest
description: A place for weary travelers to come at the end of their day-to-day journeys and find that oft-desired culmination of rest and relaxation. To fill their stomachs with delicious foods, to find the open and welcoming arms of the denizens within and to rejuvenate their mind, and body with a much needed massage. The Wayrest is an 18+ RP focused establishment, and we are more than happy to have you as a patron and feel privileged to have the chance to serve you.

name: Rhia Cafe
description: Aether's first lalafell-friendly venue!

name: Finish Line casino
description: *Take a lap around the main floor for games to spend your coin & a stage for the night's events! Refill your tank at the bar and enjoy the races on the monitor! Feel the Need for Speed? Burn rubber down to the basement where live Chocobo Races are held every 20 minutes by our track coordinator!*
*Enjoy the night because you are First Place when you cross to the Finish Line!*

The Finish Line casino is an entirely SFW venue with a focus on minigames and immersive RP. Our venue features an original Chocobo racing game, an open bar, slots, a Roulette Wheel, and a stage for anyone to use! Roleplayers of all skill levels are encouraged to join us. No gil? No problem! Our menu items and festivities are all free- though you're very welcome to tip the staff!
RACE TO THE FINISH LINE- IF YOU'RE NOT FIRST YOU'RE LAST!

name: Candyland
description: The sweetest place in all of Eorzea! A Maid Cafe & a nightclub thats maid themed? How much more cute and fun can it get! So if you're in the mood to party with the cutest maids you've ever seen, well than come visit us. Dance or Dine with us? We have it all! We promise your stay will be the sweetest.

name: Empyrean Apocrypha
description: A library built within an old chapel of Ishgard's Empyreum district, this establishment provides a warm place to sit, read, and enjoy a pastry or cup of tea.

name: The Otterly Amazing Cafe & Lounge
description: Welcome to the Otterly Amazing Cafe! A relaxing, chill, Odder Otter themed cafe. Come sit back and enjoy our selection of teas, coffees, pastries, and atmosphere.
Take a break from the adventuring life with us, meet new friends, and share in our love for music with our open stage!
We offer indoor and outdoor garden seating for those that wish to take their drinks and food outside to enjoy on nice days!
Sundays 8:00 PM - 12AM EST
Primal - Leviathan - Lavender Beds - Ward 18 Plot 32

name: Thorn Tavern
description: Come on in and sit by the fire! Thorn welcomes you and invites you to a night of music, good food, fine drinks, and great friends! Our services are always free so come by and relax by one of our hearths, wander through our library, or take a seat at the bar while we take care of you. Large groups are welcome and RP is completely optional. See our carrd for more info on events and our staff!

name: Club Burzum Grotto
description: Join us in the depths of our depravity for a night thatâ€™s sure to leave you dripping.

name: Awakening Faewilds
description: A warm and welcoming Club is Awakening Faewilds! We are glad to have you here. We are a friendly group of colleagues who are delighted that you would use our amenities. Enjoy the music, art, and other events while you can!

name: The Persimmon Leaf
description: A Far Eastern cafÃ©, extension to the successful luxury bar and lounge, the Jade Window. Run solely by proprietress Rihua Hong, it is dedicated to being a safehaven for players to slow down and unwind, whether they choose to roleplay or not. Strictly a SFW space.

name: The Rose Chalice
description: The Rose Chalice is a vampire themed club and lounge with a blended east/west gothic aesthetic and heavy role play lean.
We serve food and drinks at any of our bars or from our hosts all night.

Every Friday and Saturday night, the nightclub opens, allowing our patrons the chance to mingle, dance, acquire company for the evening, or maybe get a "bite" while enjoying one of our house or guest DJs.
Care to test your luck? You'll find our dealers and Bards upstairs in The Rose Room as well as opulent rooms for rent with a Public bathhouse open 24/7.

name: The Killing Floor
description: The Killing Floor, a non-profit Goth / Metal nigthclub that is centered around the guest experience and 'having a blast' every night that they're open.

name: GUCCI
description: Boutique

name: Kokuryuu
description: An immersive Eastern-themed high-end restaurant and lounge focusing on cuisine from the Near and Far East. We offer light conversation and an elegant atmosphere to meet up with friends or make new ones as adventurers in Eorzea and beyond.

name: The Moogle Lounge
description: The Moogle Lounge is a great place where you can party till you can't no more or sit back and relax a bit. There is a bar full with a diversity of meals and drinks for you to enjoy, also there's the Nighty Night Raffle were you can win cool stuff!! Come join us to have fun, and have a break from those adventures of the day!  We are more than glad to have you here with us KUPO!

name: Rosewater Refuge
description: A social/barding venue set in a cozy speakeasy inspired basement. LGTBQ+ and CPTSD friendly, with a community focus on positive mental health reinforcement and heavy consideration for the comfort of our patrons. An extensive and cozy bar menu, soft tunes from a beautifully set stage, tables for card play, and soft lighting make this safe space a hard bet to beat.

name: Golden Lantern
description: A small, relaxing sushi bar, tucked away in the Lavender Beds. RP friendly atmosphere.

name: Bust Casino Club
description: Like the thrill of chasing Lady Luck. The dimness of the lights, the thrill of each win, music to wash away the sorrows. We have the games to get you through the night and the best dealers Aether has to offer. So come take a chance and see how the cards fall

name: The Void
description: When chic and industrial meet to form one of the coolest clubs in Eorzea, here is The Void Nightclub!

name: The Magic Den
description: The Magic Den Nightclub for anyone looking for a place to have fun! We offer live music, dancers, courts, gamba, drinks, auctions & giveaways. Come join us for a night to remember

name: The Veil
description: The Veil Primalâ€™s premier alternative venue Goth | Industrial | Hardcore | Post Hardcore | Metal | Emo | Pop Punk | 80â€™s + 90â€™s

name: The Rose Petal
description: A laid back RP centered nightclub and lounge with a focus on creating a welcoming and social environment. Come and enjoy a night out at the Rose Petal!

name: Arum
description: Arum is a laid back venue which operates on the simple adage of "Less is more" for that good ole' time. Nothing else is needed besides great sounds, chilled atmosphere and a great place to enjoy them in. The venue is stylised around those old bayou vibes with a touch of Aurum Vale. The right side to that particular swamp.

name: Cherry Bomb
description: We are an Underground Club since April 2022! On every second Wednesday our mission is coming together and having a great time Come and join us on our themebased parties and have a great time with amazing People and also great Djs ! U can find us here : LIGHT - SHIVA - GOBLET -Ward 26 - Plot 60

name: Fenrir Bar
description: Fenrir Bar a 18+ Bar/Tavern - Norse/Viking Themed venue. A place to kick back after a long fight, or someone to drink to get warm while listening to a skald play us some tunes! Whatever the reason for your visit, do make sure to try our frozen themed drinks, and perhaps a Deadly Sin Challenge or two? Something to really make your night interesting!

name: ~ Lounge~Lavender ~
description: - Lounge-Lavender -
We are a SFW, RP, AFK friendly venue featuring:
~Calming Doman vibes~
~Great handmade food~
~A large chill area to socialize or relax in~
~A calming atmosphere perfect for RP or AFKing~
~A beautiful open stage for music~
~And a gorgeous bathhouse downstairs~
Our Hours of Operation are:
**â˜€ï¸Sunday: æ—¥æ›œæ—¥ 9pm-midnight CST
ðŸ”¥Tuesday: ç«æ›œæ—¥ 12pm--3pm CST**
Please come find us at: Adamantoise, Shirogane, Ward 29, Plot 31!
We hope to see you there, and in the discord, soon!
https://lounge-lavender.carrd.co
https://discord.gg/yj3TfxZ7x3

name: Sivâ€™s Sake House
description: ðŸ¶ Siv's Sake House ðŸ¶
Siv's Sake House is a new and upcoming RP venue in the area of Shirogane, Hingashi - Ward 18 Plot 5.

I opened this RP venue with hopes of bringing people from all over Eorzea to bond over a nice glass of sake and food together while giving new people who want to try to RP can do so without being judged by others.
Whether it's your first time RPing or a seasoned veteran that wants to kick back and relax with friends over some sake then Siv's Sake House is the place for your next RP adventure!
Don't forget to sign our welcome book as well \o/

--We do accept reservations up to parties of 6 people. To place a reservation please whisper Sivgard Zvorsyn in-game or join our discord and make reservations in the reservations channel, just select the Sake House Guest role in the role picker channel.

name: Vineward
description: *A classy inn a cut above the dodgier places in Thanalan, The Vineward provides a cozy place to relax and wind down at the end of a long day.  Their simple menu is composed of classic favorites and won't overwhelm you with options.  Ideal for new or frugal RPers as their menu has no prices attached and donations of any size are considered generous.*

name: The Hideaway Cafe
description: So you've finally made it! Grab a drink! The show starts soon. Welcome to the Hideaway Cafe! A Corner venue meant for all venue workers to come, relax, and kick their feet up. Dueling piano Bards try to outwit each other each night, and drinks served in our Speakeasy set up are cold, and very fairly priced. So fill your cups and empty your heavy coffers after a long day's work, here at The Hideaway! Enjoy your escape.

name: Stiletto
description: You find yourself stumbling down a dark back alley late at night. Your drunken eyes guided various neon signs littered across the walls.
A moody looking Au'ra scowls at you as you try keep your composure. "Lookin' for a good time, lad?"  he says with a wry smile, gesturing to a set of stairs. You nod, not knowing what to expect.
You make your way down to a bright red door and hesitate for a second, before opening it and stepping into darker pleasures.
Stiletto is a red light district themed dive bar found in the dark back alleys of Empyreum. Come see what darker pleasures await you Underground.

name: Glitch Leather Night Club
description: We're a premier Leather Night Club that focuses on BDSM Education and Exploration. Discussion Nights are the first and third Thursday of the month (sometimes the fifth) and Play Parties are the third Saturday of the month.  Sometimes we open late night for people to use the dungeon after hitting the clubs, but our doors are always open to members.  We're also the home of DEGEN - Eorzea's Adult Magazine.

name: Carbuncle Cabaret
description: The Carbuncle Cabaret is an 18+ modern rave-like club with an emphasis on... you guessed it... carbuncles! We are a rather high energy club with EDM and TONS of giveaways!

name: The Cask and Keg
description: The Cask and Keg is a quaint speakeasy styled venue tucked underneath a clothing store.

name: Platform XIV
description: This abandoned, Sharlayan train station with pipes and fonts of magic has many lost souls, eager explorers, and the occasional goblin searching for freedom. RP for beginners with bar, tarot, minigames & optional radio station.

name: The Step Cafe
description: A relaxing pastel themed cafÃ© with lots comfortable seating and a lovely outdoor patio to enjoy everything this small getaway in the Lavender Beds has to offer.

name: The Heavenly Hearth
description: Welcome to The Heavenly Hearth Tavern, a quaint and exclusive Eorzean-style establishment situated in the port city of Kugane.
Enjoy the variety of flavors of our signature dishes and drinks. Have a taste of our Fireside Curry, and our specialty mixed drinks, all at affordable prices!
Rest and relax by the hearthside's warmth, and enjoy the ambience with the company of your fellow adventurers. Our doors are open to all, and we look forward to your visit!

name: Club Moonwalker
description: Want to have a little taste of Night city? Come join us! We cannot wait to see you step into our slice of cyberpunk, a wonderful time awaits~

name: Viktoria's Secret
description: Lingerie Boutique & Intimates Apparel

name: The Azure Pavilion
description: The Azure Pavilion is a laid back, light on the RP club, hosting house DJ Avaelin! We often host theme nights where attendees are encouraged to dress up, but it is never required. Your minion is always welcome and we look forward to dancing with you!

name: The Jade Cat
description: The Jade Cat is a SFW RP cafÃ© venue catering towards a calm Far Eastern atmosphere with live bards, tarot readings, tea ceremonies and more! We offer a fair variety of snacks and teas for you to taste and enjoy. Owned and operated by Miqo'te sisters, Kyali and Veronna Maru, this cozy little corner of the Mist doesn't need to fear anyone, as this cafÃ© is home to several members of the underground circuit. Assassins, informants, bodyguards, and secure soundproof locations for 'business deals' all included with our Blue Moon service. All you need do is simply ask one of the servers "The best place to view the blue moon?"

name: Murasaki no Hana
description: Murasaki no Hana is an Asian styled demon cafÃ© which also allows you to request a doting Oni of your choice, to accompany you for SFW/NSFW cuddles or simply company, either in the venue, or within one of our many themed private rooms.

name: Ishgard Tea & Cafe
description: Tea cafe house â˜ºï¸ with music!

name: Eorzea Fishing Academy
description: Eorzea Fishing Academy is excited to announce that it has finally acquired a license to begin operations. This (soon-to-be) renowned institution will offer visitors the opportunity, to learn how to catch fish in some of Eorzea's greatest fishing locations, in a character-driven RP setting!
Sprouts will be provided with state-of-the-art fishing equipment for free. You don't need any special skills or knowledge to participate - just come along and enjoy yourself!
Some of the things you can expect from us are open world fishing trips, museum visits, classroom lessons, fishing tournaments and much more!
To make things even more interesting, everyone who catches at least one fish during the event enters our Fengshui Lottery! The lucky winner will receive 1.000.000 Gil at the conclusion of the event!
So what are you waiting for? Come join us at the fishing academy!

name: HellRoom
description: Dark themed venue in Primal. Online Dj's and fun. come and meet us on Hell.

name: ESCACY
description: Nestled in the heart of Shirogane, Escacy is a stunning custom 2-story upscale nightclub and bar, catering to a stylish clientele. A century old Sukiya-zukuri style house has been meticulously transformed into a timelessly classy and sophisticated entertainment venue, equipped with world class staff and services.

name: Eclipse Adventuring Guild
description: Welcome to Eclipse, an adventurers guild venue aimed at providing an immersive roleplay experience for adventurer characters, adventuring companies, as well as those that may hire them! DMed events run during biweekly cycle, venue opens every other Friday. Check events in the Eclipse discord to see guild opening dates!

notices.message: This venue is open every OTHER friday, please confirming opening in their discord before arriving.

name: WARP NIGHT CLUB
description: For Information Regarding Venues or Residents:
https://corp.crd.co/

name: The Fluffy Kitty
description: A Hearts 'N Toes venue.

name: Pickle Barrel
description: Seeking a place to mellow out and just be yourself? Care to talk away with friends while knocking back a few cold ones with company? Perhaps you just want to drink your troubles away? Either way you go about it, you are more than welcome at the Barrel!

name: TARTARUS
description: TARTARUS is Aethers HOTTEST vampiric/goth night club and safe haven for the vampiric kind but.. if you are one of those mortals who always wanted to see the dark and wild side of our world, why not stop by?
We have a fully loaded bar with that of which you only will see upon entering our little realm. Need a hot night? Maybe a little love from our courts of the night, why not ask one?

Blood Raves, sacrifices? Yes... we have them. Care for some good music while you dance the night or your mortal life away? Leave it to our lord and DJ Redvayne and they will show you the rhythm of the night.
Beware the night or embrace it, the choice is yours.

name: The GATSBY
description: 18+ mansion that merges decadence with futurism. The GATSBY is the flagship nightclub of the Red Dragon Syndicate family from Jenova. A semi-nsfw establishment offering multiple chambers of entertainment and escapism alongside our cyberpunk inspired venue downstairs. Stop by KFC in chamber 14 after the nightclub closes. Jenova - Mist - Ward 28 - Plot 32 (next door to the Iceberg Lounge & across from Lost Woods Cafe)

name: King Kupo
description: Where moogles meet elegance! We focus on creating a luxury experience for the people of Eorzea. From our elegant moogle-themed dÃ©cor, to our special Kingcake, we offer a luxurious experience you will never forget.

Created from humble beginnings, King Kupo was created by the world-famous Mog Salesman as a small cafÃ© in Ishgard. After years of hard work, dedication, and an expensive rebranding, the small moogle-themed cafÃ© moved across the sea to become well established restaurant in Kugane.

name: Farmer's Attic
description: Farmer's Attic is a co-op where crafters, gatherers, and customers can meet for casual farmer's market RP and tax-free commerce on Sunday mornings. Each vendor is responsible for bringing their own merchandise and setting their prices â€” all profits go back to the vendor, with no house fees taken. Low-level crafters and gatherers are welcome and are in fact encouraged to drop by and sell their wares!

While the premise of the venue is commerce, it is a community oriented space that aims to foster camaraderie between disciples of the land and hand. So bring your best farmer's market outfit and get ready to barter at Aether's own locally sourced marketplace.

name: Nophica's Spring
description: Nophica's Spring Marketplace & Center for the Arts is home to six venues (and growing!), featuring something for everyone, from dining to entertainment, shopping, and more! Stop by Nophica's Spring Bistro for a drink, then head down to the Chobo Revue Theater and catch a show! Open every Wednesday!

name: FF14 NIGHTLIGHT MUSEUM
description: FF14 Nightlight Museum -  Relive Your Adventure! A Tribute To History And Our Dead Friends. Rest In Peace. - The Tour Starts From The Frontdoor Right. Continues On The Other Side. Upstairs We Have Some Art Highlights And A Restaurant, Downstairs A Party Location.

name: Zavina's Place
description: A smaller and more intimate club experience where you can dance the night away while throwing snowballs indoors! Throwback Thursdays every week Featuring resident DJ Zavina

name: Club Guilty Crown
description: A Cozy Nightclub with an anime themed menu looking to be a support in the community for the FFXIV playerbase!

name: The Apothecafe
description: The Apothecafe is, at first glance, what it says right on the tin: an apothecary fused with a cafe. There's plenty of bright, cozy spots to curl up in and enjoy the our offerings, but as with every light, it has its shadows. Given the nature of its owner, the cafe also serves as a safe space/neutral ground for otherworldly creatures and/or lawbreakers to conduct their business (as long as they behave, of course).

We're a roleplay venue welcoming RPers of all experience levels and styles (though we do tend to lean towards the heavier side of things) and our doors are open for RPing even when we're not staffed. So come drop by, pull up a chair, and wile away the hours with a bubbly potion, a warm meal, or perhaps even something more.

name: The Soft Spot
description: We provide a Safe Space at the Soft Spot for people who just want to chill, vibe and dance the night away! We have a plethora of cute beverages and appetizers for those who want to refresh and reenergize your evening along with our very own Services~ But if you want a place to feel at home, we are very much the kind of place that strives to become a comfort zone for others and feel like a second home to them!

name: Haunted House Escape
description: A time limited escape adventure in the haunted house! Some secret virus experiments were executed in the basement of a sugarcoated cafe. You will have to collect clues to help you out while dealing with hidden events, unknown enemies, and jumping puzzles. The situation was getting out of control and we need you to get the anti-virus reagent out there before it's too late! Total 5 areas to explore, time is ticking, will you be the survivor or become part of "them"...?

name: Club Anathema
description: WHAT WE ARE: Club Anathema is an NSFW 18+ gothic-industrial nightclub with a "be free, be yourselves" atmosphere. We encourage breaking out of your shell and giving in to your deepest, darkest desires to the sounds of thumping industrial music.

WHAT WE OFFER: LIVE music spun by our in-house DJ. Dancers, a bar, cages to fight or do naughty things in, whatever your heart desires. All RP is encouraged to be open if you feel comfortable doing so, this means you may see some things that make you feel uncomfortable, and that is the point. Get out of your comfort zone and live a little.

WHAT WE DON'T TOLERATE: While being open and free, that is not a free pass to ruin anyone else's enjoyment. Respect each other's boundaries. Harassment of any kind will not be tolerated. Unless stated otherwise in advance, no means no. Trolls and griefers will not be tolerated. We are here to be free of judgment and be comfortable with our true selves. Don't be a jerk and spoil that for others.

name: Kamuy Blossom Cafe
description: We're a cozy, Asian & water-themed cafe with delicious food, drinks, and alcohol while you enjoy some relaxing music. All sales, donations, and items go towards care packages for your fellow sprouts!

name: Catbar film lounge
description: Catbar Is focused on a quiet, relaxing rp environment for new and old players alike.
You are welcome to afk for along as you like!
Films will be streaming whenever we are open!

name: Wet & Wild Spa Resort
description: Rustic/Oriental themed bath house with full soak tubs (to /doze in), showerbeds, hot tubs to soak in and a watery dance floor and bar. Owner gives out free chocolates to every patron upon entry. Nail salon is available in venue for manicures and pedicures.

name: Undertaking Eorzea
description: Providing top of the line funerary care and services for all that live in Eorzea.  Our mortuary home includes a full service funeral parlor, wake hall with cash bar, and a more relaxed vibe downstairs in our lounge.

name: Lilac Lizard TeaHouse
description: A hyper casual SFW teahouse venue where you can relax after a long day of adventuring, preparing for a journey, or just need to get away from it all.

name: The Raven
description: [18+ NSFW] Nestled in the heart of Ishgard, The Raven is host to a wide menagerie of patrons and staff all eager to entertain, and be entertained. If you are looking for a new dark venue to spend your evenings, then look no further, we are waiting for you. We offer courts, gamba, drinks, music, and more. Come check it out for yourself.

name: Pandemonio
description: https://pandemonio.carrd.co/#about

name: THIRSTY
description: Underground nightclub home to the realest dirt, grime and poorly insulated chill for a good time. Rap, hip hop, and proud to introduce Chicago Footwork to the XIV community.

name: CLUB AQUA
description: Here at "CLUB AQUA "we are a HIGH-ENERGY 18+ night club that does everything we can to make your experience here as fun as possible. We offer services of SFW and NSFW from our courtesans with private rooms available for purchase while at the club, a full bar with a amazing selection and wonderful RP bartender(s). We have give-aways and games thru out the night. We offer VIP PACKAGED for a small fee see Peaches or Akeno, as well we offer a full sauna room for all guest looking to just sit back and enjoy the water. We have newly added Blackjack games held at the bar see bartender for rules. We like to let loose have fun and relax so please leave drama at the entrance doors. If you find you have any questions about what we offer seek any staff member in GOLD attire to further assist you.

name: The Diamond Falcon
description: The Diamond Falcon is an LGBTQ+ friendly bar with friendly vibes and live DJ. We are open every other Sunday.

name: Threshold
description: Threshold is Aetherâ€™s local dive bar that houses the BDSM community. People from all experience levels in BDSM are warmly welcomed as we continue to grow as a community and as individuals in knowledge, skills, and experiences. As you step into our venue youâ€™ll find open kink play and a night filled with kink performances. So grab a drink, take in the scenes and explore your wild side.
Open Sundays!
Jenova Mist, W14 P9

name: The Firebird Theatre
description: This winter, The Firebird Theatre will be presenting Charles Dickens' classic holiday tale, localized for Eorzea. We are excited and proud to present A Starlight Story. Please look forward to it!

name: The Royal Chambers
description: A BDSM-themed playground for the wicked and the sinful. The Royal Chambers is a lounge meant for those in the bdsm and kink community to feel welcome. We are a heavy-rp venue and require patrons and staff to be IC when on the premises. Our /say chat is allowed to be spicy but NSFW roleplay is only allowed in private rooms. We offered BDSM-themed rooms as well as casual-themed rooms, bookable staff, and plenty of RP on the main floor.

name: Spider Lily's Shade
description: "A FIELD OF BRIGHT RED FLOWERS BLOOMING IN THE MOONLIGHT, PAINTING THE PICTURE OF LONGING FOR ONE ANOTHER..."
Spider Lily's Shade is Halicarnassus - Goblet (W3P25) located adult themed RP venue. We aim to IC-ly provide services of high-end brothel establishment.
Rugged criminal trying to find a solace? Just a silent wanderer stumbling upon the threshold of this establishment?
All are welcome!

We always offer full bar, relaxing environment to spend your evening in - and perhaps, if one feels especially brave - our beautiful courtesans, Blooming Flowers are there to provide you company of your dreams.
So... Hidden in shadows of blooming Spider Lilies, what delight are you going to choose tonight?

name: The Sleepy Nomad
description: [2nd Thursdays of the month, 8:00 p.m. to 11:00 p.m. Eastern]

"Come in and stay awhile."â€”Drop by The Sleepy Nomad for comfort food, drinks, and wind down with friends featuring chill music and a relaxing atmosphere.  Feel free to consider RSVPing for you and your friends with staff until 15 minutes to open. Catering, delivery, and private bookings available. Gil's IC only, but donations are accepted.

description: We are a NSFW club that is an inclusive night club that makes people feel right at home, with fresh made drinks and friendly service. While we spin and make great tasting drinks, our staff is around to have idle chatter, dance, and even gamble right alongside you.

name: Vaguely Lewd
description: SAD LONELY LOSER CLUB GANG GANG SHIT. ALL VIBES. BIG CHILLIN.

description: Welcome to the Syndicate!

From our fully stocked bar to our gamblers retreat we have something for everyone. Supporting local bard bands and Twitch DJ's we keep the party alive. Looking to have a more intimate night? Our lovely experienced courtesans can give you an experience unlike any other.
Try your hand with any of our services and we promise you'll leave with a smile.

name: Yuukimura Teahouse
description: A small relaxing traditionally inspired teahouse, nestled in the heart of Limsa. Fresh beverages and sweets along with a serene atmosphere.

name: Club Cyberia
description: Primal DCâ€™s premiere cybercentric nightclub showcasing live music and media. We aim to infuse our love for FFXIV with our decadently curated lineup of artists & DJs from beyond the Eorzean landscape. Each show caters to a different set of talented DJs and producers that we wholeheartedly admire.
Our events have something special to offer each and every timeâ€”raffles, prizes, and in-game merch.

name: Wisteria Brewery
description: The Wisteria Brewery has taken charge of scrolls from a much simpler time in Eorzea to create custom brews for you to enjoy. The Wisteria Brewery or WB also hosts two floors for entertainment. Both floors host their own unique entertainment and venue style.
Come enjoy a brew and a unique venue experience at the WB.

name: The Dark Forest Cafe
description: Join us in our forest themed cafÃ© every Saturday evening for a RP friendly experience! Become enchanted by our live bards or enjoy a relaxing bath in our downstairs bath house. Our servers and bartenders will be glad to serve you drinks or food if you so desire! So come down and join us on Crystal/Coeurl in The Lavender Beds, Ward 25, Plot 6.

name: The White Pelican
description: Welcome to The White Pelican, a luxury beach rave venue.

The White Pelican encompasses the energy of a late-night party, the intimate conversations gathered around a bar, and the sophistication of a high-end lounge. We aim to create a space that encourages guests to interact with one another openly and experience a memorable night.
Bar chatter, a lit dance floor, electrifying music, private dancers, photo ops, gambling and more: The White Pelican offers something for everyone!

name: Kitsune Haven
description: A Far Eastern-themed club embodying the theme of "abandoned shrine turned nightclub". We strive to deliver a wide variety of Japanese music subcultures and genres through our live DJs. Paired together with a homely ambience and a unique aesthetic, Kitsune Haven aims to be Crystal's hub for all sorts of J-Music and Visual Kei.

name: The Kings Crown
description: a fine place for rogues, reverends, royalty and everything in-between

name: Love Me A Latte
description: Whether you are alone or have someone to hold, I hope you will join me to help celebrate Valentione's Day! Come in and have a seat or take a coffee to go. The cafe is located in the FC house for the WAYWARD MYSTIC in room #4.
I hope you take a peek at our discord and plan to visit our cozy basement tavern. Can't wait to see you!

name: Reverie Jazz Club and Lounge
description: Whether you're looking for a calm bar to chill at or a place to lounge and listen to music, Reverie's the spot to be. We pride ourselves on a chill atmosphere and excellent service. Every Wednesday we have a host of bards playing their best, most soothing sounds, a lovely lounge area, and a fantastic bar with staff ready to serve you the entire time you're there. And after hours, there's time for a soak in our hot tubs down below!
We also offer VIP rooms if you wanna get away from the crowd. If a particular staff member catches your eye, you can rent them out for some private, SFW conversation in our VIP rooms.

name: Everlight
description: A neon-infused club filled with inspiring rooms and drinks to put the spark back in your night. Enjoy some time at our bar, on the dance floor, or some private time with a muse!

name: The Body Shoppe
description: ð•¿ð–ð–Š ð•­ð–”ð–‰ð–ž ð•¾ð–ð–”ð–•ð–•ð–Š, an atypical tatouage parlour, adult & occult refuge. One of the first boutiques of its kind, it encourages a safe mature space to indulge in the intimacy of artistic expression among other ''things.'' This little Hovel is Neutral Turf so no rival drama. Criminal Bosses and Patrons alike Welcome. Get your Jollies. {Note: DMRP, immoral themes. No Lalas.}  Scheduled Openings the end of each month. Appointments OK. Walk ins OK.

name: The Rabbit Hole
description: Welcome to the Rabbit Hole, a modern basement venue with live DJs, gamba, games and more!

name: Crystal Night Club
description: Crystal Night Club is a Night Club for all walks of life. We believe that when you embrace the glow than love will always shine though. We offer 18+ services as well as a resident dj to dance the night away. We have a variety of staff that are good with sprout rpers or the experienced rper. We want to help any and all find their glow to feel nothing but love and acceptance.

description: The Soda and Dessert lounge with a little bard music. SFW atmosphere with a pop of imagination in roleplay. So come join us by embracing the soda kingdom at its fullest.

description: The Sinners Sanctum is an 18+ venue which provides an immersive experience in alternative styling. Here we cater those labeled outcasts by society so we can live as our true selves. On the surface we can blend in but once you dig a little deeper, that's when the beast comes to play.

notices.message: This venue is open every OTHER Sunday. Please check their discord to see if this venue is open!

name: The Dark Garden

name: Club PINK
description: P.I.N.K. Is an adult-themed, sensual venue. A playground for the hedonist, where we focus fully on servicing our clients with the utmost care and detail. We offer a friendly and engaging staff and a myriad of delectable offerings for any club goer. All are welcome here!

**Level 1 Glamour stores**
**Full class gearset Stores**
**Cafe**

name: Cruxx Venue
description: Cruxx's is a stylish Goth Club in Halicarnassus. Bar, rp/erp, DJ and more. Come check us out!

name: The Comfy Corner

name: The Golden Dahlia
description: Welcome to the hidden gem that is the Golden Dahlia - a lounge full of temptation and fun tucked away beneath an inconspicuous cafÃ©.

Here at the Dahlia, we provide a safe and inclusive space for all kinds of roleplay. Between our dancers, bartenders, and courts, it'll be hard to find yourself at a loss for company! Join us for Music, Games, Immersive Roleplay, Drinks, and so much more.~ You'll find exactly what you need, tucked away at the Dahlia. â™¦

description: The Hidden Hotsprings is a bathhouse and nightclub located on Seraph. Previously run on Aether, the hideaway has created great friendships and now returns to provide you with a late-night destination.

Or you can venture right on up to The Last Carrot bar and indulge yourself in the hoppiest of drinks. Sit back and relax to the in game music or tune in to our DJ rocking those LoFi beats to ease away your day.

description: Going on 3 years of weekly Trance music shows with artists throughout the Midwest. Music first venue, in person or on stream staying as faithful to the IRL music set experience as we can. Full Trance sets followed by late night Happy Hardcore, find us IRL from Minnesota to Chicago!

name: Wonderland
description: Wonderland is a nightclub located in the Goblet. We offer live DJ-music, gambling and much more.
Follow us down the rabbit hole for a uniqe clubbing-experience!!!!
-we are all mad here....

name: Unwritten
description: Unwritten adventurer's tavern is the place to relax, grab a drink and something to eat, and share a story.

name: Aquarius
description: A relaxing nightclub where you can come down and relax from stress of savage and enjoy some music provided by our djâ€™s

name: Valkyrie Club
description: Step into the afterlife at Ishgard's finest venue. All are welcome to enjoy drinks, dancers, photography, auctions, and more in our uniquely icy setting.

name: Apollo Night Club
description: **Description**:

Welcome to the Apollo Night Club! We are a Greek God themed night club providing entertainment to the mortal realm. We strive to provide every patron the godliest of experiences. At our venue, we offer a variety of Roleplay Services, Fortune Readings, Gamba, an immersive Heavy RP Bar literally stocked to the heavens to satiate even the most godliest of gullets, and  room rentals so you and your friends can enjoy one of our themed Deity Dwellings! Our divine entertainment is provided by weekly guest DJs! So come on in and experience the wealth and wrath of the gods every Sunday and may the prosperity of the gods shine down upon you! Drinks, Dancing and Debauchery always afoot!

name: ONI
description: ONI is the sickest place to be on a Friday night because it is so god damn unique! As you take an elevator into the void, the building has 3 stories in which you can either dance on the roof, the dance floor, or even from the basement to tune in to the amazing jams of our DJ for the night. It even has a fantastic hidden bar, for the yakuza business person inside you. Did I say Yakuza? Yes I did! This bar is run by none other than the most dangerous criminals in Eorzea and their ring leader is by far the most ferocious, ME!! So, if you want to get a feel for this action and what the Yakuza lifestyle is like, then come on down to Goblin! You donâ€™t want to miss it!

name: Fire & Ice
description: Fire & Ice! Designed with two contrasting themes under one roof! Each side represents Fire and Ice respectively. Get cozy and warm up amidst our frosty themed Ice side, or relax amongst the comforting flames of our Fire side. Open for all events, including Glamour competitions, Trivia night, Barding performances, and DJ events. We look forward to seeing you at Fire & Ice!

description: A fae-themed SFW light-RP cafe & bar! We offer song requests on our orchestrion, free photography, and in-house games!
