We have experienced bartenders, gambling, booming music and enticing courts & hosts that are bound to fill up your night with a mind-blowing experience and leave you with a little taste for more.

name: The Snack Shack
description: Located down the stairs from the hotsprings in Ishgard's Empyreum, The Snack Shack is a sfw bar and grill that offers snacks to the weary traveler visiting the 1st ward and 57th plot of Empyreum on Gilgamesh/Aether.

name: Sweep 'n Suds
description: Is our apartment a mess? Laundry heaping up? In need of some mending? Sweep 'n Suds is your solution! Employment contracts are available or SNS doors are open weekly for walk-ins. Always open for scheduled/contracted RP

description: "A Club that gives a whole new meaning to 'Kupo!' - We aim to host Truth or Dare, Auctions (80/20), and Club Nights with Twitch DJs, while offering Drinks, Spa and Dance Services!"

name: Red Lycoris
description: Welcome to Red Lycoris, we offer a plethora of services and a lovely atmosphere. Come join us for a night of thrills and good vibes with friends.

name: Komorebi
description: ðš”ðš˜ðš–ðš˜ðš›ðšŽðš‹ðš’âœ¤ *Dance Bar & Lounge offers you food & drink, wellness, and company* âœ¤ Take a seat in our bar & lounge or dance your way into the evening with our beautiful courtesans' âœ¤ Our upstairs bath house with dedicated healers are ready for you! Hop in freely once you're done downstairs, or fresh out of one of our lovingly decorated rooms. âœ¤ Our location is open 24/7 outside of operating hours, as we are dedicated to providing you with an immersive location for mature, 18+ roleplaying opportunities.

name: Moon River
description: For the weary wanderers, perhaps naught much else could soothe the soul like sipping on spirits amidst laughter and music under the calm of the stars. Should you find yourself seeking repose, it might prove worthwhile to leap once more, at journeyâ€™s end.

name: The Hivemind
description: The Hivemind

Owned and operated by VTuber Kira_Aurora was designed to be a place to unwind and chill and just enjoy the music and interaction with other players. We're a nice place to lay back/afk. We sometimes offer Bar Roleplay and Gamba. Come, bring your friends down to the experiences of the DJ's of Eorzea. We are truly about the music.

name: Honeysuckle Teahouse
description: Honeysuckle is an RP18+ Teahouse offering baths and companionship! We are a group of friends that love to meet new people and hang out. Our venue has been around for over a year, and we would love it if you came by to see us!

description: Relief comes in many forms, and Heavenside offers all of them.
â€¢ Soak in our Hot Mineral Water baths and sauna

name: UA Academia Lounge
description: Eorzea's original auction house and premiere dance club, UA Lounge is your destination whether it be to dance the night away, meet new people, buy, or sell, you're sure to have an enjoyable evening. Our staff is eager to help you have the night of your life, and they don't bite, unless you ask them to. With various events being offered, you never know what the night will bring!

description: "We are taking you on a journey to discover the sick beats of the universe using our trusty Celestial Train named "Starburst" ! "
The train will make different stops and the whole style of the club will change! It will also bring different vibes and new events for you to enjoy!

name: The Lion's Maw
description: The Lion's Maw is a Somnus Den and Fighting Arena. Located in the Goblet, it aims to offer a unique gladiatorial experience to those brave enough to enter.

name: Ink Nightclub
description: Our exclusive nightclub experience offers some of the top live DJs on Aether, stacked VIP packages, giveaways, theme nights galore, and a full casino floor.
High roller and learning nights are available for Blackjack on the regular. Customize your experience with our entertainers, photography, and tarot readings.
Think of something you want and don't see it? Ask and we'll see what we can do to fulfill your wildest dreams.

name: Asmodeus
description: Asmodeus strives to create a safe space for the degenerates of Eorzea to congregate. We are LGBT+ owned with a diverse staff seeking to bring you nothing but the best alternative club experience.
Our outstanding DJs create the perfect musical backdrop with music that spans industrial, metal, nu metal, rock, darkwave, and more.
Whether youâ€™re looking for a little friendly company or bringing a party of friends, Asmodeus caters to your darkest desires, from handcrafted specialty drinks to our kink-friendly hellâ€™s belles.
Stepping into the club brings a sense of luxury, of high class, with a twist of the demonicâ€“ a walk on the wild side if you dare.

name: OMNIA Nightclub
description: Enjoy an interactive nightlife experience with a variety of musical talent, friendly staff and beautiful party people. Omnia means "everything" and we're here to give you all that your heart desires.

name: The Twisted Blossom
description: Tiny Goth Speakeasy and Au Ra Sanctuary, We Have Kumis! Come in for a time to relax, hangout, and enjoy the antics of the Auri!

description: Beneath the Index of Hyper knowledge lies the hyper warehouse where our DJ's run wild at the Underground. Find your way through the house to the secret entrance to party below. Amongst the remains of Hyper themes past stands a bar with a skilled bartender, and a booth for our DJ's to go crazy with new and experimental vibes for your listening pleasure!

name: Midnight Lily
description: Midnight Lily is a RP dinner venue, we serve food and drinks and offer SFW Hosting

name: The Canvas
description: The Canvas is an art studio/lounge focused on doing live art commissions! Come by to commission artists, or enter our weekly art raffle done by one of our artists!

name: Ancient Ram Tavern
description: Welcome oh welcome my friends!~
Come all those who lurk in the shadows, who hide behind masks and those otherworldly or undead, for you have arrived at your place of respite from this wretched world
This is an rp venue for supernatural and darker themed characters who wish to explore dark stories and plot including, but not limited to vampires, werewolves, witches and others shrouded in mystery!

name: Bad Boys Bar
description: A bar exclusively for men and/or those identifying as men. Basically, a relaxing "safe place" for men who seek the company of other men. A fun and erotic environment to cater to the aspirations of gay men. The utopia where they will be welcomed to get together, express, interact and make strong connections...in more ways than one. Sweet n' spicy under one roof; a combination of delicious drinks and a team of handsomely adoring men willing to offer all forms of companionship. However, despite our true focus, all are welcome to visit and partake in what the BBB has to offer.

name: Dreaming Demon Cafe
description: A wonderful yet calm Cafe and Diner for you to relax in, chat, bring a date, anything you might like to do that will drive that stress away. With Tea, Coffee, Breakfast, and Dinner we are sure that when you come here you will leave with a wonderful smile on your face! (Upstairs in our FC!)

name: VLVT DRMS
description: VLVT DRMS is a safe for work dance venue and bar lounge, lavishly decorated with a cozy and warm atmosphere to both entice and relax even the weariest of wanderers. We strive to bring a safe, calming space into our wonderful community, hoping that each visit will leave you in the clouds! Whether you're looking to grab a few drinks, make pleasant conversation or dance the night away, there is a member of staff that is eager to spend their time dreaming with you. Come dream with us tonight!
To enter the venue use /doze next to the desk. To exit the venue jump on the floor lamp.

name: The Eclipse
description: dance Music Fun meeting new players
Our Venue is based on Friends who love to spend time together and Giving new djâ€™s a love to play

name: The Shepherd's Rest
description: The Shepherd's Rest is a place to relax and unwind from the sun's adventures. A little rustic tavern/inn where locals and travelers alike can find a bit of comfort. Enjoy traditional Coerthan cuisine with an old Eastern Highland family recipe with the house special, the Shepherd's Pie, or the savory and slow simmered melt-in-your-mouth beef potage.
Enjoy Ishgardian and Coerthan drinks in front of a cozy fire or with friends both new and old. Find rest for a night in the small inn upstairs, with comfortable beds and clean and crisp linens.

name: Kashmir Club
description: Come dance the night to the hits of the 80's, 90's, classic and hard rock by DJ Velannah twitch.tv/velannah

name: Scarlet Devil
description: The Scarlet Devil is a 18+ RP we offer our own style of mixed drinks to indulge in devilish desires as well as a bath tucked away for your comfort. Upstairs is our VIP lounge, which is built for more premium patrons who are looking for a private setting. While taking  a visit to our sin-filled retreat we have dancers and a bard to entertain our patrons.

name: Little Bee Cafe
description: -We're open alternating Mondays! Please check our website or join our Discord to know when we're open!-

A brand new SFW roleplay experience for anyone wishing to have a relaxing evening! Our cafe features a full menu of sweets and treats and our hosts will be there to keep you entertained at no charge. This is the perfect venue to stop by if you're just dipping your toes into roleplay or if you're looking to enjoy an evening without any pressure!

name: Midnight Sun
description: The Midnight Sun is a club with a welcoming and open community that loves to party together at the end of a long week.
Come join us under the midnight sky.

name: The Light's Chosen
description: An RP venue where people can relax and enjoy themselves. New to RP? No problem! We are here to help! LGBTQ+ 18+ friendly
Famfrit-Shiro-Ward 26/Plot 43

name: The Red String
description: The Red String is a bar and lounge situated within the boughs of the Lavender Beds.
Owned and operated by an active pirate captain, people can expect patrons from all walks of life to come in and share a fine drink. The first sip will have one feel the rhythm of life in a glass.

name: Ignition
description: A night club with live djs and giveaways!

name: Eros' Elixir Emporium
description: Eros' Elixir Emporium is a small fae inspired apothecary ran by Eros Montenegro. Eros previously only offered his alchemical services to his Free Company but recently decided to offer his services to the public. He offers a variety of high quality elixirs/potions for raiding, deep dungeons, crafting, and gathering!

name: Azalea's Comfy Cafe
description: A comfy, relaxing corner of Eorzea that's open to anyone who is looking to wind down after raiding, pregame for a big night out, or just to relax for the evening!

name: Sip & Brew
description: Our little cafÃ© is here to provide high quality product, in a relaxed environment. Please take your time and enjoy a refreshment and unwind in our dining area, library lounge or gardens. Close to the Lavender Southwest aetheryte, or straight down the docks to the left!

name: The Wanderer's Respite Inn and Tavern
description: SFW RP- A place where folks can rest their heads after a long day. Drinks specials, snacks, an open stage for bards, poets and other stage performances. Relaxed vibes.

name: The Crimson Lotus
description: Hingan themes, black and red, hot music, hot ramen, and hot geishas. The Crimson Lotus' goal as a venue is to be somewhere that you can come to relax and be more than another face in the crowd.

Looking for some excitement? The Crimson Lotus offers live music from a diverse collection of Live DJ's every Thursday night. Bust out your glowsticks, turn on a stream, and dance the night away with dozens of other people while vibing to some of Eorzea's top performers!

For all of our high rollers out there, The CrimLo also offers an assortment of casino games for you to try your hand at. Our dealers have all been trained to offer you lightning fast rounds, and we offer all of the features you expect from your favorite games like splits and double downs. Our games are even tax free for our VIP patrons!
Not your cup of Doman tea? Come hangout at our bar and enjoy some of our eastern themed food and cocktails, delivered to you by one of our immersive roleplay bartenders.

No matter where you go in the Crimson Lotus you'll also have access to our talented array of Geishas. They're sure to dazzle and amaze you with their dancing, or offer you an indulging conversation to pass your time.
Come stop by and find out why this is one of the fastest growing venues on Aether. You're sure to remember the Crimson Lotus and they're sure to remember you when you come back in for a second visit!

name: The Bookend Lounge
description: The Bookend Lounge is a speakeasy bar fronting as a bookstore. We have an open stage, blackjack, and drinks aplenty. It's a great place to hang out and mingle with friends new and old. So come, take a look behind the shelves.

name: The Lost Factory
description: Welcome to The Lost Factory ! Take a drink and have fun ðŸ˜‰

name: Eternal Eclipse
description: Welcome to Eternal Eclipse, a new gothic LGBTQ+ night club that is based on Siren but currently housed on Maduin. We are looking to create an environment that is friendly and chill, a place where the misfits can feel at home. We offer many services and would love to open ourselves to everyone who needs a safe place where there is no judgment. We offer interactive and private role-play experiences, open Wednesdays and Sundays. Please join us in taking over the nights under the eclipse.

name: Abbiocco Fine Dining
description: Abbiocco Fine Dining offers an unforgettable evening of attentive staff, excellent food, and live entertainment. A perfect place to come with a special someone, a group of friends or family, or even solo. **Note:** We are not open on the first Monday of the month.

name: Insomnia
description: Insomnia. Where the party doesnâ€™t rest until you do. Come on down, because weâ€™ve got something for everyone. Fancy a dance? Take a spin on our dance floor to live music. Dancing got you thirsty? Grab a drink at the bar. Take a soak in a hot tub or soak in the sights of our vivacious dancers for your viewing pleasure. Who knew late nights could be this fun?

name: The Rebel Underground
description: Drink your night away at this grunge speakeasy hidden in the basement of your ordinary Hingashi bathhouse. The Rebel Underground is a place for free spirits and bad behaviour, and promises to keep you entertained with an immersive roleplaying experience.
A night at this shady establishment includes a stocked bar, triple triad matches, gambling, live guitarist(s) and more!

name: Salt + Sanctuary
description: We offer a unique atmosphere with food, drinks, music, and dancing. All services come with extra salt, attitude, and sarcasm. We encourage people to cut loose and have fun; newcomers need to understand the service is meant to be bad, rude, and above all SALTY. We urge people to join in the fun!

name: Murphy's Law
description: Murphy's Law is an Irish-style bar and club located on Aether - Gilgamesh. Open Monday nights 9pm - 12am EST, we have live DJs driving the dancefloor, a full menu of drinks and food, raffles/giveaways, themed events and glam.
It's a little rough around the edges in here, a little rowdy. Ok a lot of both. Degen city. But that's how we like it!
Get in the mix!

name: Ul'dah Fight Club
description: ***Ul'dah Fight Club*** only at Primal - Lamia - Goblet - Ward 1 Plot 19
***Date & Time*** - Every Wednesday at <t:1655947800:t> until <t:1655960400:t> (time is displayed automatically in your time zone)!
***Event Description***

Deep within Goblet's Brimming Heart lies an underground fight club! Fight your friends or randoms, place bets, and win big! Wanna just relax and watch the carnage? You can enjoy our live announcer and relax at the bar and grill!
All details of rules and discord at <https://theholybodyufc.carrd.co/>

name: Shizen Nightclub
description: Shizen is a Japanese Mature Themed Club with a modern touch in the basement,
which can be found inside the protective walls of Ul'dah The Goblet.
Come join us on the dancefloor
have a drink or dance untill morning!

name: The Underground
description: Beneath the surface of Uldah lays Eorzea's best hidden night life gem. With only one event per month, The Underground was designed for those who just like to kick back and listen to some great talent while enjoying the company of friends. The only prerequisite for a night at the Underground is the love of a good dance party! Owner and designer, Gilae, handpicks the DJs to perform and along with her bestie and Manager, Forgiven, plan each event at this clandestine club to be a fun, interactive, experience. If you're a DJ and you'd like the opportunity to perform at Underground, reach out to us! Event dates are posted on the Underground's discord so please come by and check us out!

name: The BirdHouse
description: We are a (SFW) Lala focused nightclub! All races Welcome!!
Are you a LALA and looking for a place to have fun?
Then come out to The Bird House!!
We have drinks, DJ, and cool friends to make!
All races welcome!

name: The Moonvessel
description: â€œWe are a ragtag group of individuals who want nothing more than to bridge the gap between The Source and the Stars beyond.â€ - New AppleSeed Adventurers

We at The Moonvessel have three principles: Creativity, Individuality, and Uniqueness. We call everyone a â€œStarâ€, because each person has their own identity and no matter who or what they are, they are as beautiful as one. Here at The Moonvessel, you are encouraged to think outside the box and be yourself, free from all judgment. Think of this place as your own personal safe haven.

name: Poisoned Pestle
description: Poisoned Pestle is an apothecary that specializes in high quality, rare, and experimental potions. We strive to meet the needs of our customers, and if you don't see what you're looking for among our shelves, there is a possibility it can be created and/or procured for you (via RP). Feel free to browse our wares and tomes, or sit down and rest your weary feet. If you're feeling adventurous, perhaps you would be interested in trying our experimental potions?

name: Sundragon Tavern
description: The Sundragon Tavern is an RP venue based in Ishgard's Firmament. Here, we serve Ishgardian food and drinks in a warm and comforting setting. Some nights we will have live barding or our tavern's "radio" music will be provided. OPEN TWO FRIDAYS A MONTH! Please, follow us on discord for announcements ðŸ™‚

name: Cheshire Cat
description: A charming and cosy place that us purrfect to unwind after a hard day. Meet new likeminded people as you relax by our fireplace or have a drink from our lovely bartendster.
If you're feeling particularly curious, you might just find yourself falling down a rabbit hole and discovering all sorts of surprises.
So, come on over and let's see where the night takes you...

name: Iced Out
description: We're obsessed with music above all!

name: The Juice Saloon
description: A rootinâ€™ and tootinâ€™ cowboy experience in Aetherâ€™s very own Faerie! Join for an authentic saloon styled bar with country music, barmaids, gambling, and a selection of cowgirls and cowboys ready to line dance the night away! Come in your best western gear and immerse yourself in the finest Wild West night Eorzea has to offer!

name: Good Room
description: If youâ€™re looking for an underground club experience, look no further. Come vibe with us.

name: A Cat's Terrace
description: Located in The Sultana's Breath, you will find A Cat's Terrace and inside there is delicious food, drinks, entertainment, and finely crafted gear for your adventures. Our goal is to help you unwind your soul and lose yourself to the charming atmosphere. We continue to search far and wide for the best entertainment and products, then bring it to the Terrace in for our patrons in one convenient location.

name: Dreams of a Shore
description: A small cafe to unwind in, while enjoying coffee with company from another world. Are you enjoying your somber reverie with us?

name: Weaver's Nest
description: Need a place to interweave your love or a private room? The Weaver's Nest love hotel has you covered~!
Quite and calm atmosphere, with beautiful rooms, made to put you and your loved ones in the mood.
Included a minibar for solo visitors~
Come hang out with us or your friends~ Or bring a love one for a private moment~

name: Atlas
description: Welcome to Atlas, Ishgard's premire seafood restaurant! Come warm up with us below deck in our cozy, nautical-themed dining hall. Whether you're here for a three-course meal, or simply here for a drink at our bar, our lovely staff will be sure to take care of you!

Atlas is the passion project of Sylvas and Farah Vex, two Viera that share a love for all the fine dining establishments around Eorzea. Our goal at Atlas is to provide the best dining experience possible for our customers and ensure they always leave looking forward to their next visit.

name: Lufeena's Haven
description: We are a Temple devoted to a pantheon of Goddesses of our own design and we are an adult venue that offers private services to paying customers OVER 18 as well as a free to interact SFW Temple environment for private worship. We have a calming atmosphere and a Chapel we hope to hold Player weddings in so that cross world couples may get married.

name: The Colosseum Cabaret and Casino
description: In a class all its own, we present The Colosseum Cabaret and Casino, a relaxing Roman themed environment with quality entertainment. Come for the diverse music in our unique dance hall, and stay for the thrill of our exciting casino games and shows. Stop by our Eorzean Essence Award winning bar, and enjoy our fine collection of themed drinks from around the continent. Enjoy the performance of our gladiators as they fight for honor and recognition in our cage suspended above the venue. Our one of a kind Kupo Race is sure to impress as you cheer-on the dancers racing across the colorful tracks. Treat yourself right and join us for our unrivaled Colosseum experience.

name: Element
description: We offer DeathRoll Tourney, Gamba with VIP higher stakes, Tarot Reading. We encourage RP for all.

name: Sector 7
description: **Open every second Friday. Join our Discord for our schedule.**

Step into a fully immersive roleplay nightclub, complete with DJ's to help you dance the night away and dancers to entertain! Featuring full SFW and NSFW services as well as beautiful decorated private rooms, this is the place for both private parties and big nights out!
Please note: We do not allow OOC interactions of any kind (within reason). This includes shouts and yells along with any typical Twitch DJ spam.

name: Greystone Cellar and Tavern
description: It's Saturday night, and you just finished a shift at your local bar or your a patron looking for a night cap before you head back to the inn or your home for the evening. Maybe for you, the night is just getting started! Whatever your reason, Greystone Tavern is there for you.

Greystone Tavern is a casual in-character late night tavern focused to give you a chance to breathe and decompress from the evening's events or a way to get a late night fix if you had to start your roleplay night late. Let our music and our bartenders give you the opportunity to make your feel at home.

name: Kitty Twister
description: Meowdy partner! Come on down to Kitty Twister! We're a little bar dedicated to serving up ice-cold beer and playing the best Country, Blues, and Classic Rock. So if you're looking for a change of pace from from EDM and fancy nightclubs, throw on those cowboy boots and come on down!

name: The Nightingale's Song CafÃ©
description: The Nightingaleâ€™s Song CafÃ© is a rustic ishgardian establishment that is located in the Firmament that aim to provide a comfortable place for both local and far traveled guests. The cafÃ© always have something sweet, light meals and a varied menu of drinks, both hot and cold. The menu is a fine combination from local dishes and far eastern dishes, so guests could choose something familiar or perhaps try something exotic.

Guests do get tended by our friendly staff and there is always many fine places to sit at. A favorite is the middle floor if the guest would wish to chatter with the staff, as there is not many dull moments at the Nightingaleâ€™s Song. Downstairs we have our lovely bar and further more seating and our stage where bards can play if they so wish to.

name: The Tranquil Fowl Inn & Bath
description: A bath house that has an attached onsen and private garden bath outside. Free entry into the baths inside with calming waters and soothing teas. Come relax the night away and lounge to your hearts content. Mayhaps book a room with your significant other and woo the night away â¤ï¸

name: Bunny Burrow Host Club
description: Welcome to The Bunny Burrow Host Club! Here at BBHC, we focus on SFW experiences with our hosts, with optional add-ons to enhance your experiences with our lovely bunny boys. Enjoy drinks, teas, juices, and snacks while chatting with your favorite hosts, and form genuine connections with all sorts of bunnies! We are LGBTQIA+ run and friendly, but we believe there's a bun for everyone here â¤ï¸ Come on by and see what we can do for you~.

name: The Whispering Masquerade
description: The Whispering Masquerade is a hostess venue focused on providing the perfect companion to entertain you for the evening. Are you looking to discuss the intricacies of the fall of the Allagan Empire? A drinking partner? Quiet conversation in a themed room? A good luck charm at the roulette table? Whatever your desires, we will provide an accommodating Whisper for the evening. Our Whispers are well trained in a variety of arts, skills, and topics of knowledge to ensure your experience brings intellectual, emotional and cultural fulfillment.
Whatever your heart desires, all it takes is a Whisper.

name: The Shoe
description: A cozy cafe, library, and lounge in a little corner of Ishgard.

name: Garden of Madness
description: Hidden deep on Etheirys, there is a book written by the most knowledgeable of Ancients . A book so sacred that when opened will spread love and happiness throughout the star, removing its dark past. The book has been found. We who found it invite one and all to this magical journey as we prepare to write a new chapter in Etheirys' story. Welcome to the Garden Of Madness

name: Ember
description: We are a Dark Themed Nightclub focused into Music Metal , Rock , Industrial , Dark Techno  etc.. who try to take care all their customers with our amazing Staff. and trying to improve every week. is a place where whitout an doubt you should visit.

name: A Bookstore
description: Welcome to a bookstore! You appear to have stumbled into a random bookstore, with quiet librarians in a dark, warm cozy setting. Shelves line the wall, littered with books from different ages, varying in genres. Throughout your exploration of the small library, small noises can be heard faintly from beneath the floor but the librarians pay no attention to them. Suspiciously, an old window panel lays near the entrance, almost out of place as the librarians can be caught glancing at them every now and then.

name: Clepsydra
description: Tucked away amongst the ruins of the abandoned Sharlayan colony in the Dravanian Hinterlands, Clepsydra is a home turned place of healing for the body, mind and soul. From the sights, sounds and smells, relaxation is sure to come to those that seek a moment away from the world to rest and heal or simply regale the owner or friends with tales of exploration and exploits and woes. Owned and lived in by Usynthuv Adlais, any that visit would be greeted by the wayward Sharlayan and offered whatever she can provide that they desire; knowledge, tea, tinctures, wound care, general healing, massage, and anything else that visitors may need. Except food. There is only soup and it is not a good soup. Good for you, but beyond bland.

name: Ukiyo
description: Immersive RP

name: Naheo's
description: Naheo's is an LGBTQ+ hideaway here to provide a supportive queer space for in-character play (collaborative or private) and a calm, relaxing environment for everyone, whether you want to just take a load off and chat or you're interested in testing the RP18+ waters, and of course our experienced character players!
If you're interested in: gamba, our fully stocked bar, a quiet night or weekend with a sweetheart, movie nights and/or live letter parties, come on by!
If you're interested in renting the house after hours that's now available with a nightly rate of 100k, just let me know while open or on Discord!

name: Seven Circles
description: (+18) (LGBTQ+) Seven Circles nightclub prides itself on being a friendly and safe space for all walks of life. We feature a full selection of lovely dancers, live music, half priced special drinks, SFW and NSFW services for all your desires. Special additions include an in house photographer and artist! Come join us and sin the night away!

name: Phantasia
description: The number one cyberpunk club in Eorzea! [18+ | LGBTQIA+ Positive] We offer dancing, music, drinks, V.I.P., gambling, and companions. Offering an immersive RP experience, Phantasia will augment your desires.

name: The Drunken Wyvern
description: Come on in "It's 5o'cock somewhere" we have freindly faces and fair prices we're about the drinks not the gil"

name: Wisteria Tea House
description: Wisteria tea house is a relaxing spot where anyone can feel free to stop and visit. you may feel free to order a cup of tea or enjoy our relaxing outdoor bath. Come check out our discord if you would like to chat with us some more or would like updates on our seasonal menus

name: Siren's Call
description: Siren's Call is home to many lovely bards and bands in Eorzea. Looking for a place to relax in a cozy and warm atmosphere? Come for some relaxation and fun times under the melodies of our alluring bards and bands.
The Venue is located in the Lavender Beds on a beautiful mountain top. Siren's Call is ready to welcome you and your friends.

name: The Officer's Lounge
description: Welcome to ye who venture cross the seas. The Officer's Lounge is a Maelstrom funded izakaya run by the former crew of The Treasure Cruise and their associates. What is an izakaya? We operate as a late night bar with snacks and cheap filling dishes to go along side our drinks.
Come on in and enjoy the libations!

name: Exo Aeterna
description: Exo Aeterna is Primalâ€™s premiere night club destination, home to our incredible, talented resident DJs KitKat and SWAGE! Open every Saturday night, Exo is known for their amazing parties, stunning location and hosting the best guest DJs from Moonpie Promotions and across Eorzea!

name: Lali-ho Maid Cafe
description: The first Aether Lalafell Maid Cafe is like an adorable slice of cake~! It's sweet, bright and filled with goodies.
We have an extensive Menu with all the Maid Cafe perks! Moe Moe Dances, Janken and many other fun games to play.
We offer Talks and Custom Polaroids with our smol maids for you to enjoy with a Cuteness Sensory Overload~!
Our cute venue is bright and always cheery with lala maids sitting in only spots lalas could fit! Soft couches and sweet ambiance awaits with lots of cheek pinching lala laughs!

name: ENVY
description: ENVY is a new 18+ SFW Casino and Bar! Come enjoy a hand of blackjack, a fully stocked bar and Aether's finest entertainment as you dance the night away! As patrons of many venues, we wanted to open our own that specialized in what we loved most - gambling and good vibes!

name: Applebottom's
description: Applebottom's is an LGTBQ+ (21+) Dive bar that specializes in interactive RP that immerses people into their wild side! The main goal is to be a space for people that feel like they have none. Many have found it a peaceful oasis to have some fun and be themselves. No judgments as everyone is welcome. Sex positive and loving, Applebottom's is an adults only venue focused on interactions with mature adults.

name: Club Hades
description: Club Hades is one of Excalibur's premiere nightclubs with the most affordable drinks and entertainment on the data center! A venue casually ran by friends every Friday evening, providing a place for anyone and everyone (18+) to come and hang out, vibe, listen to tunes, socialize or RP. Club Hades offers a multitude of role-playing experiences via our staff. We employ bartenders at our large double bar, security throughout the venue, dancers(some of which provide private services if asked) all over our many stages and live playlists via our DJs Twitch stream. Come start your weekend off right with Club Hades and hang out, socialize, RP, drink, dance or just vibe and listen to the tunes!

name: The Crystal Wind
description: The Crystal Wind is a small cafÃ© that acts as a haven for wanderers. Here time stops so that you might rest your weary souls. Come by and have a chat with the owner, commission something, or just relax in the comforting aura of the space.

name: The Void
description: The cosmos's haunt for the underground. Delve into your chaotic nature within this sanctuary of heathens. Take one of the many secret aether-ports to bring you the entrance of The Void. Criminals, villians, unsavory characters are all welcome here, including those of the light who may just be in need of less that legal needs. Kaliban runs a tight crew in the underground of the Ishgardian alleyways. Hidden but omnipresent, enjoy the scene without fear of guards or soldiers within the dim-lit embrace. Forgot to bring your "recreationals"? Ask Seno what delectables she has tucked away. Check weapons at the door. Hail Chaos!
**(Mostly SFW, marked NSFW due to topics openly discussed occasionally)**

name: Moonlit Fang: The Hunt
description: â€œ*Are youâ€¦?*â€
â€œ*Are you..?*â€
â€œ*Running through the wood?*â€
â€œ*Please donâ€™t call out..*â€
â€œ*Theyâ€™ll catch you as you flee~.*â€
Join in this horror-style maze of a board game. Are you cunning? Should you sneak? Or go out in a blaze of glory? 3 Game modes to test your skills.
Will you survive?

name: Club Purrlesque
description: Club Purrlesque is a warm, welcoming gentleman's-style club offering companionship, entertainment, hand-crafted cocktails, and luxury accommodations.

name: Hearth & Snow
description: As the cold Ishgardian climate bites at your weary bones when you are travelling, we at the Hearth & Snow bring a warm, joyous experience to those wanting a hot meal with some quiet atmosphere and perhaps a bard to strum a song or two.

name: Moka Pot Cafe
description: Take in the friendly and welcoming atmosphere of Moka Pot CafÃ© which is open every day, serving a delicious range of drinks and snacks.

name: Onsen Tsukaya
description: Welcome to Onsen Tsukaya, located in Hingashi's picturesque Shirogane Residential district. Enjoy our relaxing atmosphere and warm baths, fed by Hingashi's natural mineral springs.

name: Sykurjima's Weapons
description: Weapon and Armor Shop with cheaper prices than the MB! Lvl 90 crafters for all crafts. Can even meld materia for you! Leave orders in book on desk ^_^

name: We Rock!
description: The Ultimate Rock & Metal Club where you can experience the best of both worlds. We are a haven for all rock and metal enthusiasts, providing you with the perfect atmosphere to let your hair down, dance, and rock out to the best tunes!
Join us at We Rock! Where the music is loud, the vibe is high and the view from above is breathtaking!

name: Cozy Forest Fae Club
description: We took the forest and the fae and placed em indoors to party with us!

name: Aberrant Lounge
description: The Aberrant Lounge is a roleplay focused multi-bar venue located on Crystal. Visit our beautiful upstairs cigar bar for a quiet and relaxed setting. Prefer dancing? We also have a lively Nightclub located on our lower floor with live in house DJs. Or if you prefer to spice things up, you can always rent time in one of our private rooms with a dancer of your choice.

name: The Tipsy Coin
description: We are an oriented D&D medieval tavern. Stock up your supplies or plan your next adventure with your friends. Also take a look at our headhunter-board for requests or just enjoy the atmosphere. We offer guest rooms and tavern music aswell.

name: The Viper Lounge and Bathhouse
description: An immersive roleplay venue offering Far Eastern delicacies, complimentary tea and wine, VIP services and more.

name: Enigma
description: Welcome to Enigma, a steampunk-themed nightclub repurposed in part by our broken down clock tower. The club's purple color theme is prominent throughout, giving the space a moody, yet energetic feel that's perfect for a night out.

The music is always on-point, with a mix of music from a large variety of genres with every DJ putting their own spin on the evening (pun intended), creating an immersive atmosphere that's unlike anything else in Eorzea.

The bar serves up specialty cocktails that are as delicious as they are potent, along with a variety of beers and spirits. And if you need a break from the dance floor, there are cozy lounge areas with plush seating where you can relax and recharge.
Open every other Tuesday!

name: Arclight
description: We are pink and we love music! We love to entertain and we love to spend quality time with all guests who visit our club. We offer several exciting Services and we give our best so everyone feels entertained and comfy. Come and socialize with us. Listen to good music, have a drink at the Bar, book one of our Cherries, enjoy the Show of our Mascotsm try your luck at gambling or just chat to one of our Fairies. See you at Arclight!

name: Hotel Sierra
description: Hotel Sierra is run by a small welcoming fc complete with bar, music hall and baths you're sure to find a way to unwind after a long day. Luxury chambers are available to hire, with more being added over time.

name: Evergarden CafÃ©
description: Welcome to **The Evergarden CafÃ©**, we are a Japanese Maid CafÃ© based in Chaos with the idea to bring Anime inspired comfy and cute (Kawaii) services to our guests! <:kanaheart:1010404609187127306>

At our CafÃ© we try our upmost in serving the best Japanese/Anime food and drink such as Ramune, Boba Tea, Jelly-filled donuts, Taiyaki and so much more. We have a wide selection of items to choose from so be sure to check out our menu before your visit! <:venilove:955095205894291486>

We also offer extra special services to complete the Japanese Maid CafÃ© experience including; Special RP menu items, Performances, Photos and even the option to have Private experiences with our Maids! To find out more please check out services before your visit! <:kanaheart:1010404609187127306>

name: DIONYSIA
description: DionysiaTM is an LGBTQ+ Venue. Born out of the vision of its owners, Taiganori and Batsaikahn, it gives off a clean and classical aura. DionysiaTM is a venue unlike any other - by capturing the essence of sensuality and love but also intertwining them with lust.
This establishment vows to keep its patrons safe, happy, and entertained within its walls. DionysiaTM presents its unique layout that will no doubt facilitate intimate happenings.
We are located on Diabolos, in the Ul'dahn housing district - the Goblet. Our address is below (and we have even notated the nearest Aethernet for your convenience):
Diabolos, Goblet, Ward 6, Plot 36 - North Subdivision
Days: Sunday, Friday
Times: 1-4pm EST (SUN), 8-11pm EST (FRI)

name: The Sins Factory
description: The Sins Factory is a community name and also an industrial themed nightclub with many activities like roleplay, bar, photographers, DJ area and more for the pleasure of our guests !

name: Nightraid Bounty Call
description: ðŸ’° Bring back your trophies and collect your rewards! ðŸ’°

NightRaid's office is open for those in search of bounties, odd jobs, and general work. Those with many different professions such as; hunters, mercenaries, exorcists, crafters, gatherers, healers, and so on are usually welcome to browse our job board located in the lobby. Our HQ also acts as a lounge & kitchen downstairs if visitors are looking to relax and socialize.
ðŸ®NightRaid's Services: Hunting, Tracking, Info-Gathering, Exorcism, Healing, Escorting, Guarding, Entertainment, etc.
ðŸ®Traditional eastern guestrooms are open for hunters to stay after. Healers are on standby if any hunter returns injured!

notices.message: This venue opens biweekly at this time, please check the venue's discord to see if the're open first!

name: Playboy Mansion
description: Welcome to PBM! The place where all of your appetites will be sated every Wednesday and Saturday night. The Playboy Mansion is a night-club with a fully-stocked bar, casino upstairs, and a host to a number of live twitch-DJ's and bands for your enjoyment. Looking for something more? Our extremely talented and beautiful staff are always available and eager to please! Don't miss out on an unforgettable experience and come join us for our next opening!

name: Ink & Sip
description: â€œWelcome to the Ink & Sip! If you're looking for the perfect place to curl up with a good book, enjoy a cozy ambience and have some tasty food, this is it. Our cafeÌ features a variety of delicious menu options to pair with our expansive selection of new and used books. Enjoy the smell of freshly brewed coffee, delectable snacks and good conversation as you browse through our bookshelves.â€

name: Makoto's Gamba Hall
description: Makoto's is a gamba hall that offers exciting games for guests to try and play to win lots of gil...even tho Blackjack is the game of choice! We also have 3 different sake's for you to try and we offer them in a traditional style for you to enjoy! Sometimes we also host bards and DJ's at the venue for the guests enjoyment!  Solo bard performance is preformed by our very own Lil'Draven who mostly plays traditional oriental music for everyone to relax to while they chill or play gamba! Come and lounge and relax with us!

name: Lost Aether Night Club
description: We are an 18+ LGBTQ-friendly night club offering dancers, bartenders and a diverse bar menu, personal and group RP, tarot readings, casino, spa, and other services!

name: The BakeryBar
description: A quiet place to relax and have some freshly baked bread and a small meal during the day when the bakery closes the bar opens up a couple of hours later for a relaxing time to have a drink, chat, meet new people, and have social events: like bar room trivia night and a comedy night. Food services and Tavern

name: GLOW
description: Lali-Howdy! We're the <GLOW> FC of Bryn, we're an artist-made guild with a focus on crafting, raiding, glam and.. THROWING ART PARTIES! Every so often we like to get together with pop-up venue builds and jam to music on stream whilst drawing together on a public doodleboard. Every party has a new theme and everyone is welcome!
**This party's theme (6/4) is GLOW UP! Bring your shiniest and most brightly colored glams!**
We use the hashtag **#ARTBASHXIV**
Whether you have an interest in art (drawing, gposing, or more!) or simply wish to jam to some tunes in good friendly company, come over and bees knees with us!
Oh and of course, we're looking for new members to join us who would love to help and party with us from time to time ðŸ˜„
(Spicy glams and RP are fine by us, however we ask to remain respectful of the party vibes and bear in mind we're all here for a fun and friendly time ðŸ˜„ )

name: The Twilight Moon
description: Fae inspired venue with live music from the Twilight Moon Quintet, and featuring an array of talent including DJs, bards, bands and macro-dancers! The Twilight Moon is the home of the Twilight Moon Quintet.

name: The Sundrop Cafe
description: ***Open the 1st and 3rd saturday of the month.***
Your local Male Maid Cafe! Relax and cozy up with a cup of tea or coffee, chat with one of our lovely maids and enjoy the warm comforting atmosphere the Sundrop cafe has to offer.

name: The Crescent's Keep Tavern
description: Newly Relocated to Shirogane, the once cozy and comfortable tavern has been transformed! Please enjoy our signature drinks while you relax in our herbal baths with some of our choice herbs.
Our private rooms contain our many amenities for the mercenaries who pass through.
Located on Mateus Shirogane Ward 26 Plot 46

name: The Haven
description: Chill Saturday nightclub with music ranging from techno to edm to metal, transforming to romantic baths with soothing music on Wednesday nights to soothe weary adult partygoers.

name: Prelude in Violet
description: Welcome to Prelude in Violet! We have an open stage for bards along with various food and drink. SFW/AFK friendly.

name: Seventh Heaven
description: Do you like FFVII? Do you want to drink some beverages with our lovely Aerith and Tifa? You are at the good place for it ! Come enjoy FF7 vibes with us !

name: The Cat's Meow
description: A small cafe where the food is made with love! We offer a place to RP for anyone of any skill level.

name: The Phoenix Flame Tavern
description: The Phoenix Flame Tavern is a warm, relaxing tavern nestled next to the bathhouses of Empyreum. Come inside and sit by the warm fire or take a spot at the bar. With our unique drink menu and comfort food you're sure to feel relaxed and right at home!

name: CafÃ© Echo's Respite
description: A simple cafe with cozy and chill vibes. We sell food, drinks, and pastries for anyone who wants to take a break and relax from their daily life.

name: Serai's Shelves
description: A bookstore carrying a little bit of everything, from Academic texts, tomes, & escoterica to Fiction and flights of fancy from adventure to romance.

name: Nightingale Host Club and CafÃ©
description: Nightingale Cabaret & CafÃ© is a virtual host club based in FFXIV, and run by a group of Hosts and Hostesses who offer dreamy company for our lovely guests. Romance is in the air as the hosts and hostesses serve you food with tenderness while engaging in warm conversations and leave you with lighthearted memories. After an evening with us, you are bound to feel cherished and loved.
All are welcome to join us.

name: The Crystal Estate
description: Providing you with high-class treatment each night we're open.
LGBTQIA+ Friendly and owned.

name: Ichi Nightclub
description: Pulling inspiration from the high end Vegas nightclubs, Ichi strives to be a classy, yet chill place where people from all over can get together in a friendly, inclusive atmosphere.
Whether you're looking for a night of partying on the dance floor, or for an evening of relaxing while you listen, drink, and vibe, you will find what you're looking for at Ichi!

name: Mandragore CafÃ© | Bar | Concert Hall
description: Mandragore is a cafÃ©, bar and concert hall. This is where the magic happens, see for yourself...NSFW/DEGEN friendly +18

name: Club LEWD
description: Club Lewd is an enticing  new nightclub on Seraph. Boasting an alluring and seductive atmosphere, it is a popular destination for players seeking a vibrant nightlife experience. With its sleek decor, pulsating electronic music, and captivating light displays, the club sets the stage for an unforgettable evening. From energetic dance floors filled with players showcasing their moves to mesmerizing performances by talented DJs and dancers, Club Lewd offers an array of entertainment. It embraces a provocative theme while maintaining a safe and inclusive environment. Whether players are looking to socialize, dance, or simply enjoy the immersive ambiance.

name: The Addendum
description: The Addendum, Library of Antiquity- offers knowledge and expertise lost to time. From Magics to fictions, recipes and otherwise, The Addendum stores them upon their shelves for those seeking to further themselves. Step inside, have a look around...though mind the books, some bite.

name: Steel Rose
description: You never know what to expect each week for the Deepest Club on Crystal. Just know everytime is insane from the music, atmosphere, to our dancers, we bring it all and throw it at your face! One night with us and you'll be left counting down the days till STEEL ROSE is back at it again.

name: DV8
description: An upscale, dark, and sexy club for everyone. Queer owned and Operated with the goal of uniting our community - even if just for a few hours once a week. We strive to bring you a...pleasurable experience - pun intended. We leave our problems at the door and ask you do the same and come see what mysteries and fantasies await you within our walls, and behind our many doors. Deviate from the usual path you've trekked via Party Finder and you'll find yourself at DV8

name: Klub Kush
description: Klub Kush is the place to vibe and thrive on a Monday Night! Owned by Zanthar, we are a fun RP club that offers a full service bar complete with drinks and kush. We are excited to welcome you to our family as we dance the Monday blues away.

name: Delfina Maid/Butler Cafe
description: Have a Sweet treat with your own maid and enjoy cute fun maid dance shows!

name: The Reaper's Ring
description: The Reaper's Ring is a RP Heavy Tavern/Bathouse that's dedicated to an establishment of Reapers to gather in one place for some conversations, activities and much more.

name: Cafe Flintstone
description: Welcome. Take a seat. Order a coffee or tea and maybe a cake to go with it. Enjoy the good music with us and maybe a good chat.
We are open every second and fourth Sunday of the month. Looking forward to see you there â™¥

name: Heartlily Lounge
description: Heartlily Lounge is a speakeasy-styled lounge. We're a LGBTQ+ friendly SFW venue, and work to create a welcoming and comforting environment for all. If you're looking to relax, roleplay, or just spend time to yourself with some excellent music, come join us for the evening with a cold drink.

name: Nymph's Springs
description: The Nymph's Springs is a garden/cave like Bath-house/Brothel type venue that is located on Diabolos. Come join us for a night of relaxation and passion with a nice warm drink that will warm you up as it slides down your tongue as you relax in one of our many hot-tubs!! We also also offer services of the more intimate kind here as well.

name: The Crimson Door
description: Hushed voices speak of a hidden place nestled away in the back alley of a theatre, where one can indulge their most hedonistic fantasiesâ€¦
The Crimson Door is a sanctuary for art and intoxication of all kinds. Luxurious, indulgent pleasures one can lose themselves in. Come experience it for yourselfâ€¦

At the Crimson Door we offer more than erotic RP booking services. Instead, the focus is on building connections between characters and bringing people together. We offer a heavy RP, immersive experience in a LGBT+ friendly environment.

name: Diablos
description: Get ready, maybe you're not ready yet...

**Diablos** is a perfect tavern for those who love to differentiate themselves from the rest, to disconnect and to celebrate every second. You will go in as yourself, but you will come out as rough and true Vikings.
The initiative of this tavern is to allow you, without fear, to be yourself, to ignite your darkest desires. And you will certainly never be judged by us.
We offer a vast menu of Viking-themed drinks and drink, but not only. Our carefully chosen Courtesans will give you an experience you will never forget.

And obviously there will be games of chance, from blackjack and poker, up to chocobo racing and drinking contests, all managed by a highly trained staff ready to challenge you. To not forget about the awesome music our DJ will play.
And now tell me, are you brave enough to show your true inner nature?

name: Carbuncle Cottage
description: An enchanting carbuncle themed cafe. Relaxing atmosphere with live music.
Interact with our adorable carbuncles while enjoying yummy treats.

name: Honey Honey
description: "Maids with Extra Spice"

name: Inveritas. A place far and near.
description: We all have our perspectives caused by different backgrounds, environments, and events in our life. Inveritas, so the "The untruth" or "the lying things" symbolize a place where the "truth" is nothing than a lie to the another. A Tavern for adventurers for their stories to tell, sit down, relax, and show their perspective. As truth is subjective, so is home. So come and feel at home on this long life journey.

name: The Britannia
description: A British pub hidden away in the heart of Faerie. The Britannia is made by Brits, run by Brits and is for Everyone. Come enjoy some classic pub food and drinks along side pleasant company and live music, we have an open stage for bards along with pleasant staff to chat with.

name: The Blue Note
description: A cosy jazz venue â™¥

name: The Verdana
description: Come relax with a great cup of tea and a pastry or two. Cozy atmosphere, great staff, and seating in our exclusive downstairs garden. We look forward to seeing you there!

name: VA-11 HALL-A
description: CYBER PUNK themed venue with nsfw and sfw services bringing you cyber themed drinks EDM, trance and night core and metal all in one place, hosted by the Yagamiâ€™s every Saturday!

name: SideArm
description: A Soldiers hang out, A bounty hunters waystation from mark to mark and A brawlers get away from the normal everyday life that only wants them to bleed. A place for Brother an sisters at arms to come and rest. To have a drink and maybe throw a punch or two.

name: Story Circle
description: Request a hot chocolate, grab a plushie, and find your comfortable spot. Relax as Eorzea's wordsmiths weave astonishing tales to thrill and amaze you.

name: Duskrose Hotel
description: Duskrose Hotel is a themed classic-style luxury hotel. We strive for an atmosphere that's comforting and relaxing to either wind down for the night, or spend time with others in a calm environment. Listen to talented bards on our open stage, relax in our buffet, library and bar, or spend some quality time in one of our three themed rooms! (Mostly SFW but NSFW allowed)

name: Lizzur Lounge
description: The Lizzur Lounge Nightclub is one part of a double venue dedicated to providing an outlet for the late-night club goers! We're located in the heart of the Mist - and looking to serve you the night of your life.
We've got a fully stocked bar and lovely staff dedicated to making your time at the Lounge a night to remember. Upon entering, the door to the basement will be down the hall and to your left.
SFW Staff: LFP Symbol
NSFW Staff: LFM Symbol
+ Drinks provided by our lovely bartender!
+ Now featuring a live Twitch stream! Tune in during venue hours for some EDM!
+ LGBTQ+ friendly!

name: The Fungeon
description: 18+ NSFW Goth style dance club with cages, a coffin, dancers, courts, a bar, hot tubs, semi-private rooms, and a dance floor

name: Exodus Nightclub
description: Welcome to The Exodus, a pulsating sanctuary of music, lights, and boundless energy. This nocturnal haven beckons all those seeking an escape from the mundane and a journey into the realms of euphoria.

name: For Pet's Sake CafÃ©
description: Our venue is a minion- friendly adoption center and cafÃ©. We have lots of minions looking for their fur-ever home... Will it be your home? Just ask one of our staff behind the counter for a pamphlet and check out our selection of available friends to adopt!

It is important to us that everyone feels welcome and accepted for who they are at our venue. We have zero tolerance for hateful and/or inappropriate behavior. Common sense and Final Fantasy XIV TOS apply. While in our venue, content is SFW.

All food and drink transactions are in-character and do not require out-of-character gil payment, though we do greatly appreciate tips. Adoption fees are in-character and require gil. This gil goes towards more minions and staff salaries.
We're open every Saturday from 4pm-6pm EST! Hope to see ya there!

name: The Stumbling Au'Ra
description: A nice little hole in the wall to come relax and forget your troubles.

name: The Eiderdown
description: Established by a sharlayan noble's daughter during her travails and search for more knowledge, where the stresses of individual reality melt away and decisions hang in suspension before they are made.

The Eiderdown is a quaint coffeehouse with a coziness that strays from the concept of time, set in the heart of ishgard's residential district. Whether you're here to acquire the latest news and rumors, sharing your tales over coffee, or creating new friendships The Eiderdown has seen patrons and travellers seeking calm from the toils of daily life, and a hearth for those seeking warmth in the blistering cold of Coerthas.
With comfortable sofa booths and loft seating, so long as you are here with a respectful attitude, rest back and put up your feet â€”we'll turn the kettle on just for you.
Perhaps you'll even catch some rumors. and if you've enjoyed your stay, we hope to see you again!

name: Arwiras' Bar & Lounge
description: Come have a refreshing drink at our bar or relax with your friends in our exclusive Lounge, open 24/7!

name: Amity Lounge
description: Amity Lounge is located in the quiet neighborhood of Jenova's Lavender Beds. Within the cellar of the ETERNAL Free Company home you'll find the Lounge, your new favorite spot for live music featuring an open stage!

name: Club Phoenix
description: Club Phoenix is actually split into two clubs. First is Club Phoenix: Risen, which is upstairs at our venue, and will feature mostly EDM and club hits kind of music. Then there's Club Phoenix: Inferno, which sits in the basement of Club Phoenix, and features heavier, harder music, mostly metal. We switch between the two clubs week to week, with one week being a Risen week, and the next being an Inferno night, etc. Each club features a fully stocked bar, with great bartenders who will RP with guests and serve drinks, and raised seating that is situated above the dance floor, for those who want to just relax and listen to the great tunes.

name: Velius Club
description: A new and diverse Aquarium-themed Nightclub featuring Dancers, Bartenders, Hosts, and more! We strive to give our members an experience to remember. Whether you're looking for some private sessions with our Dancers, or to socialize with our Hosts, we'll make sure it's a night that you'll never forget.

name: Eorzean Coven bar
description: Relaxing environment/club

name: The Underworld
description: ***"Getting there is the easy part - all you have to do is step through the door. Getting back... that takes work."***

*It doesn't matter where you are - denizen of the First, the Fourth, the Source, or another world altogether - rumors persist of a place where any vice can be indulged, any wish fulfilled... for a price. The methods of finding it differ from place to place - from one age to the next - but the path can always be found.*

The Underworld is a post-Endwalker 18+ RP Venue blending style, vice, and sophistication at a speakeasy in the ultimate liminal space - what's left of the realms that once saw to the care of the dead.  We welcome both OC and NPC RPers alike, and are excited to provide a space where everyone's characters can interact with each other no matter how different their own personal worlds happen to be.

name: The Treehouse Theatre
description: In the cold climes of Ishgard lies a little patch of green. Inside you will find a grand treehouse from which you may relax while chatting with friends and listening to music.

name: The Emporium at Seaside Grove
description: The Emporium is a shop where crafters, gatherers, and customers can meet to purchase and sell goods through RP and tax-free commerce.  But perhaps you are a housing designer or venue owner looking for some supplies for your venue? Maybe you are new to the Disciples, and you are looking to network and help build your trades and learn new tricks. Whatever your journey is, we are here to help at The Emporium.

name: The Underdark
description: Small Torch-lit home with an Open Stage and an Open Studio for Wandering Artists and Photographers. No services, only a nice place to visit.

name: Candy Cane Lane Bakery
description: We are a bakery that makes delicious and yummy food. We are located in the goblet in a yummy and cute gingerbread house. Haurchefant will meet you at the gate to welcome you and our maids will feed you and have amazing conversations. We welcome all adventures to our humble little bakery.

name: CafÃ© Earl Gray
description: CafÃ© Earl Gray is an immersive RP venue for both new and experienced roleplayers alike, as well as a place to relax and chill with an open bard stage! A cafe with plenty of Ishgardian influence in decor, guests can expect HQ drinks and food (made by Earl Gray), conversation, and a warm space to relax. Additional info: 18+, SFW, LGBTQ+ owned. Some adult topics are fine to discuss, but please keep any explicit NSFW activities in private tells or party chat.AFKers welcome.

name: The Cherry Blossom
description: The Cherry Blossom is Chaos's finest adult nightclub and hotspot for 18+ entertainment.
We offer a wide selection of NSFW talent as well as drinks, chill vibes, and some of the most unique gambling on Chaos!
Come on by and say hello, we promise you'll love it!

name: Skalds Hall
description: A Norse / Viking themed Hall. Our goal is to bring a place for Travelers to come relax and unwind. Come tell us a story and drink until the gods call you home.

name: Fat Friend Cafe
description: Eorzea's finest fat cat themed cafe.
Come chill with our fat cats, in house bards, maids and butlers and even potentially borrow them for some content!

name: Sirens' Aquapolis
description: A relaxing aquatic-themed venue focused on gambling & dancing in a magical aquatic setting! Our house DJ, photographer, game master and sirens will sure provide you with entertainment for the entire night! Grab our fantastically themed drinks to start the night off and see where the waves take you...
Here upon the wavesâ€™ break, happy hear and joy we make.
With glistening treasure of gold, all manner of stories are told.
In our tender song youâ€™ll stay, all night like long to eb and sway.
Surrounded in splendor so marvelous, keep desire alive in our Sirensâ€™ Aquapolis

name: Yiazmat's Casino
description: Yiazmat's Casino has gamba drinks, fully stocked bar and constantly adding new gambling games. We have DJs every time we open and occasionally do auctions! It's a dragon themed venue but it's subtle! We have escorts to sit on your lap and give you that luck! Come by, have a drink, play a few games. All at Yiazmat's Casino!

name: Solstice Lounge
description: Solstice Lounge was created with music as our main priority. We believe that music creates the right environment. Our DJâ€™s are extraordinary people, who fell in love with music, creating a distinctive ambience and unique feelings. Generally we prefer smooth and fluid dance music like Deep House, Melodic Techno, Liquid DnB and Trance. The styles can change, but the general direction of our club will remain the same - Chill Vibes all around.

name: The Blood Pearl
description: Open every second Friday, we are an RP Pirate Bar/Club, 18+, NSFW, LGBTQ+ All inclusive and open to ***all***. An FC house designed from the ground up to encourage whatever you wanna get up to. Our motto is "Come Get In Trouble!" We at The Blood Pearl want to welcome RPers of all expierences to come and have fun in a place where you needn't worry about having gil to afford anything. No gamba or Giveaways unless done by individual patrons.

name: Grimm King's
description: Grimm Kings is  Live Dj centered Venue, We play every genre of music with many fun Themes and entertainment for you to enjoy!
We bring a wide range of Casino games for you all to enjoy with some of the most Delighted strong drinks for you to pleasure!
WE bring along very good company for your needs or Good Luck charms for your gamba experience, Vip Tiers to enjoy  and more!

name: The Nexus
description: The Nexus. A seldomly heard word that's literal definition is a connection. A link. The Nexus is the bond between people, between our community, between Eorzea. The Nexus is only as strong as those people who nurture its strength, its power. We do this every day without realizing it. Spending time with our friends and loved ones, going that extra mile to put a smile on somebodyâ€™s face, or even just simply cracking a joke. The Nexus is the connection that has brought people together for generations and will continue to do so for generations to come.

The Nexus between our community, within Eorzea has been manifested. This sanctuary to those who are looking to nurture its strength and grow that bond between each other to create a closer community, a closer Eorzea. Here in this Abode, friendships will become stronger, relationships will become more stable, and our community will once again show why it is the greatest in all the lands.

name: Miqo'fe Cafe
description: Miqo'fÃ© is an LGBT+ owned cafÃ© run by a tight knit staff. Our goal is to provide a comfortable, chill atmosphere for anyone to come in and hangout with some warm food and drinks.

name: SIREN
description: The Sirenâ€™s Lament is an 18+ nightclub of the vibrant Eorzean underground. We host regular parties and foster a place for us to forget our troubles. We are a safe haven for the rejected, for demi-humans, and for the monstrous. Come dance with us in the fountain of desires and partake in the forbidden. This is a neutral ground for all of the strange and wonderful critters of Eorzea. All are welcome in the Lament and we are a safe place to celebrate the beauty of difference.

name: Trionfi
description: Eorzeans look for a solace. Their own little spot in the corner of the world to just get away from it all. Sometimes a regular club just won't do it for them. Some folk need a bit more intimacy. That's what Trionfi is for. With a cozy atmosphere, the jazz lounge and bar is one of the few spaces in Eorzea where one can vent to a stranger, relax a bit and chill out with close friends in a smaller setting.

name: The Kitty (Cafe and Lounge)
description: The Kitty Cafe and Lounge is a SFW venue located in the heart of the Mist on Jenova.  Sporting a cozy cafe upstairs, with fine dining and a water garden downstairs, our establishment offers cuisine, commodore and conversation!

The owners Sava and Azerith met one fateful day outside of Sava's Apt building in Shiro.  As it turns out, we were neighbors!  We kept bumping into each other, and became friends.  Sava had dreams of owning a cafe, and when she told Azerith this, on a whim Azerith said "Well, why don't we start one together?"  Thus began this fun little project!

name: The Nest
description: The Nest is a long running venue that is part Tavern, part Bordello, and part Adventurer's Guild! We have a full bar, live music, tarot readings, courtesans, and you can even rent out the venue for an event!

name: Crossroads Conversations
description: When you're lost and don't know where to turn next, you arrive at the Crossroads.  Take your time to rest your feet, have a bite to eat, and enjoy in the fellow company of travelers.   Find a friend and then pick up where you left off, ready to discover where you're meant to explore next.

This diner is designed for the first time RP'ers. Engaging you in 60-90 minute immersive RP dinner parties encouraging character development, introducing new people, and building friendships before discovering new venues to experience!

name: Bar Minstrel
description: Inspired by the Tokyo bar scene, this small but ambient back alley venue is sure to delight couples, wanderers, and bar-crawlers! Our drinks are inspired from izakayas from Omoide YokochÅ, Roppongi, and Shinjuku. We boast one of the few Lalafell accessible bars in Jenova so you'll find yourself delighting in appropriately sized furnishings!

name: The Painted Rose
description: The Painted Rose is an Alice in Wonderland themed brothel! We invite you to celebrate your night and week with us and enjoy a range of fun and wonky little cocktails! Not to mention the wonderful host of company our courtesans may provide for you!

name: Affluence
description: Extravagant Rabbits Performing will leave you breathless. Affluence is home of the fabled golden buns-Viera (and a few others) willing to pole dance, step on, cuddle you and much more in a luxury setting. Experience the absolute finest in performance erotica right on the Shirogane Beach. Check out our website for a full list of services. We hope to see you!

name: Golden Age
description: Escape from the drama of daily life, and immerse yourself in a golden age of luxury. Enjoy the thrill of gambling in our dealer room, or explore our legendary club downstairs. Golden Age offers a wide variety of services for the discerning patron.

name: The Golden Kettle
description: Come relax at the Golden Kettle and enjoy teas from all over Hydaelyn!

name: SubZero
description: SubZero is Zero Management's latest venue and Crystal's premier Hip Hop venue.

name: The Cozy Treehouse
description: We are a cozy little library cafe now located in Shiro! We welcome you to come curl up with a book, do a puzzle, or just relax with a cup of tea and a snack!

name: Violet's Repose Lounge
description: Violet's Repose is a late night lounge open every Friday night from 6:00 to 9:00 P.M PST. Our primary goal is to forge strong RP connections and we are therefore a RP heavy venue, however, we are always happy to welcome people of all skill levels and help people develop their characters and their story. We offer barded music, drinks, food and from time to time hold special events.

name: Lieu
description: A holiday venue with birthday and wedding packages on aether faerie

name: The Garage
description: [18+ RP] The Garage is a Speed House and Metal based venue heavily focused on Roleplaying. Our amazing bartender will keep the social lubrication flowing and maybe you can talk to and spend some quality time with one of our amazing Courtesans. We have different DJs gracing the stage every week, and even some gambling if that suits your fancy. We have a little something for everyone.

name: Pogazu Pizza
description: Pogazu is the most unhinged (and longest running) pizza-related venue on Aether. Casual? pizza atmosphere where you can order quite literally anything on a pizza! Just don't ask for Namazu. The staff may serve you with a smile one moment, then threaten you with a flamethrower the next. It's the venue where everything's made up and the points don't matter!

name: Club Ley Lines
description: We're here to have fun through dancing, drinks, and gambling! Our vibe harkens back to the 80's in Miami when the club scene was king! Enjoy a care-free night with us hanging with friends or looking to meet someone special!

name: Curated Cozy Museum & CafÃ©
description: Curated Cozy aims to provide a relaxing environment to those looking to decompress after a long week or a night of clubbing amongst Eorzean's diverse social topography. Nestled amongst the swirling flurries of The Foundation's Empyreum, our museum is open 24/7 for anyone to visit, while the cafÃ© opens late Friday night with bard performances and full kitchen service.  All are welcome to come explore and relax in our softly lit halls.

name: The Dungeon
description: {18+}Welcome to The Dungeon! Please make yourself comfy wherever you like! Relax, dance, or soak. As well as Open Stage for Barding!

name: The Rainbow Room
description: The Rainbow Room is the friendly neighborhood bar with a rainbow twist! We are an inclusive, immersive role play venue which offers our patrons light-hearted role play and a variety of different entertainments. Tavern Nights the first Sunday, Club Nights the second and fourth Sundays, and On Stage Nights on the third Sunday feature a range of different levels of role play immersion and styles. We do not offer adult entertainment. Our dancers are here to have fun and bring a smile to everyone's faces! Be sure to join us on raffle or contest nights for some fun prizes! And don't be shy about getting up and dancing on Club Nights! You could be captured on camera!

name: Otter Gamba Hall
description: Hello! We are Otter Gamba Hall! We have Djs, Photographers, Dealers, Escorts, Dancers, and a Bartenderess. We offer Blackjack only though unfortunately. We would love to fulfill your thirst for gamba! Our Minimum Bets are 100k and Maximum Bets are 2M!

name: The Breakroom
description: Proudly sponsored by Garlond Ironworks. After a long day of adventuring, you deserve to take a break and kick your feet up. Look no further than the Breakroom. We offer a place to kick back and relax, have a hot home-cooked meal, and let the weight of the world fall off your shoulders. Open stage and AFK friendly!

name: Celestial Alehouse
description: Celestial Alehouse is a roleplay tavern built on fostering genuine interactions within the community. Stop by and join us for a drink or two and get to know our little family!

name: Dark Crimson Tavern
description: A gritty underground fighting pit and tavern serving excellent drinks, as well as putting on extremely entertaining fights!

name: Hrothbar
description: A bar full of hrothgars in your area! From drinks to dancing, we have everything you want for a hroth-filled night out!

name: Oyasumi Inn
description: Open 24/7! Find atmospheric relaxation and comfort at Oyasumi Inn, a large Japanese-style bathhouse! Enjoy free private rooms, captivating lounge areas, and more!

name: Void Cats
description: Void Cats is an 18+ modern dance club located in the verdant Lavender Beds outside of Gridania on Couerl Crystal DC. Come and enjoy an evening in a Kugane-themed location that features drinks, male and female dancers/courtesans, DJ, live bard bands, and a VIP section.
Our doors are open every other Wednesday from 9 PM Eastern till Midnight.
Come to drink, come to dance, come to vibe, or engage in RP of all levels.  We are an LGBTQIA+ friendly location.

name: Wayward Mystic
description: A SFW light RP venue tucked away in the Lavender Beds. Players new and old are welcome to join us for a night of drinks, dining, music & more!

name: Nebula
description: (SFW) Nebula has Gamba/Photographers/Dancers/Dj and more!
We also do giveaway/raffles!

name: Cenote Wyvern
description: Cenote Wyvern is an SFW RP and social venue/community focused on encouraging genuine connections between players and/or characters. At are venue we offer a free bar, a wide variety of music between our Lofi bot, house bot, and house DJ, and we have community specialists always looking to engage with our guests to ensure they have the best social experience and encourage them to escape their comfort zone and interact with another guest. For all intents and purposes, we are a non-profit venue outside of our small-scale gambling options for RP in amounts no greater than 50k. We do NOT do Raffles, Giveaways, or large-scale gambling, as we believe these opportunities detract from social experiences between guests.

name: Abyss
description: Abyss is a nightclub and lounge located in the scenic Shirogane, in the gorgeous 29th Ward, at Plot 54! The club itself is owned and operated by Xo Khah, and was designed by their energetic partner Rin Khah! Take a step into the depths and be enveloped by our dark aquatic ambiance and serene water features at the dancehall and bar downstairs, or enjoy a relaxing evening in the spa and lounge above deck. We welcome you to be a part of our vibrant and diverse community making wonderful memories with unforgettable people!

name: Warm Hearth Tea
description: Warm Hearth Tea is the place where great cooking and fantastic vibes meet. Our food is nutritious, delicious, and affordable, and is always accompanied by great music. We welcome adventurers young and old. Try it yourselfâ€” stop by today!

name: Nymeia's Resort
description: Nymeia's Resort is an LGBTQ+ friendly E/RP friendly Gamba Host Hotel. We do 90/10 Auctions once a week and our events are frequently Social Games or encouraging connections with others some other way in our shared community.

name: ChÃ¢teau Eorzea
description: Welcome to Chateau Eorzea!  See upstairs for the lala cafe Pancakes and Popotoes, or downstairs for entertainment and dining at Radz-at-Fun!

name: Solace Cafe
description: Our elegant, and modern apartment reprieve invites guests into a relaxing environment with open seating, and adequate sectioning for individuals, couples, and groups. Our menu is always complimentary and our staff happy to be of service.

name: Stone Ocean
description: Welcome to Stone Ocean, the ultimate Jojo themed bar in Dynamis DC! Come and experience the thrill of the battle as you sip on our signature cocktails inspired by your favorite Jojo characters.

name: The Bubbly Garden Maid Cafe
description: [RP-nonRP welcome]. Sfw bubbly garden cafe is heartwarming and welcoming, with a relaxing and comforting vibe, if you simply wish to rp, relax, or afk, we would be happy to welcome our services to you

name: Forgotten Paradise
description: A cocktail lounge located in the Mist, that provides a calming atmosphere, a chatty bartender, and amazing bardic performances to all of it's guests.

name: Club Tormenta
description: Come party where the storm â›ˆï¸ is at follow the sound of thunder! Majorly open Sundays at 9pm Est special days announced on discord.

name: Kanmiya Hibana
description: Please enjoy this quaint sweets bar and donâ€™t be afraid to talk story with everyone. All shapes and sizes are welcome, even spirit and yokai! Drop by for a drink, laugh, and relax and enjoy our homemade Eastern sweets and assortment of tea and alcohol!

name: Pink Miqo
description: A nightclub featuring live music, 100/0 auctions, Glam contests, and giveaways!

name: The Jungle Bird
description: Step into a tropical paradise at "Jungle Bird," a Tiki Bar unlike any other in the realm of Eorzea. With its vibrant Hawaiian-inspired cuisine and an extensive menu of exotic drinks, this club takes entertainment to new heights by showcasing talented bard bands and electrifying DJs. Savor the flavors of Kalua Pork Sliders and Coconut Shrimp, while sipping on signature cocktails like the Painkiller or Mai Tai. Immerse yourself in the rhythmic beats and melodies of the bard bands, and when the night reaches its peak, let the DJs ignite the dance floor with pulsating tunes. Get ready to embark on a sensational journey where the spirit of Aloha and the passion for music collide in the enchanting ambiance of The Jungle Bird.

name: Spice & Miqo'te - Tavern & Bath House
description: A relaxed and warm Tavern for travelers to come to rest their feet, share stories, and wet their throats. We provide tasty food, strong drink, and good company. We also offer public baths, and rooms to rest in if you're looking for a place to spend the night. Come share your tales of adventure, unwind from the day, and enjoy a relaxing night with us. Private rooms for groups, private baths, and private beds can be rented hourly.
Saturday Openings are generally smaller and have some kind of event linked to them, such as Gambling, Fight Club, Drinking Competitions, Cosplay Events, and so on.
