This is a Gil-Free Establishment, as in none of the items cost any Gil to order, nor do any services. We just wanna RP!
We are very strict on NO PUBLIC ERP within the Baths, and conduct like that will result in bans from the venue.
18+ SFW Tavern/Bath House RP

name: The Hole
description: A completely normal dining experience.

name: â€œOâ€ AfkCafe
description: Our cafe is located in  Crystal, Zalera, The Lavender Beds W22 P14.  It was created with the purpose of providing a place for people to wind down or relax at their leisure.  We serve a selection of food and drinks, all within a cafe/library atmosphere.

Our opening hours can be variable, but weâ€™re usually open on the weekends with the earliest opening time starting at 7pm PST.  Even after our counter service has ended, or even if weâ€™re not open on the weekdays, everyone is always more than welcome to visit and stay for as long as they like.
Our party finder is always advertised starting with the auto-translate symbol for a â­•ï¸ .

name: Enigma
description: Welcome to Enigma! Eorzea's happy shelter for night owls to gather and collaborate.
We open on Monday through Thursday from 10pm ST until last call*
*a last call is an announcement made shortly before the bar closes for the night.
Enjoy your stay and please follow the guidelines:

Enigma is considered a SFW bar, but everyone's sense of what is still considered SFW differs from person to person. So use your own judgement of that, but we also want everyone attending to feel comfortable. Should anything bother you, don't hesitate to message the staff and they will help where they can.

name: Ink and Sip
description: Ink and Sip is a book shop and cafe ran by the Elakha siblings from the Black Shroud. After rescuing countless tomes from the Great Gubal Library, the staff have found themselves overwhelmed with books of all sorts. They have decided to ply the public with good food, drinks and company as they try to offload the gods-blasted things onto their loving customers! Come check us out, all are welcome! (newbies and veterans alike!)

name: Carbuncle & The Frog
description: A long time ago deep in the beds made of lavender lived a tiny frog. The frog had no friends and decided to make a friend, he found a book and from the book summoned a carbuncle friend! Carbuncle & The Frog established on 2021 is a lounge and nightclub rolled into one large venue.
Come for the music, stay for the stories

name: The Chicken's Roost
description: A cozy tavern run by a tiny chicken! We've got ales, ciders, meads, and loads of food to fill that empty belly of yours after even the busiest day of adventuring!
Guests can expect equal parts relaxation and silly shenanigans, all in a SFW environment. We're also super casual, so don't worry all that much about RP etiquette!

name: The Bel Canto Winery
description: [OPEN EVERY 2nd & 4TH SUNDAY] A refurbished opera house, turned winery. Playing host to formal & casual evenings alike, we are a low-stakes environment meant for a casual and comfortable social experience. â™ª

name: The Hibiscus Ryokan
description: The Hibiscus is a immersive RP venue, themed around the culture and lore of the Othard continent, with a focus on the Azim Steppe and its many Xaela tribes.

name: The Stowaway Cafe
description: A chill cafe that aims to give clarity and sociability for all friends and venue goers. We offer an array of Coffee and Currys, for those who want a sweet blend of comforting foods.

name: Club Burzum Crypt
description: We are ready to see your darkest desires unchained, bound...flogged; whatever your preference.

name: Ethereal Nights
description: The best nightclub you'll ever visit! We have the hottest live music, friendly and interactive staff, the sexiest courtesans, stocked bar with a wide variety menu, and ViP service! Auctions every week and endless shenanigans make for the most fun you'll have at a venue!

name: The Wet Spot
description: Welcome to The Wet Spot, a hot tub themed venue. Our venue is located in the Goblet within the bustling city of Ul'dah , and is the perfect destination for adventurers looking to unwind and have some fun.

As you step inside, you'll be guided to a quick shower and then shown to a world of indulgence and relaxation. Our hot tubs, strategically placed throughout the club, provide the perfect setting for you to kick back and soak up the atmosphere.
But that's not all we have to offer. We have a wide range of services, beverages, chill relaxing beats from live DJs, photography, casino games, and lovely dancers to further enhance your experience.

Whether you're looking to dance the night away with your friends, or simply chill out in the hot tubs and watch the action unfold, The Wet Spot has something for everyone. And with our friendly and experienced staff on hand to cater to your every need, you're guaranteed to have an unforgettable night here.
So what are you waiting for? Come on over and pay us a visit :3

name: The Twelve Teacups
description: The Twelve Teacups is a little old fashioned jewels in the picturesque neighbourhood of Empyreum, in Ishgard. Our goal is to let you make a travel back in time, letting our butlers take care of you as a true noble. We decorated our manor thinking at XIX century, adding a little personal touch. Our menu is rich, and we are sure that you will find something that you will like! But our pride are our butlers, trusted people chosen cause their goal is make you feel like royalty.

name: The Diamond Bar
description: The end of the road bar, lost souls looking for their last drinks.

name: Izakaya Ongaku
description: Izakaya Ongaku in Japanese translates "Japanese style bar Music". A unique venue where people can Role Play to their hearts content and Bards can shine on stage !! For more information and opening times join the discord and make sure to get notified once we are open ðŸ«°.

name: Shinhra Cafeteria
description: THE SHINHRA CAFETERIA is based on the floor 64 of the Shinra Building from Final Fantasy 7 REMAKE. It has a small food court on the lower level and hosts occasionally characters based on FF7. It's an RP heavy space but welcomes all - even those not acquainted to FF7RE.

name: Final Gambit
description: Established May 2022, Final Gambit has proven itself as the premiere deathmatch pit for fighters wishing to run wild unconstrained by things like "not maiming people" and "collateral damage". The arena regenerates, fighters are healed, and everyone's expecting carnage; bring your best, not what you think is polite. Go wild. Be cringe. Be free.

More specifically, Final Gambit is a laid-back venue for violence enjoyers and those who are tired of limiting their creative writing for sake of appearances. Can your character detonate their arm like a cannon? Go for it! Are they a master of elements? Shock the floor! Narrative hand-waves are built into the place's identity. Don't worry about destroying the arena with too powerful of an explosion - it'll come back! Worried about permanent injuries? Red Potionâ„¢ or the services of one of our medics. Just have fun out there. Remember: Too much is never enough!

name: Tea-A-Holic
description: Walk into a cozy bubble tea cafe and jump through the secret bookshelf portal to enter our hidden bar paradise! Sip your tea and relax or join us on the dance floor while listening to live Twitch DJs every other Saturday! Join our discord as well for our weekly raffles and giveaways! We hope to see you soon!

name: Arcana Obscura
description: Come visit The Goblet's premier magical emporium! Specializing in the sale of arcane artifacts and antiquities, Arcana Obscura is here to meet all of your magical needs. We offer arcane consultation, relic appraisal, and custom bespoke merchandise all upon request!

name: The Azure Oasis
description: The unrelenting Thanalan heat and fast paced Ul'dahn city life can wear down any adventurer whether they're local or from afar. Nestled on the rim of the Goblet, the Azure Oasis is a shining beacon to all who need a break and cool off a while. Our bar is stocked with our prized exotic waters from across the globe blended and brewed with equally as exotic herbs to give each drink a life and personality of it's own. Many local delicacies and a large selection of incense also graces our menu. If you're looking for a place to drift away and relax a while (aside from occasional staff hijinks) there's none better.

name: The Marble Rabbit
description: An 18+ bar with uniquely magical drinks to guarantee a good time.

name: EikÅri
description: A veryâ€¦ chillâ€¦ place to hang out and grab some drinks, meet new people.

name: Bards & Brews Lounge
description: Bards and Brews is an SFW RP venue geared towards hosting and promoting the various bards and bard bands that grace Eorzea with their talents. Our stage is booked weekly with multiple performers for your enjoyment and relaxation, so stop by to hear the wonderful bards and show support for all their hard work while relaxing with a drink from our bar! If you are a bard and would like to perform, please speak with the proprietress for bookings.

name: Club Glo
description: A 90s inspired club with live DJ's and a unique bar menu. Come and party the night away with us!

name: The Hairy Beaver
description: The Hairy Beaver, a Tantalus Theatre Troupe experience, is a fun, campy, and inclusive venue for the citizens of Eorzea. Gaudy and a little bit naughty, The Beaver offers a wide selection of food and beverage options, as well as world-class entertainment and events.

name: The Wishing Well
description: *The sign on the door reads "open," but the inside is dim. Despite that, the faint scent of ale and the sound of clinking glasses makes its way into the entry, coming from... The bookcase? This merits investigation.*
The Wishing Well is an atmospheric tavern/lounge hidden in and under a Gridanian Curiosities shoppe. Stop in for food, drink, conversation, and relaxation. Maybe a little mischief?
We look forward to seeing you!

name: Roses XIV
description: We welcome you to the comforts of botanicals and luxuries at Roses XIV. We aim to provide all that you need and more for an evening at our lounge. Bartenders, dancers, courtesans, tarot, blackjack entertainment... - and a secretary to help guide you, should you ever feel lost in the flurry of the moment.

name: Plushie's Tea Party Cafe
description: Welcome to the Plushies Domain: Tea Party Cafe! We have a variety of baked good and drinks such as Rolanberry cheesecake and Ishgardian Tea! All food items are gathered and crafted by hand

name: Energy V.I.P. Club
description: Try your hand at one of our exhilarating games tables or head over to the dance floor and get energized with live Twitch DJ music! If that's not enough, try a refreshing drink from our attentive bartenders.
Just want to chill with some company?
Mingle with other V.I.P. on oue V.I.P. floor! All this and more inside the doors of ENERGY (NRG) V.I.P. Club!

name: The Moogle's Paw Speakeasy
description: The Moogle's Paw Speakeasy appears to be an innocent flower shop on the outside, but the inside is rather... questionable. The interior of the building reveals itself to be a not-so-legal speakeasy that is run by Ian and his lackey, Valentine. TMP offers a bar, a mini free-for-use stage lovingly referred to as "The Dog House", and tarot readings. TMP encourages everyone to have fun and enjoy all kinds of music.

name: The Wallflower
description: A humble cafe run by its community, for its community, and only made possible through its community.

name: Tsukiakari Onsen
description: Tsukiakari Onsen is a Japanese-style bath house that was founded to create a sanctuary for sapphic women of all kinds to bathe, relax, socialize, find companionship, and do whatever else they might desire. [Male player characters are NOT allowed in the venue.]

name: Lohchoâ€™s Lounge
description: Cozy tavern feel, friendly conversations and an open stage

notices.message: This venue is often open in the evenings (Eastern Time). Check Party Finder.

name: Dark Divinity

name: The Bronze Cask
description: Into the Glamorverse! Comic Book Glam Contest! Entry period ends at 7pm EST!

name: Club Bloom
description: Come Join us at Club Bloom! Adamantoise best Night Club! If your Heart desires it we can provide it!

name: The Cabbit Patch
description: A humble coffee shop ran by a bunch of himbos. Drop by, grab a drink, and laugh at the staff trying to keep the place together.
*Open Bi-weekly! See carrd or discord for details

name: The Knight's Haven CafÃ©
description: The Knight's Haven CafÃ© offers treats provided being from Norvrandt all the while allowing guests to feel cozy.

name: Akai Yuwaku
description: Dark Themed Nightclub in Far Eastern Style with a Sensual Taste of Erotic. We're giving you a place to live out your darkest & deepest Desires. We're also offering you sensual Photosets from yourself or with your partner.

name: Roemance
description: This is a 18+ venue. Your one stop shop for drinks, dancing, and good vibes! We have an excellent bartender, a live open stage (come show us your Bardic knowledge), and wonderful dancers for you to ogle! Come let your worries out, and hang out with a diverse group of friends!

name: Octavium Concert Hall
description: A concert hall specializing in monthly themed performances from various games, anime or musical genres

name: Janessa's Froyo Galore
description: This is a bar full of delicious yogurt flavors to try and serenity. You can come here if you'd like to hangout, sit & chat, RP/NOT RP, AFK & Relax, whatever you'd like!

name: Chewy's Cafe
description: A little slice of heaven in a home! Your very own cat cafe without bounds!
RP welcome, safe space, and bring your fat cat minions!

name: Greenery Oasis
description: Forest-like feel to relax and recharge! Friendly conversations, AFK friendly, an an open stage to perform your favourite tunes or listen to others

name: Log Cabin Lounge
description: A quaint spot admist the blustering snows for any travel to find a moment of solace while they warm by the fire or enjoy a lovely meal.

name: Club Carpe Noctem
description: https://discord.gg/carpe-noctem

name: MisFits
description: (ã¥ï¿£ 3ï¿£)ã¥ ðŸŽµ Venue for Outsiders, for those trying to fit in. We are a group of mixed race, mixed personalities into one venue, one team, We are MisFits.
Enjoy your Drinks and Food while soaked and listening to music... [Rp/non-Rp/AFK]
Instagram link: https://www.instagram.com/misfitsff14/

name: The Warden's Grace
description: Goldsmithing and Jewelry Shop, owned and operated by one Chee Angharad. Located in the heart of the Mist, The Wardenâ€™s Grace has a wide array of fine jewelry, tools and trinkets, magical focuses and other Goldsmithing services. Ask about Private Consultations, Special Commissions, and Repairs and Restorations!

name: The Longstop
description: Welcome to the premiere brothel in Dynamis~ We have ladies and gents ready to make your evening magical! Not wanting to slip away to a private room just yet? Come relax and have some fun! We have live DJs, Blackjack, Bar, VIP, and a fun rp environment! We hope you come by and let us fulfill ALL of your dreams~

name: The Eventide
description: The Eventide isn't anything. It's also everything. It's a tavern. It's a lounge. It's a bubble separate from reality and common sense. We have liquor in portals. We have coffee from the sky. Sometimes there's an alligator. We have fun, we don't ask questions and we embrace the absurd.

name: Lucifer's Angels
description: SFW/NSFW nightclub. DJ lady Oni, VIP, Drinks, & Dancers. We are just here for a good time and to make friendships along the way.

name: Nu'Skai Sar Batuuuk
description: You find a house in the middle of the ward, teeming with energy and life, something about that draws you to it. Stepping past the kind Elezen attempting to sell you bread at the stall outside, you open the door and are greeted with an overwhelming feeling of warmth and joy. The smell of bread kisses your face, as potions bubble and boil in the various bottles over blue dancing flames.

"Saa'atcha! Welcome to my shop!" a small goblin girl chuckles to you, as she dumps gold coins into a chest twice her size. "We have all current positions in stock, and food... if we ain't got it, ya can make a order and we'll make it, got it pal?" she grins up at you, as you stand taken back. "Anything ya'd like... just gotta give me your name..." she continues, looking up at you with a pencil in her hand ready to write it down, "for the order of course! Downstairs is for members only-"

- The Goblin Marketplace opens to sell current tier raid food and potions for cheaper than MB w/out the tax with some soft casual role play elements and various extra services depending on the staff on open ~ â™¥
- Great for starter RP or those simply wanting some crafts done by a cute little goblin girl â™¥

name: Rainbow Rave Room
description: Offering EDM in the Rave Room every Thursday! Nothing but good vibes, color poisoning and dancing the last of the week off!

name: Tsuki Bathhouse
description: A quiet bathhouse where you can escape the bustle of Kugane for a cup of tea or a warm bath.

name: Lux night club
description: Lux night club is a 18+ place has a lot to offer great place to roleplay we have dancers escorts great team and a lot of fun great place to visit

name: Phoenix Rising
description: From the ashes of the old, we rise anew! In a fiery blaze of glory, Phoenix Rising has burst from the embers of the past and has come to Seraph. A full service dance club and bar, with live DJâ€™s and enticing hosts and hostesses, come to Rising Phenix to experience an immersive and interactive RP experience!

name: Kodama
description: Third Try's award-winning FC house functions as a dance club & bar, rentable venue space, therapist office, and dentist if you're into that.
Our FC is a fun group of experienced and new players alike who enjoy the full range of content in FFXIV. There is something for everybody, and everybody is helpful!
And hot!

name: Fury's Fall
description: Nightclub featuring themed nights such as emo night, jazz night, with gambling, dancing, drinks and food

name: House of Seoul
description: â™¥ Chill vibes, live bards and drinks a plenty. â™¥
We are a music themed sfw venue focused on relaxation, chill vibes and good memories. Make yourselves at home!

name: Lunar Rose Adventure Academy & Guild
description: Lunar Rose is centered around the theme of adventure. A Academy and a Guild are under the banner of Lunar. the curriculum consists of activities and lessons that will prepare the students for a life of adventuring, offering practical knowledge on topics such as combat, first-aid and magic, and many more! While the Adventure Guild offers quests from monster hunts to saving cats from trees, Lunar Rose provides adventures for all with the sufficient skills to handle them. Both the teachers and students at Lunar are players roleplaying their characters, as are the staff and members in the Guild. In addition we have characters that work as school staff, for example running security. We have a free company house that serves as the school grounds, and a small for the Guild. But we also often venture out to the vast world of Eorzea too! The school and Guild is accessible for everyone on the Crystal, Aether and Primal Data Center, and we help out New Rpers/Players too!

name: The White Hare Art Cafe
description: The White Hare Art Cafe is a long existing cafe, bringing you an atmosphere and community unlike any other. Find yourself sitting in limsa all day? Perhaps your an artist and you want a cozy place to go and vibe out while you draw WoL's around you? Maybe you're someone who likes taking photo's and want to find more people to take photo's of, but not really sure how to approach people in a main city? Maybe you're even a Roleplayer and want to find a good social hub to go to in order to interact with the right crowd? TWH is a built community for all to enjoy, relax and be entertained by our amazing staff members! Whether you know how to RP or not- they will make you feel right at home.
We hope this establishment becomes a home to you just as it has for us. We provide the following services:
â€¢ Food and drinks - Provided by our waiters, bartenders and chefs
â€¢ Photography services - 50k for 5 photos!
â€¢ In house artists - Not taken upon request but if youâ€™re there regularly, they will end up drawing you at some point!
â€¢ Live music provided by our bards
â€¢ Entertainment - weekly themes and giveaways...

name: Revelation
description: Revelation is a Nightclub base in the heart of the goblet.
Bringing the best trance music to a sunday night.
Sit back and relax with a few beers and shots, party away on the dancefloor, or enjoy the company of one of our lovely dancers. Whatever you desire, you are sure to find it at revelation

name: Mpire Club & Casino
description: Mpire Club & Casino located on Aether Gilgamesh

name: Dead Space
description: Dead Space is an upscale nightclub venue that offers a variety of entertainment, often with a thematic opening, and always aiming for novelty. Some of the things youâ€™ll find here are: Live DJs, companionship, high quality gambling, photobooths, raffles, nightly giveaways, Glam Contests, Tournaments (All kinds, often matching the nightâ€™s theme, and our unique monthly Deathmatches). We are LGBTQIA+ friendly. Weâ€™re also often organizing and collaborating in special events, so check our discord to see whatâ€™s coming up!

name: The Blood Drop
description: Located in the depth of the Goblet's Districts, this Gothic Nightlife venue has a lot to offer. Come check us out if gothic style is to your liking. The Venues theme is Gothic/Demons and we will open hopefully every week atleast once a week!

name: Dragon's Spine Tavern
description: A SFW High Fantasy Tavern set within the deep woods of The Black Shroud that has a little something for everyone, Gpose services, or just a place to Roleplay. We also offer live unmodded bard performances as well as an open stage for anyone to take part in!

It is entirely safe for work as we offer no court services or anything beyond that. We wish to bring a safe space for people to roleplay at and be themselves in a scenario not often seen among other venues. We even offer raffles and sometimes invite regulars into roleplay campaigns.

name: The Wild Peony
description: The Wild Peony is an 18+ Thavnairian Themed Brothel Venue focused on good vibes! RP is encouraged, but not required. Let our staff keep you company in whatever way you like, or even hang out and afk! Come join us for giggles and debauchery, and maybe see someone die at the bar.

name: Dream Cloud Cafe
description: The Dream Cloud Cafe is a quaint little cutesy cafe in the bustling city of Ul'dah! Take a break and get away in a cozy, pastel, and uber-cute environment! Come chat your woes away and have fun!
Lalafell-run and friendly! Minions welcome, bring your pets!

name: Shinkirou Cinema CafÃ©
description: This is a dine-in movie theater experience. Come enjoy a movie relax have some food.  Meet new people and experience new things. We are a SFW movie RP venue. Please be respectful of others when here, keep clothes on and if you want to ERP keep it to whispers or party chat

name: The Scrapyard
description: The Scrapyard is an in character 18+ immersive roleplay venue with a playful atmosphere centered around big event style cage match fights, betting, drinking at the bar, and purchasable roleplay services. Both dancers and fighters can be hired for their time in the back rooms, but otherwise it's free for all roleplay on the floor! Fighters who enter the cage are treated to custom introductions, help from the announcer and winners come home with fabulous mystery prizes. With some IC safety in place for fighters, it's a little less blood and guts here and a bit more professional wrestling in tone!

name: Secret Pixie Comedy Club
description: Secret Pixie Comedy Club is the home of Bad jokes, open mic nights, Speed dating, and cryptids. Join us Monday, Wednesday, and Sunday nights. You never know what you'll get !

name: The Hidden Oasis
description: The Hidden Oasis is a large bathhouse featuring a full bar and lounge! We aim to provide guests with a place to relax, unwind, vibe, and converse.

name: The Floral Fount
description: Nestled within the Twelveswood, the Floral Fount is a bath house and lounge with a focus on chill vibes. Soak in our baths, perform on our open stage, play Triple Triad in the lounge, or just hang out! Feel free to drop by any time, even when we're not open!

name: Crystal Academy of Musical Arts
description: The Crystal of Academy Musical Arts is a no-drama establishment intended as a place where bards/musicians/bands can relax, hangout, and share their musical passions with other fellow bards/musicians/bands and music lovers. Our regular events are also a place to showcase talent to any interested venue owners seeking to hire talent for their venue. We are also dedicated to teaching inspiring musicians and providing for the future for musical entertainment for venues. We offer 1 on 1 lessons, classrooms, and advise on unlocking the mysteries of the FFXIV performance system. We also help mediate venues finding a bard/band if such services are required.

name: High Spirits Bath & Lounge
description: High Spirits Bath & Lounge is a relaxing place to unwind at the end of a long day.  High Spirits features a wide variety of accommodations to ensure a relaxing and enjoyable time for all of our guests. Our lounge features amazing drinks and snacks, served up by our hostesses, Emma & Tala.

We feature large and comfortable seating arrangements, with several different environments to relax and chat with friends and other guests. High Spirits features live musical performances at the lounge.

Our spa facilities are some of the best in all of Eorzea. We feature a luxury changing room where you can shower and store your belonging and private spa rooms that can be rented on request. Please see a hostess for details.
We invite you to visit High Spirits and learn what makes us the perfect place to relax and unwind.

name: Platinum Rose
description: A cozy place tucked away into the corners of the Firmament, the Platinum Rose is a place for winning hearts, winning gil, or wining and dining.

name: Club Lucky Stars
description: Club Lucky Stars is a Regency themed club aimed to make you a Star! We offer various activities including themed parties, giveaways, blackjack, and lotteries! We also offer dancers, courts, and bartenders who will give you the best experience!

name: Fox Trot Tea and Bathhouse
description: A visit to Fox Trot Tea and Bathhouse will paw your troubles away with our high-quality tea and tubs filled with fresh waters right from the Steppe. Our menu features classic matcha green tea, and several specialty teas like The Vixen, Foxâ€™s Respite, and Kitsuneâ€™s Kiss.

Here at our resort, the kitsune spirits are free to roam. They do enjoy playing harmless tricks on staff and customers, so keep your wits about you. There have been times when the spirits try to knock over tea thatâ€™s been prepared for the guests, or even try to steal from them! It's all in good fun though, and nothing is ever permanent.
Come in, enjoy your favorite cup of tea, relax and unwind for an experience unlike any other.

name: Odyssey
description: Here at Odyssey we support all of Eorzeas creative ventures and night owls. We do our best to provide as much as possible without alienating another group. What ever you enjoy let us be your entertainment and artistic hotspot. We, host a first class Bar & grill, Amazing Casino, the luxurious Stardust stage, and several private rooms.
Odyssey...
Your adventure begins here...
â€¢ Address: Crystal DC | Zalera | Mist | Ward 16 - Plot 02

name: The Elysian Springs
description: The Spa A venue for those looking to relax, rejuvenate, and above all, roleplay, Elysian Springs Spa is self-care socialization supreme... All without costing a single gil. All Elysian Springs Spa facilities are free of charge! All we ask in return is that you RP your heart out while visiting, and be sure to read through the Spa Rules. They're important! Baths The Spa's bread and butter -- relax in the steamy caress of our eight bubbling baths, complete with refreshments! Clothing is optional; comfort is compulsory. Sauna Seeking something more steamy? Crank up the cleanse in the closeness of our sauna, its own separate room with steam galore, located to the south-east of the Spa. Sitting Parlor Sometimes, a little calm is all you need. Take five with a friend in the tranquility of our reading room refuge, an ideal spot for quieter conversations in peace, located on the west side of the spa. VIP Services We do have additional VIP services including tarot, massage and lodgings as well as private baths for those seeking a more intimate space. It is important to note, however, that Elysian Springs is not a brothel. We cater to the fantasy with lovely and gracious staff, but are not courtesans and do not sell ERP at the spa.

name: Rose Dragon Cafe
description: A cozy spot to enjoy a bit of coffee, tea, or a little spirits pick-me-up along with general cafÃ© cuisine.
We believe simplicity is best and the quality of our food and service will speak bounds.
HQ Food and warm conversations are to be had in this space.

name: Bunboi Insurance Co.
description: Need adventuring insurance? Stuck getting through a fight, dungeon, or map? Hurt from adventuring? A bun could be what your party needs! Let us help you (in character and out) in dungeons, fights, etc; or visit our clinic to get patched up and ready for your next adventure. New roleplayer friendly, SFW venue. No gil needed but tips are welcomed.

name: Golden Lotus
description: Newest Nightclub to Aether, Faerie. At Golden Lotus you will find amazing staff, great DJs, and an amazing environment and decor. With a gorgeous Far Eastern feel to the whole venue and amazing themed drinks you will love what you find here!

name: Huxian Syndicate
description: The Huxian Syndicate is a criminal organization seeking a foothold in Eorzea. While well established in Kugane, it's emerging presence in Ul'Dah has the Syndicate seeking to outsource some work.
A Heavy RP venue that's 18+ due to the potentially darker themes. We offer work to Villain and Neutral characters. Speak to the right person, and you'll be able to pick up a job.

Further your character's story by having a real crime organization and players to back up it up. Are you a thief needing to sell stolen goods but can put it on the market? Sell it to our Fence for gil and gain reputation for it! Perhaps, you're a mercenary just looking for your next job, there's a rumor the Syndicate needs some goods moved discreetly!
We open every four Fridays. Our next opening will be February 10th from 8pm EST to 11pm EST. Join our Discord to keep track of our events!

name: The Sanctuary
description: The Sanctuary is a gorgeous light roleplay and music venue for everyone on North American data centers to enjoy! We host live DJs and positive vibes. Thank you for visiting!

name: The Velarium Cafe & Bathhouse
description: A Cafe and Bathhouse to relax and immerse yourself in! Come kick back and enjoy some company in a comfortable environment. AFK and RP friendly! Lala's welcome for SFW activities!

name: The Roasted Dragon Cafe
description: Layed back, and kind staff, with a relaxing venue where you may order foods and drinks.

name: Belladonna's Banquet
description: Belladonna's Banquet is an immersive speakeasy venue with a fully functional flower shop as the staging area. Come in to browse our flower inventory and order a custom arrangement in our shop above or ask one of our shopkeepers for the special flower of the day and gain access to the tavern below. We have themed rooms for special events which include a fighting cage, bath house, and patio seating available for reserve to private parties.

name: Kirlala Nightclub
description: Welcome to the Kirlala Nightclub ! Take a drink and have fun !

name: Kitty's Play Palace
description: We are a Open LGBTQ+ RP open maid cafÃ© with something for everyone. We offer Courts, Dancing , A full sized kitchen, A bakery for sweet tooth lovers. We also have a Vip section available. We have Bard playing music and very soon a DJ.

name: Delirium
description: High end, mainstream EDM venue - where the venue owner's only request of the DJs and guest is so always "Go hard!"
Offering 90/10 auctions, gamba, raffles, immersive bar, high class VIP with bottle services, shot girl for more RP immersion - come for the features and stay for the vibes!

name: Glamour
description: An immersive nightclub experience at Glamour with top-tier service including live DJs, dancers, courtesans, full service bar with one-of-a-kind cocktails, blackjack, raffles, and a first class VIP experience in the largest VIP section on Aether.

name: Black Coffin
description: Welcome to the Crypt, Where All of your nightmares can come true!

Black Coffin is a place where you can relax, or can you? Come have a drink! If you have the brass for it, try the Nightmare, embrace your darkest fears! Be it a drink, relaxation, or just embracing your inner Demons....Need some stress release? Our Escorts can take very good care of you, will fulfill your wildest fantasies and make you want one! Saturday comes but once a week why not spend it with as The Black Coffin welcomes you!

name: Sandglass Cafe
description: The Sandglass Cafe is a small back-alley shop where adventurers, book enthusiasts, and lovers of romance novels of all kinds to hang their hats, enjoy some treats and company in a relaxing environment. This venue is SFW and beginner-friendly for RP learning.
We also run Sketch Night on the first opening of every month where the venue owner (Meia) will be sketching guests who visit the establishment and stream the process on Twitch.

name: Clowder Club
description: Our singular goal is to chill and vibe while having fun. Be sure to head down to Clowder Club to celebrate the coming of the weekend in style! Clowder Club has always been about friendship community and having a good time and it continues to be such a place. We have VIP Services, Photography service, a Sketch Artist and more â™¥.

name: The Kupo Cafe
description: The Kupo Cafe is a cozy venue run within the Kupo Arts & Cafe <<CAFE>> Free Company House, and is currently hosted by Renai Sance.

Whether you're looking to have art done of your character, a cozy spot to AFK, friendly company with a healthy bit of banter, or a place to practice barding on a small stage, our goal is to make you feel right at home.

name: Space Camp
description: Space Camp is home to the largest collection of player-created jump puzzles in FFXIV! Our private chambers house a variety of challenges suitable for beginners and parkour masters alike. New puzzles are added regularly. You can follow @SpaceCampFC on Twitter for updates, or visit our website for more information such as a beginner's jump guide and a timeline of FFXIV's major housing milestones. We are also open 24/7 so feel free to visit us anytime!

name: The HiveMind
description: Open plan interior in the void with no tax gambling, full bar with staff, DJ, Glam contests and giveaways.

name: Interlude
description: Amongst the squalls of snow that dance in the air of Empyreum stands a new and improved Ishgardian Noir Lounge- Interlude. A venue that is steeped in rich historical significance, and mahogany walls. There is always something happening inside of its walls Will those things speak to you- There is only one way to find out!
Interlude is open on the 1st/2nd/ and 4th Friday and Saturdays at 11pm est to 1:30am.
Come rest your body and be transported to a respite meant to restore and revive your adventurous spirit!

name: Crimson Underground
description: Welcome to Crimson Underground!! We are a night club with live twitch DJs, fully stocked bar, beautiful aesthetics, and of course a dance floor ðŸ˜‰ come through to have a good time and dance the night away ðŸ˜‰

name: Purple Orchid - Spa Resort
description: Purple Orchid is a *SFW only* spa resort that focuses on roleplaying, housing luscious baths, a well-stocked bar, and a cozy area to sit down with a snack. We offer a variety of services like massages and photography, and do our best to help you have a good and relaxing time!

name: Shroudrose Teahouse & Tavern
description: Nestled within the Lavender Beds of the Twelveswood with a cliffside at its back and a flowing stream beneath a short bridge at its entrance is a large mansion known as Shroudrose Teahouse & Tavern. Once housing a rowdy free company of adventurers summers ago, it now serves as the site of a teahouse and upscale bar serving everything from specialty tea blends, to a wide array of spirits, to light meals and snacks both sweet and savory.

We are a SFW, fully immersive heavy RP venue. The house is a public role-play space where anyone is welcome to come role-play at any time, and can be used as a venue for events with some prior discussion. To stop by when there is a crowd and the place is staffed by player characters, please come during our public event times. If you wish to role-play in the teahouse outside of our event hours, you can assume NPC staff take care of your characters, or you can contact us and we will have a character come assist you if possible

name: The Hidden Grotto
description: A SFW speakeasy style bar

name: The Angel's Loft
description: Welcome to the Angel's Loft, the calmest pleasure spot in the skies! Enjoy our wonderful snacks above, and our calming baths below. We offer a high tier raid and crafter food with no mb tax and a chill place to hang out and afk. We also offer a wonderful bathhouse experience and plenty of role play interactions.

name: Lucky Sevens
description: You lucky people! It's time to come down and experience Eorzea's wildest role-play Free Company, filled with the most talented and fun players on Hyperion. Step through the resort palms and come forward into our grand lobby, where sexy casino bunnies and dapper poker studs will lead through our entertainment destination. Downstairs, a stocked bar stands across from the main stage. In the upper levels, enjoy the games and see if you can break the 100 million gil bank in our casino games, ranging from slots machines to Astrologian roulette. Fancy yourself a great minion trainer? Send your beloved pets into our Dominion of Minions arena to square off against fellow guests or dare to attempt the boss-encounters of our staff's own beasts. If you do strike it rich, you'll find one of our bunny girls the perfect place to spend your ill-gotten gil. As we say in Lucky Sevens, "What happens in the private chambers, stays in the private chambers." Finally, end the night with the fabulous Showcase and Revue featuring the Lucky Sevens dancers, taking place in the company theater to the roaring crowd of high rollers. Just be careful whom you cross, where you set your drink and whose hand you follow into what dark corner. Rumor has it that darker, more terrible plots and schemes lurk beneath the glitz and glamour of the marble and gold halls...There is only one way to find out! Head down the Lucky Sevens Casino & Gentlemen's Club--where roleplay is the biggest jackpot!

name: The Wanderer's Okiya
description: The Wanderer's Okiya is an establishment aiming to bring a flavor of the Far East unto the Eorzea, taking a sampling of Kugane's hospitality culture, we offer a comfortable venue for people to meet, socialize, or just relax it. Should one be alone, or just seeking companionship, we allow the hiring of our Geisha to accompany our patrons. This includes an array of tea ceremonies, traditional tales, music, and even games. Should the patron be in the mood, they may speak to their hired companion and discuss more intimate matters, for which we provide a diverse range of comfortable settings for which to occur.

name: Euphoria
description: Euphoria is a weekend nightclub and event space located in the heart of Shirogane. Featuring a fully stocked bar, hot tub, dance floor and casino, weâ€™re sure to offer a night to remember. With both SFW and NSFW services offered, there's something to satisfy everyone! Stop by for an unforgettable evening and enter a state of euphoria.

name: The Dead CafÃ©
description: The Dead CafÃ© is some where you sit and relax. If you like you can play music or  just read a book with good drink and treats. it a place where you can bring your friends and talking about the good time be for the dead come upon us.

name: The Ruby Lights District
description: The Ruby Lights District is an LGBTQ+ friendly hostclub offering a place to hang out, meet new people and to have a laugh at the staff's shenanigans.
We have hrothgar hosts, games and a relaxing asmosphere
We hope to see you there!

name: The Red-Ink Spirits
description: ð“£ð“±ð“® ð“¡ð“®ð“­-ð“˜ð“·ð“´ ð“¢ð“¹ð“²ð“»ð“²ð“½ð“¼
- FC Tag: ðŸ†ƒðŸ†ðŸ…¸ðŸ†‚
- What: Hingan Brewery with Underground themes
- When: Every Monday 7-10 PM CST
- Where: Plot 49, 23rd Ward, UPSTAIRS
Goblet Medium, Mateus- Crystal
IC Details

Enjoy a Hingan atmosphere with authentic Eastern drinks and a slight underground theme, dabble in whispers of political scandal or criminal activity over a matcha tea or sake bomb! We also have games such as dice, high&low, karaoke and so much more!
https://redinksyndicate.crd.co/#barnights

name: Rikka's Cafe & Bar
description: Welcome to Rikka's. A unique experience where everyone is treated like family. We have tastes to meet everyone's needs. We hope you'll consider us for your next dining experience.

name: S'teamy Kitten Bathhouse
description: Welcome to the Purrfect Bathhouse!
Baths are good for the soul. The therapeutic waters ease the body and the mind, and they have been used for centuries as places of social gathering or healing around the world.

Many cultures have their own wellness traditions, almost all of them have this in common: People love to soak and sweat. Come enjoy a stay within a modern bathhouse that melds ancient practices with modern-day sensibilities.

name: Poseidon's Reef
description: Welcome to Maduin's premier dispensary lounge! Grab your friends and take your night to new heights with one of our premium herbs in a safe space. Diverse menu with food and drinks available, tailored to a unique underwater Thavnairian theme. We are a small, intimate and immersive venue. LGBTQ+ friendly!

name: Thavnairian Nights
description: "Oh, the music that plays as you move through a maze in the haze of your pure delight. You are caught in a dance, you are lost in the trance, of another Thavnairian Night..."

Somewhere lost within the billowing sands, a free company's mansion takes vision. As you take respite from the winds of the East within, become entranced of a mystical hookah lounge. Enjoy the silk and satin cushions, as tantalizing dancers grace the stage. Melodies of far away float through the air along with trails of smoke. The power of your wish commands is evident here at our RP venue. Let the hosts and hostesses sate your desires, bringing you concoctions fashioned together by our local Alchemists. Try a different mix of shisha each time you visit or possibly even find your favorite. If you desire more, look further in to the themed rooms rented out to various businesses and shops, some even transporting you to far away places.

name: The Crystal Comfort Cafe
description: Looking for a nice relaxing and cozy place to have a late night drink and maybe a snack?
How about relaxing in our soothing baths after the long day you've just had?
Come see us at The Crystal Comfort Cafe and Bath, let us pamper you and melt all that tension away in a warm and welcoming environment full of immersive RP.

name: The Ninth Twilight Restaurant Lalafellin
description: Come on down to The Ninth Twilight Restaurant Lalafellin. Have a seat and enjoy everything Lalafell sized. Yes, you too can reach the counters. From quality service to a smol cuisine of artisan mastery. Live your extra Lalafellin life!
Feel free to seat yourself at an empty table(with a book) or at the bar.
âœ§ Jump upon entry/load when you get into the restaurant. Then walk forward.
âœ§ To get the most out of your visit, we highly recommend coming in as a Lalafell.
âœ§Reservations are available. Inquire with Discord Twine Twilight#0684

name: Fairy Tale Lounge
description: My venue is located on Crystal \ Malboro. We are a fairy tale themed nightclub that welcomes both IC and OOC interactions. We host a myriad of events that target both audiences, keeping the atmosphere of both in mind. Our staff creates a friendly, interactive, and immersive chat throughout the night with varying styles and levels of roleplaying to encourage both veterans and newcomers. We, additionally, offer the usual services typical of a nightclub whilst allowing our staff to meddle into their own special concoctions and mini-events: you're curious as to what they are? Come see us and find out!

Every opening we have a theme night that is encouraged each person participate in, but it is not required. Just a chance for you to turn out those old boots that you love so much but can't wear anywhere. Or that dusty old cape that has that small stain on it... you get the point!
We've been open about two to three years and have created a nice relaxing climate -- a nice change in pace to the usual bustling feel of a usual nightclub. I love the place and I hope you will too!
Fairy Tale Lounge

name: Alta Strata
description: Alta Strata is located within an abandoned imperial trains station, meet our staff in the old ticket booth and take a quick /doze at the elevator to be transported to the best secret club in Garlemald. You'll soon find our DJ, bar, and large dancefloor underground in the void.

name: Club Ape
description: Need a break from all the adventures? Come ape-out on the dancefloor at the one and only Club Ape. Apes together strong

name: The Bottom Line
description: The Bottom Line is a lively jazz bar recently relocated to Ishgard from their humble beginnings as a dive in Ul'dah.
Come by for lighthearted, fast-paced RP in a cozy bar environment with a host of charming characters. Live bards & excellent vibes.
Roleplayers of all experiences welcome!

name: The Red Palace
description: the new big location for previous small venue 'Red Hideout'

name: The Sylphic Teahouse
description: The Sylphic Teahouse is a small library-cafe venue, situated in a house in Lavender Beds near Gridania. With Ozwin's personal collection of books at your finger tips, feel free to say stay and hang out a while without spending a single gil. A small stage is open for any who feel particularly musical, and the small bakery is kept stocked with food and drink by Alune and Misuzai. From the library on the main floor with its reading nooks, to the dining tables and plethora of seating downstairs, there is room for all to make themselves at home.

name: Seaside CafÃ© & Lounge
description: Welcome to Seaside! Where the chaos is half the fun! We are a Maid & Butler CafÃ© plus Lounge providing various activities and dishes for you to enjoy in a SFW environment, come join the fun!

name: The Drunken Moogle
description: Need a place to chill and relax after a long day of grinding? Want a hot supper, or a stiff drink? Look no further than the Drunken Moogle! Food, Drinks, Music, Events, & Much More!

name: Midnight Manor
description: Crystal Pageant and Club at Midnight Manor Grand Opening will have guest appearance with Twitch DJ Tim3_Signatur3 downstairs in the club and bar with a Cosplay Glamour Contest (no rules!) in the upstairs lounge! Don't forget to stop by the Market Stalls for RNG Giveaways!

name: Amore Musicale
description: A bard venue focused on bringing out the best Eorzea has to offer. Come listen to good music, good vibes, and chill with friends while you enjoy a menu of "Perfectly legally procured items". All types welcome and light RP may occur but not required.

name: Hellfire Rose Lounge
description: Are you sweet as a rose? Come get hot with us every Wednesday night at HellFire Rose Lounge! Four fun packed hours listening to our lovely bard as you share some top quality food with our stunning host team, or a dance on our dance floor. With three fully stocked bar run by an exceptional mixologist team, we are more than like to have something for you! Come, join us for a time!

name: House Catboi
description: Welcome to House Catboi an LGBTQA+ Night Club! We offer a variety of services from Courtesans to free GPOSES. Come party with us as we help kick your weekend off right!

name: Club Phoenix Down
description: At Phoenix Down, we strive to be open and active, welcoming both regulars and new guests to join in on our fun! Every opening night has a different theme and a new playlist, so it will never be the same experience! SFW and sprout friendly environment for all kinds of players; even those who normally don't like the in-game clubbing scene!
Check our website to find our next Theme!

name: The Huntsman's Tavern
description: A cozy Eorzean tavern, serving fine, Coerthan-style cuisine. Here one can enjoy excellent food, and exquisite company. Partake in the wonderful tradition of the Huntsman: First time visit? Your first drink is on the house.
Come, stay awhile, and listen.

name: CafÃ© LumiÃ¨re du Jour
description: We are a small breakfast oriented cafe that offers live music, relaxing vibes, and a fun environment for roleplayers of all variety. Sprouts to experienced players are welcome here. Not into roleplaying? No problem! Come and join us to unwind from a stressful dungeon or a long day of grinding. Check out our website to see if we have any events ongoing! We hope to see you here, at CafÃ© LumiÃ¨re du Jour!

name: River's Fall Hotel
description: Riverâ€˜s Fall Hotel is a hotel that is also the home of the Shiva FC â€œThe Shireâ€. It is a venue with various rooms for you to rp, relax, or afk in â˜ºï¸
The Coffee & Tea Lounge is currently open from 2-5pm ST every Sunday!

name: Voidbound Lounge
description: Welcome Traveller. Come, take a minute and rest, at the Voidbound Lounge. A safe place for voidsent and those associated with voidsent can mingle and be entertained by each other and staff. But take heed of the sin of greed. Voidbound Lounge welcomes all who wish to sample our decandent delight. Enjoy, relax, and partake.

name: 28-28 Bar & Grille
description: Enjoy a laid back low light tavern atmosphere
Open Bi-weekly
live music by our in house bard team!
Serving drinks & food at our bar and kitchen, come relax & enjoy time with friends, cozy time alone, a good chat with our staff and anything in between! hope to see you there!

name: The Study Hall
description: Looking for somewhere to unwind with good coffee, good company, and enough books to last a lifetime? Kick back at The Study Hall and take a break from classes or the rush of life with a cozy atmosphere and Rhiko's realm-famous coffee biscuits. No matter if you're here to discuss the latest from Sharlayan or if you're here for some caffeine, there's always a seat for you!

name: Reefside Cafe and Pub
description: A warm and friendly Cafe tucked away in the heart of the Mist. With the seaside vista and the salty Limsan air adrift, why not enjoy a cocktail with staff and share tales - or secrets. Or have yourself an alchemical commission with the ever so mysterious Kreios, a gaze into one's fortune with a graceful (and sometimes drunk) fortune teller. Wherever your weary feet have taken you, come rest at Reefside Cafe and Pub.

name: The Coerthan Rose
description: A small slice of Kugane nestled in a corner of Ishgard. Come relax and enjoy a fresh cup of tea or some of our freshly baked treats!

name: Milk Nightclub
description: Milk Nightclub, Home of the Champagne Call
An 18+ Aether staple since 2021, Milk exists to bring you a great evening full of toasts, drinks, music, and fun!
Stop by to see our resident DJ, AWP go hard on the beats or just chill with us in our large house on the beach!
Our staff is full of energy and friendly, and the vibes are immaculate. We wanna have a good time with you!
Dancers, gambling, and theme nights/events await! VIP available, raffles/giveaways nightly.

name: The Ravel
description: The Ravel Cabaret and Speakeasy, is a small tavern run by local Cult, I mean, Church dedicated to the worship of The Great Serpent of Ronka. All of the drinks have some reference to The Rak'tika Greatwoods, if not all of FFXIV at large. Our venue has a large selection of drinks, even opening up to other venues with signature drinks, breweries, and wineries that would like to feature on our menu. We mix RP-Gil and Real Gil prices for our menu, and do our best to have everyone feel relaxed as they drink to the past, all while reminding them that they were never here.

name: Diamond Dust
description: Please check us out every Friday on Crystal! LFG!

name: LunarLite
description: Our Venue is a Bar, with fun upbeat songs of Kpop, RNB, Hip Hop, With some good old Throwbacks, Drinks and food are stock. Dancer are dancing for fun, serve drinks to customer and as well for additional is up to them. Bartenders serving customers with delight of the enjoyment of the patrons. LunarLite is where the Moon Shines. Through out our world to see how our venue shine, dance, eat, drink, make friends. Enjoying each other company Under one Lunar Lite!

name: Allure Lounge
description: A staple in the Primal nightlife scene for over 5 years, Allure Lounge is open (almost) every Friday night and the last Saturday of every month. When you visit the Allure Lounge, you will experience an immersive nightclub experience with top-tier service, perks, music, and special dance troupe performances. Whether you'd like to come for the party, the drinks, or the live performances, we hope to make your weekends alluring!

name: Blackrose Tavern
description: Blackrose Tavern is recruiting for all positions, especially hosts. We are a 18+ SFW immersive RP venue for those who crave a more classic goth feel. We cater to all sorts of spooks and spirits, but mortals are more than welcome to apply as well! Please join our discord or shoot me a DM if you're interested, or if you just want to check us out, we're open 8-11PM EST Tuesdays @ Balmung, Lavender Beds, Ward 16 Plot 60.

name: Big Boys Sushi Bar
description: Derived from our Big Brother Goobbue's spirit of warmth & goofiness to coexist with plant life on them, the Big Boys Sushi Bar aims to create a symbiotic relationship with their patrons, much like the relationship with the moss and lichen growing atop a goobbue's head! We're a SFW cozy place with a splash of chaos to chill, get your fill, meet friends, and have fun! There's a wide selection of food and drinks available, friendly staff, relaxing bathhouse and a wild gambling master always ready for a death roll.

notices.message: This venue is open every OTHER Saturday night. Please check the venue's Discord for opening.

name: Wild Dreams Host Club
description: We want to make some wild dreams and also make you experience these. There are a variety of ways to do it and you can decide yourself how you want to approach your evening with us. Here is a list from where you can choose how your wild dream will come alive.

name: The Azeyma Tavern
description: Its been a busy week, and before you go club hoping and indulging in your RP fantasies I'm sure you'd like a place to relax. Unwind. Maybe even pregame before hitting the more popular spots that open from 8pm-3am (est). If that sounds idea but you haven't found that ideal spot, then you haven't heard of The Azeyma Tavern. A small humble social space where you can enjoy both outdoor and indoor dining options, listen to the relaxing sounds of our orchestrion or the performances of our bards. Great food and even better drinks, provided you can hold your intake. And a location fit for any possible collaboration events, sitting only a few steps above the public swimming area in the Goblet. If you and your fc/friends/static or whomever needs a place to eat high quality, stat boosting food then look no further. Our menu holds food and drinks to give you the boost you need to get through those extreme trials and savage raids. All that's missing is you. Come through, take a load off, and enjoy all that Azeyma has to offer.

name: ANTHOLOGY
description: Augment your Reality at ANTHOLOGY. A First of its kind Gaming themed Venue, with unique and exciting services and entertainment.

name: Moondancer Inn
description: The Moondancer Inn is a medieval pub located on Zodiark, Empyreum W1/P38. If you like listening to medieval music, rock, metal & folk, then this is the place you want to visit after a long and adventurous day in Eorzea. We'd love to have a pint with you!

name: The Foxglove Speakeasy
description: The Foxglove an LGBTQ+ SFW performance focused venue themed after high end lounges and is hidden away within the mansion of FC. Be it to listen to performances, drink 'till you're hearts content, or snuggle with a loved one, we welcome all- just keep it on the downlow, alright?

name: The Desert Jewel
description: Located in the bustling streets of Ul'Dah, The Desert Jewel offers a place for respite, good company, and immersive RP in the heart of the city.

name: The Blue Rabbit
description: A high-class bar, lounge, and fight club that all are welcome to, whether it be to watch or fight.

name: KINGS Music Club
description: KINGS is a SFW/RP Classical and Jazz venue, with music of these genres being played live by the in-house band. KINGS was conceptualized with an emphasis on bringing people together, musicians and non musicians alike, and the club is mostly music focused. All refreshments are free of charge!

name: The House of Honey
description: The House of Honey is an 18+ nightclub that offers sweet nectars,
bee-autiful honeybees, and a buzzing atmosphere.
We hope you will enjoy your time at the hive! ðŸ

name: New Beginnings
description: Welcome to New Beginnings, so named because of the warmth and growth we seek to foster. With few exceptions, we will be open each third weekend fri-sun starting at 8pm to at least midnight if not 2 am (CST). Whether it's an open dance floor with DJs, a quieter and more chill vibe as we play games like truth or dare, or a private play party in the dungeon available only to discord members, we want you to have a safe place to play and learn about you and your kinks. We are sex positive, kink and LGBT+ friendly, and do not cater to guests under 18. We have a focus on education, both on various bdsm kinks and in the respect of boundaries as Brigid is a pro domme irl. Please, come ask questions in discord if you have them! We want this to be a safe place to rp, to hang out, to learn, and to enjoy yourself. During the week you may also feel free to come rp in the dungeon with your partner. You may also speak with Brigid about private affairs, be that dungeon play or more of a party. Your privacy is important to us, what happens here stays here.

name: Li'l Leblanc
description: It's early on a weekend morning. You want a place to chill with a piping hot breakfast of curry and coffee. Then you'll probably be headed to Li'l Leblanc. Come on by! We can talk phantom thieves or just general events or you can just relax at one of the tables. Whatever suits you! Adding more than coffee to the menu as well, stay tuned for hot cocoa and chai!

name: Sakura Sunrise
description: An early morning 18+ Eastern Tea Shop & Bath House for you to relax and enjoy your mornings in.

name: Shinkou Rentsuki Lounge
description: A relaxed, laid-back Doman RP establishment with a twist on traditional refreshments, food, and entertainment. We are bringing a lavish, high style of the East to the Grey of Ishgard with our welcoming staff, creative menu, a casino for both low and high stakes, and reaching out to connect with the community for entertainment. Let us be your hosts and welcome you with hospitality.

name: The Unending Journey
description: MSQ Themed CafÃ© with cozy, heartwarming vibes.

name: Club Burzum Canopy
description: High atop the trees of the jungle is a haven the likes of which you've never seen. A hideaway nestled in the boughs of the canopy, with a plethora of male-folk intent on catering to your every desire.

name: The DREAM SEEKER Cafe
description: Leisurely Cafe / Pleasantly Snack Bar / Relaxing Music Lounge   [RP / nonRP / AFK / Gpose]

name: Witch's Brew
description: Be aware of your surroundings for these halls are filled with magic. Step into Primal's first fully stocked shopping center: The Witch's Brew!
Visit our always ready-to-serve CafÃ© Manager Arabella Bancroft on the ground floor of the Witch's Brew, where our CafÃ© is located on the right.

Located on the top floor to the right is our very own potion brewer and metaphysical shop! This is where our famous Lavender Witch brews all of our potions...and for a discounted price she can even sell you a stone that is known to bring its keepers gil.
Behind the potion shop is our brand new boutique where you can catch up on all the latest glam the game has to offer! Hand-crafted by our team in-house.
"Let the Magical Witches of the Witch's Brew Serve You"

name: Dazzling Lightz!
description: Dazzling Lightz is an LGBTQ+ venue for all walks of Eorzea! We specialize in a fun and welcoming Roleplay environment. Experienced or Novice to writing does not exist in our space. We want to see everyone, experience fun, and most important write together!~ So groove on by for some funky disco fun.

name: Seraphim
description: **Seraphim** is a new nightclub joining the scene. Come enjoy the music, drinks, or maybe even some company, if you dare.

name: Art Lab
description: Art Lab is a Dj Bar and a Bathhouse for creative people.

name: Cafe Carbuncle
description: A cute Carbuncle Themed Cafe! We offer breakfast foods, amazing service, and a cute place to relax!

name: Wild Peony
description: A role-play encouraged Thavnairian pillow-house!
Join us and taste the delights we have to offer: Courts, Gamba, Giveaways and more!
NSFW services are not offered to Lalafell players, and you must be 18+ to enter and participate.

name: Cat Nipps
description: A purrfect place for you and friends to spend your time RPing with other patrons or with our lovely staff. We'd love to show you a wonderful night.
Open 1st & 3rd Saturdays a month.

name: Unicorn & Toad
description: A Go-Go Bar Dance Hall where music and audience are the focus.

name: The Kitty's Catfish Cafe
description: A warm and cozy cafe run by the family and friends of spouses S'oun Pinh and Kasandri Shai'moltal. Hot drinks, sweets, savories, take your pick! Staff barding most weeks, but the stage is open to all!

name: The Fortune's Bloom Cafe
description: Come on in and rest your weary feet. Enjoy a tasty treat or refreshing beverage and share tales of your fortune, and foibles, with friends from near and far. Here at Fortune's Bloom we hope you find comfort and relaxation amidst good food, great music, and even better companions!

name: Ivy cafe
description: Family Friendly Venue, The Ivy Cafe takes inspiration from nature and the fey world to bring you a great and relaxing location to sit back and relax after a long day of working in the mines or fields,
